107b6(rgyud 'grel): 'grel pa/ rdo rje'i tshig 'byed pa zhes bya ba/ dge slong mkhas pa chen po dA ri ka pas mdzad pa/ bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba 'bro dge slong shes rab grags
108a1(rgyud 'grel): bas tha ma la mnyan nas bsgyur ba rdzogs rga
109a1(rgyud 'grel): dpal dul gyi 'khor lo bsgrubs pa yan lag bzhi pa zhes bya ba bzhugs/
109b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ shrI thA la tsakra tsa tu raM ga sA d+ha no bi krAn+t+ra mA/ bod skad du/ dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i sgrub pa'i thabs yan lag bzhi pa zhes bya ba/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag
109b2(rgyud 'grel): 'tshalo// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshalo// mchog gi snying rje dag gis ni// 'khor ba mi bzad sdug bsngal las// gdon phyir ye shes lam la ni// ston pa khyod ni nyid kyi gzhag/ khyod ni rgan
109b3(rgyud 'grel): yang gzhon nu mA// rgyu la ba mtha' dag gi ni sras// dang po sangs rgyas kyi drang po// dung med sbyor la tshangs par spyod// mchog gi snying rje dag gis ni// 'jig rten gnyen ni gshin rje'i dgra/ khyod ni khro nA'i rdo rje nyid//
109b4(rgyud 'grel): srid pa yi ni 'jigs sel ba// khyod ni rtag tu bdud kyi bdud// srid pa las ni rnam grol khyod// 'gro ba smin pa'i don du ni// 'jug pa si ni gshin rje khyod// thug pa yi ni rigs 'dud pa// bram ze'i rigs kyi nyi ma bdag/ zhabs
109b5(rgyud 'grel): kyi pad+mar rab btud pa// sems can rnams ni grol don du// dus kyi 'khor lo mtha' dag ni// sa'i steng du gsal byed pa// snyigs ma can gyi rigs ni khyod// sa'i bdag pos phyag byas pa// ka lA pa ru dpal grags pa// khyod kyi
109b6(rgyud 'grel): zhabs kyi pad+ma la// lag pa'i thal mo sbyar nasu// yan lag mchog la gzhag na su// spyi bo yis ni phyag 'tshal nas// mtha' dag ma tshang med pa yi// bsgrub pa'i thabs ni bshad par bya//
110a1(rgyud 'grel): skyed myos tshul dang ri brag dang // rgyal ba dam pa yi ni gnas// khang stong lha yi gnas dang ni// grub pa'i gnas dang dur khrod dang // mtsho yi gnas dang grub pa'i sa// gang du yid ni dgra' bar ni// de
110a2(rgyud 'grel): ru bsgrub pa bya ba ru// 'gyur ro mi'i bdag po kye// zab cing rgya che ba yi sems// bla ma'i nges pa la dga' zhing // gtong ba'i sems dang yon tan shras// thar pa 'dod cing rgyud la dang // sems ni g.yo ba med pa dang // de nyid rnyed pa dang
110a3(rgyud 'grel): gsang zhing // gdug pa rnams kyi tshogs bral ba// dpal ldan dus 'khor dkyil 'khor du// dbang bskur rim pa bzhin thob grang // 'jam pa nyid kyi mal cha'am// bstan bde ba la 'jug par bya// maN+Dal skyang nul mdzes byas nas//
110a4(rgyud 'grel): rdzas bcur ldan pa'i mchod pa bsham// phyag rgya bzang po'i rjes phye ba'i// dag pa rnam gsum dran par bya// rdo rje gsum gyi sa phyogasu// dang po kho nar chos skyong la// gtor ma ngag ni sbyin par bya// phyi nas rdo rje bzhi yis ni//
110a5(rgyud 'grel): phyogs dang mtshamasu song ba ni// bdud kyi tshogs rnams nges par srog/ dpral gyi rdo rje'i sa phyogs na// gnas pa yi ni bdud kyi tshegs// ma lus par ni nges par sreg/ phyi nas 'khor lo'i rtsibs bcu la// phyogs dang
110a6(rgyud 'grel): mtsham su song ba yi// khro bo'i tshogs ni bsgom par bya// sa'i mtshams kyi mthar thug par// ring po ru ni mthong gi bar// rdo rje gsum gyi ra ba gsum// sa'i bskor bar song ba ni// sa 'og gnas dang na mkha rau// rdo rje khang pa
110b1(rgyud 'grel): brtsegs par mi// dbusu 'dam skyes nyi ma'i khru// lte bA dang ni gang na la ni// dus dang lag pa'i khrur gyur pa// de'i steng du bdag nyid ni// dri ma dang ni bral ba nyid// 'khor lo'i dbus khyod dbyung po// phyug ni rgyul ba gnyis
110b2(rgyud 'grel): lhag pa// dus kyi zhal te rdo rje shugs// rnal 'byor pa yi bsgom par bya/ dang po'i snying ga'i zla dbu su// phyogs bcu ru nI sna tshogs la// de kho na'i 'od zer bsgomo// khaM la sogs pa
110b3(rgyud 'grel): ngag byas te// slar la yang ni nam mkha' ru// 'od zer smos pas rgyal po bkug/ mchod pa sna tshogs byas nasu// srid po'i sdig pa mang po ni// bstsags pa de ni bshags par bya// gsum la skyabasu 'gro ba dang // lus
110b4(rgyud 'grel): dang ngag dang sems dag pas// sgrub pa po yi bya ba yin// rdzogs sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems// 'phags pa'i ngage 'dun gang mdzad pa'i// dge ba rnams la mang po yi// ma lus de lnga rjes yi rang // nyon mongs
110b5(rgyud 'grel): pa dang bral ba yi// byang chub spyod pa r+Ne su gan sau// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te// skyid pa yi ni 'jigs sel ba// byang chub thar pa skyabs mchi'o// rdzogs sangs rgyasu bdag gyur cig/ ces pa'i smon lam
110b6(rgyud 'grel): 'debs pa yi// 'di ni sems can don gyi phyir// 'gro ba ma lus 'di dag ni// dngos po'i ngo bo'i rang bzhi no// dngos dang bral ba stong pa'o// de phyir sangs rgyas byang chub med// gzhan la phan pa'i snying rje yis//
111a1(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma myed par dam bcas pa'i// de ltar mthu' dgra shes byas te// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje nI// byang chub sems dpa' bsgom par bya// dpag tu med pa'i yon tan ldan// dkyil
111a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor la ni dkyil 'khor gtso// dang por 'di ni sdom brtson gyis// chu yis me ni 'jigs pa ni// lus kyi dbus bya ba yin// phyis ni sa ni chu ru 'gyur// tshwa bzhin chu yi dbusu zhugs// rlung gis chu ni skams na su// na mkha'
111a3(rgyud 'grel): ru ni mi snang bra rA// myur du 'gro'o de nas nI// sems dang me ni mun pa'i mthar// yul dang rnam par bral ba ni// dbus kyi sa ru bzhog par bya// stong pa rlung dang me dang chu// sa dang rgya mchi ri pad+ma// zla ba nyi ma dang ni me// khang pa rtsegs
111a4(rgyud 'grel): ma kun nis ni// dri med 'od zer 'phro ba yi// rdo rje las ni skyes pa'i phyir// de na rdo rje'i sa gzhi la// sna tshogs nor bu 'od lta bu// dkyil 'khor la ni rnam 'phro ba// oM gyi ya shes las skyes pa// rgyal ba dam pa'i pad+ma la//
111a5(rgyud 'grel): zla ba nyi ma dag gi gang na// nang du brgyad gnyis ka ba ni// rigs gtso yis ni rang bzhin te// rgyal ba'i longs spyod 'khor lo ni// rgyal po rigs byed bsgoms rnams la// nor bu gser gyis rang bzhin gyi// rta babs dur khrod
111a6(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis brgyan// a sogs ka sogs nyi ma zla// rigs kyi gtso dang lhan cig pa// me long lta bu la sogs pa'ang // dri ma med pa'i 'od 'phro ba// 'od zer lnga ni 'gyed mdzad pa// dus kyi 'khor lo bsgom par bya// rdo rje'i
111b1(rgyud 'grel): brgyan dang ldan pa'i lus// rgyal ba yi ni phyag pad+ma// nyi ma'i dpung pa dus kyi shul// mgrin gsum nyi ma yis ni spyan// zhal gdangs mche ba gtsigs pa yis// dpal ldan oM las skyes pa'o// nor gyi pad+ma'i 'ang
111b2(rgyud 'grel): ma la// zla ba nyi mA mye'i ste// drag po 'dod lha gnyis kyis ni// snying gar shin tu rol pa'i zhabs// rgyal ba'i dbang po g.yas brkyang zhabs// mchog gi zhabs kyi 'og tu ni// bdud kyi dmar po g.yas kyi ste// drag po
111b3(rgyud 'grel): dkar po g.yon gyi so// mgrin pa dbus dang g.yon dang g.yas// dpung pa nyi ma zla ba'i mdog/ g.yas pa dang ni g.yon pa yi// phrag pa sngo dang dmar po dang // ri bong 'dzin pa ltar dkar bya// g.yas da g.yon du gnyis
111b4(rgyud 'grel): kyi zhabs// dpung pa rnamasu dkar min dang // nyi ma'i mdog dang zla ba'i mdog/ de bzhin du ni brgyad gsum gyi// mtshon cha rnams dang lhan cig tu// lag pa rnams ni ri mya pa bzhin// sor mo la ni tshigs gsum
111b5(rgyud 'grel): gsum+b+ha// ra bong ban+dan lag pad+ma lA// kha dog lnga ni 'phro ba'o// nag po dkar po dmar po yi// rab mchog lag pa'i mthil du ni// mtshon cha'i tshogs ni yang dag gnas// rdo rje ral gri rtse gsum dang // srid pa gsum
111b6(rgyud 'grel): ni 'jigs pa yi// gri gug dang ni ma yi mda'// de nas rdo rje lcags kyu nyid// sgra dang bcas pa'i cang te'u// tho ba dang ni 'khor lo nyid// mdung dang dbyug pa dgra sta nyid// rdo rje can gyi g.yas pa yi// nyi ma'i phyag gi pad+ma
112a1(rgyud 'grel): lnga'o// dril bu phub dang kha T+wAM ga/ kha ni rnam par phye ba dang // khrag gi kang ba'i thod pa dang // gzhu dang zhags pa rin chen dang // pad+ma dang ni chu la spyod// me long dang ni lcags sgrog dang //
112a2(rgyud 'grel): tshangs par rig byed gdong gis ni// mgo ba dang ni pad+ma ni// rgyal ba'i phyag ni g.yon pas 'dzin// sman pa'i gdong du byed pa yi// zhabs ci 'og tu mnan pa ni// bdud dang drag po rang lha mo// rig byed zhal te gse
112a3(rgyud 'grel): lta bu// nor gyi phyag ni pad+ma yis// 'khyud pa sna tshogs yum yi no// g.yos ni gri gug lcags kyu dang // 'khrol ba yi ni tsang twe'u// bgrang phreng rim pa bzhin du'o// g.yon na nya phyis zhugs pa dang // 'dab ma rgyas pa'i
112a4(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma dang // nor bu bzang po de bzhinA te// g.yon brkyang ba la nyi ma'i spyan// rgyal ba'i bdag po'i cod pan can// phyag rgya rnams kyis rgyas btab po// phyogs kyi pad+ma rA sangs rgyas bzhi// des pA kho nar spyan ni dgu/ ma'i
112a5(rgyud 'grel): spyan dang dus kyi phyag/ mtsham su sgrol ma sogs lha mo// gzhan yang slar yang 'di dag gi/ mtshams brgyad du ni bum pa brgyad// nag po dmar po ser po dang // ri bong 'dzin pa dkar po ni// lha dang lha mo rnams kyi'o//
112a6(rgyud 'grel): nog po dmar po zla ba ni// gzhan yang phyogs bral du song ba// dmar po ser po nyi ma'i skye// rtsigs pa'i phyogs mtshams song ba la// nam mkha'i snying po la sogs dang // reg bya'i rdo rje ma la sogs// shar gyi g.yas
112b1(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pa dang // phyogs gzhan gyis ni pad+mar ni// kun tu bzang po de bzhin du// dpal ldan phyag na rdo rje dang // sgra yi rdo rje nyid dang ni// chos kyi dbyings ni rim pa bzhin// lkugs dang rengs dang nga rgyal can// rab stobs
112b2(rgyud 'grel): shes pa 'di dag ni// sgo skyong shar la sogs pa'o// ri bong 'dzin pa'i pad+ma la// shes rab dang ni thabs byung ba// lha rnams dang ni lha mo rnams// phan tshun du ni 'khyud pa gnyis// rang gi lag pa chu skyes ni// rang rang
112b3(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma rnams dang ldan// gang gi g.ya su mtshan ma gang // dang po yi ni lag pa la// de 'dir phyag rgya dang bral ba'o// shes rab stobs kyi 'khor lo yi// mchog tu badra ba yI ni gnas// pad+ma rdo rje'i ga na la sogs//
112b4(rgyud 'grel): nag po rnams kyi ral gri gug/ gnas rnams 'jigs par byed pa dang // g.yas kyi lag nA rtse ga sum// g.yon na phub dang thod pa dang // kha T+wAM ga nu dkar po ni// lag pa'i mthil na yod gyur te// dmar po rnams kyi de
112b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du// mda' dang rdo rje lcags kyu dang // sgra dang bcas pa'i chung te'u// g.yas kyi phyag na rim pa bzhin// g.yon ni gzhu dang zhags pa dang // nor bu dri ma mang 'phro ba// ser po rnams kyus 'khor lo dbyug// 'jigs
112b6(rgyud 'grel): par byed pa'i rdo rje ni// g.yas kyi lag par rim pa bzhin// g.yon dang dpal ldan lu gu rgyud// dril bu'i sgra dang bcas par 'gyur// ri bong 'dzin pa dkar rnams kyi// g.yas na dpal gyi tho ba dang // mda' dang rtsa gsum
113a1(rgyud 'grel): pa ni nyid// g.yon na pad+ma dkar po nyid// 'dub ma brgyad dang bcus pA dang // me lcong dang ni bgrang 'phre'o// ljang gu rnams kyi g.yas pa la// rdo rje TI gug dag s+yA ni// rim pa bzhin du 'gyur ba
113a2(rgyud 'grel): sbyin// g.yon+da na d+hil bu thod pa dang // yon tan mtha' dag gis ni gter// ut+pa la ni de bzhin nyid// so so'i yonan+ta tAn dbang gis ni// sngon po rnams kyi rig par bya// lha mo rnams ni dri bzhin du// nag po dmar po d+ma/
113a3(rgyud 'grel): po dang // gser ni zhun ma 'dra ba dang // shAR+Sha g+hi lha sogs lha mo'o// / de ltar rdo rje can gyi yang // srid pa gsum ni ma lus pa// dkyil 'khor gyis ni rnam par gsungs// phyi dang
113a4(rgyud 'grel): lus dang gzhan la ni// smos pa'i rang bzhin med pa ni// dngos po'i skye ba yang dag gnas// de la rtag par mkha' rdo rje// srid pa rnam pa gsum song ba// mi rtag par ni 'gro ba'o// 'byung po'i tshogs ni rtag pa
113a5(rgyud 'grel): min// mig 'phrul dag ni ji bzhi no// rtag dang mi rtag par blta ba// de yang bem po'i blo can gyi// sems drag pa yi don gyi phyir// sgrub thabs nyid ni brjod par bya'o// mA las snying du song ba yi// sgrub par nus pa
113a6(rgyud 'grel): nyid ma yin// rdo rje can ni sgrub pa'i thabs// sgrub po bsgrub par bya ba gang // ma lus pa ni 'khrul pa'o// de phyir rgyal po rang gi sems// nyon mongs pa dang bral ba ni// dkyil 'khor nyid du bsgrub par bya// ho yog
113b1(rgyud 'grel): thog ma tha mA'i dbus// yang dag bde ba'i 'bras ster ba// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni// shes rab chags pas de zhu ga/ ri bong can nyid lta bu ru// rdo rje can yang zhu mthong nas// lha mo rnams ni glu len byed// bcom
113b2(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das ni rdo rje can// sum cu pa dang mi'i bla ma// sems can kun la bde mdzad pa// khyod kyis 'dod pa'i don gnyer ba// bdag cag rnams ni bsrung bar mdzod// glu ni rdo rje can son nas// srid pa gsum nI mA lus
113b3(rgyud 'grel): la// mig 'phrul lta bu nyid du ni// gzigs nas bskyed pa ru mdzad// 'od zer dri ma med pa 'phro// mtshan ma bcas pa spro bar bya// rdo rje can ni rgyan dang ldan// rgyal ba'i dbang po'i cod pan can// shes rab kyi nI 'khyud
113b4(rgyud 'grel): pa nyid// rgyal po sheswa rab thabs kyis te// sla rA la yang ni dkyil 'khor pa// ma lus pa rnams 'byung bar bya// sngon po'i 'od 'phro 'jigs pa'i gzugs// rab tu bzhad pa yi ni zhal// zla ba phyed pa mche gtsigs
113b5(rgyud 'grel): parasgra ni sgrogs pa me'i spyan// gnyis lhog pa yi rgyal ba'i phyag/ rig byed zhal la zhabs gnyis pa// shes rab thabs kyi yan lag can// mtshon cha rnams kyis yang ngag mtshan// rdo rje shugs kyi gzhug pa
113b6(rgyud 'grel): bya// / rkang pa brgyad pa'i shing rta nos// rgyal ba'i dgra ni 'jigs byed// ye shes 'khor lo'i rgyu ru'o// mdun du ya shes de mthong nas// rnam pa bcu yi mchod pa dang // sngags rnams kun
114a1(rgyud 'grel): dang mchod pa bya// lte bar lcags kyu yis btab nas// dri med pa yi 'od 'phro ba// ye shes 'khor lo dbang phyug nyid// rigs gtsog ces pa'i gdod can gyis// zhags pa de nyid rab tu
114a2(rgyud 'grel): bcing // mtshon cha rnams kyis 'jigs byas te// ma lus pa ni bsgrubs byas nas// slar lnga yung ni log nas ni// rang gi 'khor lo bskor byas te// gzhug drang bcing dang dgyes pa dang // ro dag mnyam par
114a3(rgyud 'grel): byed pa ni// 'gugs byed la sogs pa yis// sems nyid rnal 'byor bskyed pa ni// nang gi pad+ma'i nyi steng su// na mkha' dang ni bcas pa'o// shar du 'du byed dang ni sa// lho ru tsher ba dang ni chu// byang du 'du shes rme
114a4(rgyud 'grel): ru 'gyur// nub tu gzugs ni gzhan nyi do// me ru rlung dang gzugasu 'gyur// badren bral me dang 'du shes gnyis// dbang ldan chu dang tshor ba gnyis// rlung du sa dang 'du shes ldan// sangs rgyas lha mo'i bar stong
114a5(rgyud 'grel): la/ mtshan gyi phyogasu bdud rtsi'o// ro lir bAkang bya'i bum pa brgyad// yang ni rim pa gzhan ma yin// steng du sna dang drir 'gyur te// lho ru mig dang gzugs dgo do// g.yon du lce dang ror 'gyur zhing // nub tu
114a6(rgyud 'grel): lus dang reg bya ni// de bzhin du ni 'gyur ba yin// lho yi sgo yi g.yon du ste// 'og tu rna ba dang ni sgrar// rigs kyi dbang gis 'gyur ba yin// shar gyi sgo yi byang du ste// nam mkha' ru ni yid nyid dang // chos kyi khams
114b1(rgyud 'grel): su 'gyur ba yin// dang po thabs ni rnam pa drug/ dkyil 'khor gyi ni lhag pa'i lha// rigs kyi dbang gis 'gyur ba yin// phyi nas shes rab la sogs drug/ rang rang pad+ma'i gdan la ni// gsal ba nyi du 'gyur bya yin//
114b2(rgyud 'grel): shar gyi sgo ru stobs po che// rab gtum ral gri 'dzin pa'o// de'i shes rab rengs byed ma// lho ru lcags byad nga rgyal chararu// gyur te nor sbyin gyi phyogasu// nga rgyal byed ma rmugs ma'o// nub tu rengs byed brtson 'grus
114b3(rgyud 'grel): dpag medra pa// chu lha ru ni gnas gyur pa// sgo yi dbus nA pad+mar gnas// lha rnams 'di dag g.yon brkyang ste// rdo rje n+dan gyi a thung ngu// rol gri can gyi i thung ngu// 'od dpag med pa u thung ngu// 'gyur te slar
114b4(rgyud 'grel): yang l-i yig ni// 'di ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi// ring po'i dngos po'i dbye ba yis// dbyangs kyi tshig ni ma lus pa// rigs drug rnams kyis rim paso// dpal yum gyi ni mi shigs brjod// a las skyes pa nAm
114b5(rgyud 'grel): mkha'i khams// I bAM U l+lI rim pa las rlung dang me dang chu dang sa// thams cad 'byung bar ru ni 'gyur// rgyal ba dam pa'i bdag po dang // sna tshogs yum gyi bde don du// lus kyi dngos po phan tshu no// mi bskyod pa ni
114b6(rgyud 'grel): stong pa'i khams// phyag gi pad+ma ral gri can// spyan ma rnams kyi dngos po'o// rin chen bdag po mA ma kI/ gzhan yang pad+ma 'dzin pa dang // gos dkar mo ni lus kyi dngos// de bzhin 'khor lo can sgrol ma// rang bzhin
115a1(rgyud 'grel): yon tan dbang gis na// thung dang ring ba'i dbyangs rnams kyis// aM ni kun tu bzang po la// gyur te lus kyi dbang gis na// phyag na rdo rje 'di ni a// gyur te gzhan yud de bzhin du// sa yi skying
115a2(rgyud 'grel): po Ar ro ste// oM ni 'jig rten mgon po ste// de bzhin ar du gyur po ste// 'di ni sgrib pa rnam sel lus// a ni chos kyi dbyings nyid du// de bzhin du ni nges par 'gyur// a las skyes pa sgra rdo rje// e las skyes pa reg
115a3(rgyud 'grel): bya rdo rje// ro yi rigs kyi gtso bo nyid// a las skyes pas lus dbye bas// oM las skyes pa gzugs rdo rje// gyur te de bzhin mi'i bdag po// a las skyes pa dri rdo rje// dpal gyi bzang mo chos kyi dbyings// sgra yi
115a4(rgyud 'grel): rigs kyi gtso mo dang // phyag na rdo rje yi ni gzugs// na mkha'i snying po dri rdo rje// ro yi mchog gi rigs gAts+tsho dang // 'jig rten mgon po yang ni zung // s+ya yi snying po gzugs rdo rje// reg bya sgrib pa rnam sel dag/ zung ngu
115a5(rgyud 'grel): yang ni 'gyur ba'o// de ltar rigasnga ni drug po dag/ rigs rnams yon tan dbang gis ni// yang dag par ni rig par bya// y+ra la zung gi rim pa yis// stobs dang gnod mdzes ma nr-i zung // gsal ba nyid du 'gyur pa
115a6(rgyud 'grel): yin// rarku lkug dang nga rgyal ma// rigs kyi dbang gis 'gyur ba yin// wa dang ra ni 'di nyid las// nga rgyal byed pa lkug byed ma// la yA gnas mdzes brtson 'grus ma// rigs kyi dbang gi 'gyur ba yin// shes
115b1(rgyud 'grel): rab thabs ni yan lag dngos// rigs kyi dbang gi 'gyur ba yin// glang zhig gang la khrus phyogs pa'i// rdo rje 'chang dpal kun tu bzung // rigs kyi dbang gi 'gyur ba yin// mi bskyod phyug na rdo rje dang // don snod grub pa
115b2(rgyud 'grel): mkha' snying po// d+hi med nor bu med pA dang // yang dag par na sa snying po// 'khor lo'i phyag dang sgrib spel ba// rigs kyi dbang gi 'gyur ba yin// 'od dpag med dang 'jig rten+do myag na// rigs kyi dbang gis 'gyur
115b3(rgyud 'grel): byayin// dpal gyi yum+b+ha dang chos kyi dbyings// rdo rje dbyings dang sgra rdo rje// rigs kyi dab byi gri 'gyur bya yin// dbul gyi sgron ma reg r+b+ho rje// gos dkar mo'i rigs dbye bas// ro yi rdo rje mA nyid // mA mU kI dang gzugs
115b4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje// rigs kyi dbang gi 'gyur ba yin// spyan ma dra yi rdo rje ma// slar la yang ni stobs po che// don yod grub pa'i rigs las byung // rin chen phyag lngas lkug pa nyid// rigs kyi dbang gi 'gyur ba yin// 'od dpag med
115b5(rgyud 'grel): dang rlom byed ma// rengs pa nyid dang rnam snang mdzad// rlung dang me dang chus la swa// brtson 'grus lag med lcug ma dang // nga rgyal can ma rim pa bzhin// nges pa kho na gsal bar ni// gnod mA ru ni rab tu grags// dkyil
115b6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gyi ni nang dbu su// ston pa lha mo sogs bum pa// lhan cig rgyal ba yi ni sku// sangs rgyas la sogs chos kyi sku// sgra rdor la sogs byang chub sems// longs spyod rdzogs pa yi ni sku// khro bo rnams ni sprul pa'i
116a1(rgyud 'grel): sku// yon tan gyi ni dbang gis 'gyur// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gnas pa yi// sems can kun gyi don byed pa// sku yi rdo rje zung du 'gyur// rgyal ba'i sku dang lhan cig tu// sku rdzogs pa yi rgyu ru'o//
116a2(rgyud 'grel): gsung gi rdo rje chos kyi sku// zung du yang ni 'gyur ba yin// chos rnams ston par byed pa yi// sems dang longs spyod rdzogs pa so// zung ngu me ni 'gyur ba yin// soms can kun gyi ngon byed pa'o// ye shes dang ni sgro
116a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sku// srog chags rnams la thar pa ster// zung du yang ni 'gyur pa yin// shes rab thabs kyi yan lag dngos// mthun dang mi mthun pa yi rigs// nyi zla a ka la sogs pa// srid pa rnam pa gsum song ba// ya shis rnam
116a4(rgyud 'grel): shes dbye ba ni// rnal 'byor pa yis rig par bya// rdo rje gsum he swA hAr ldan// spyi bor mgrin pa snying dA ga dang // lte ba gas bu spyi bo ru// 'di rnams kyis ni lus byin brlabs// mchog gi rgyal ba'i bdag po ni// lha mo rnams kyi
116a5(rgyud 'grel): 'grub par 'gyur// rdo rje phun tshun rdo rje nyid // cod pan du ni 'gyur ba yin// ras dgo' sangs rgyas lnga yis ni// gzugs kyi steng du mi bskyod pa// g.yas pa ru nr-i pa mtshan gyi// rnam par snang mdzad nyid du 'gyur// rin chen lce yi/
116a6(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma 'dzin// rab mchog nor bu byed pa ni// don yod grub pa'i dbu rgya no// drug gi cod pan ral pa mdzod// yon tan gyi ni dbang gi 'gyur// lhag ma 'khor lo gzhan dag go// stong pa nyid dang chos kyi dbyings// rigs gsum
116b1(rgyud 'grel): gyi ni dam tshig dang // yA shes mchod pa rjes chags dang // gsum la skyabasu 'gro ba yi// de yi rang bzhin bdag nyid ni// sgrub pa po yis mchod par bya// du byA lA sogs bum pa rnams// snying khru chos kyi 'khor lo ste// rtsa brgyad
116b2(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi dag pa yin// rig pa rnams dang sangs rgyas rnams// spyi bo yi ni lhan cig skyes// rtsibs ni bcu drug pa ru grags// mgrin pa longs spyod 'khor lo yi// mI'i bdag po nyis 'gyur ni// byang chub sems sogs dag
116b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lo yi// noR+Sha lha gdengs can gyis bsgres po'i// 'jigs pa la sogs dag tu'o// lag pa rkang pa ngag gi tshogaso// stong pa drug dang me'i grangs// las kyi 'khor lo'i lha rnams dag/ klu dang gtum
116b4(rgyud 'grel): mo'i bcu drug rnams// sor mo rnams kyi tshogs kyi mtshams// bya ba'i 'khor lo dag par 'gyur// rdo rje can dpal dus dag par// mi'i bdag por 'gyur ba ni// lo dang zla sogs dbye bas so// sems kyi snang bya snang ba med// /
116b5(rgyud 'grel): nyi ma so so'i dbang gis ni// sna tshogs yul ni rnam dgu pa// du ba la sogs rlung dag pa// rang gi snying ga'i pad+ma ni// rtsa sI 'khor lor gnas pa'o// drag po chung ma bcas mnan pA// nyon mongs pa yi bdud bco mo// khyab par
116b6(rgyud 'grel): zhabs kyi mthil gyis ni// bdud mnan bdud tshogs bcom pa'o// dung dang gaN+DI nor bu dang // ljon shing zhes pa de bzhin du// sku'i rdo rje la sogs bzhin// bum brgyad lus ni bdud rtsi brgyad// rgyal ba rnam par rgyal
117a1(rgyud 'grel): bum pa// byang chub sems dang rdul bstan pa'o// 'du byed don yod grub pa ste// tshor ba rin chen 'byung ldan dang // 'du shes 'od dpag med pa'o// gzugs ni rnam par snang mdza // khu ba rkang dang
117a2(rgyud 'grel): khrag dang ni// dri chu dri chen rnam dag po'i// khams drug rnam dag lha mo drug/ yul dang yul can rnam dag pa// byang chub sems dpa' phyag rgyar bcas// khro bo lnga ni stobs lnga nyid// gzhan ni dbang po lnga yi no// rgan byang la
117a3(rgyud 'grel): sogs brgyad dang 'khor// pad+ma'i 'dab mar song ba rnams// nyi dus chu tshod rnam ngag pa'o// bden bral la sogs zla bcu gnyis// pad+mo'i 'dab mar sang ba rnams// nye dus chu chang rnam pa'o// bden bral la sogs zla
117a4(rgyud 'grel): bcu gAnyas// pad+ma'i 'dab mar song ba rnams// chu tshod kyi ni dbugs grangs tshang // klu dang gtum mo rnams gsang ba// mi yi bdag po nyis 'gyuraro// rtsa rnams kyis ni ngag bA'o// de bzhin spyan ma la sogs pa/
117a5(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis ni// lusa? kyi bya ba drug pa'o// sku rnams grub pa ma lus+ya pya// b+hA s+t+rI rnams ni 'byung ba'i tshogs// sa yi steng n+yA gnas rnamaso// de nyid rnams ni gats+tsha mtshan tshe// rang bzhin yon tan
117a6(rgyud 'grel): dbang gis ni// khams rnams dag pa'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje rnams ni nang phyag rgya// gtso bo yis ni snying du ni// zla stengs yang dag gnas pa'o// rdo rje can dpal sna tshogs yum// srid pa rnam pa gsum song ba// dus
117b1(rgyud 'grel): gsum ye shes sbyar ba so// dpa' dag pA las chos kyi sku// chos lasku ljongs spyod rdzogs sgyur 'gyur// ljongs spyod rdzogs lus sprul pa'i skur// gyur te rgyalta ba'i bdag por ni// sems can gyi ni don gyi phyir// byazhi
117b2(rgyud 'grel): pa gnas ni nyal po dang // slar la yang ni gzhan ma gnyis// lus kyi dbye bas sad pa'o// de ltar lus kyi dbye bo yis// srog chags rnams kyis lus la yid// rnam pa bzhi ni gnas pa yin// sprul pa longs spyod
117b3(rgyud 'grel): rnams la yid// lus dang dbang gi rjes byed pa'o// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sems lta ba// rigs kyi dbang gis gyur pa yin// chos kyi sku yi gnyid log pa// dag pa'i bde bar gyur pa ste// 'di ni nyin dang mtshon
117b4(rgyud 'grel): dgra gis// thig la gsum gyi grol ba'i mthar// de yi phyir ni mi 'dzag don// nyin dang mtshan gyi dusu ni// rnal 'byor pa yi bsgom pad+ma bya// g.yon du srog ni rgyas 'gyur zhing // de bzhin g.ya su rdul ba dang //
117b5(rgyud 'grel): de ni g.yon brkyang gnas pa'o// ga tum+bo lte ba'i 'khor lo'o// dgu la lag 'gro yis bsnun pa// rgan byed la sogs pa yi lha// snying po ha yI y+ra shes ni// skad cig ma ru snang ba ste// ye shes gzi brjod sad pa'o//
117b6(rgyud 'grel): lte ba la ni rnam snang sogs// bsreg cing spyan ma mig la sogs// thams cad bsreg nas spyi bor gang // zla ba bzang las 'dzag pa ni// thig le de ni rdo rje can// shes rib chos 'byung la gnas pa// slar yang
118a1(rgyud 'grel): thig le nyid las ni// ma lus par ni spros pa dag/ sna tshogs pa yi rgyan dang ldan// me long nang song lta bu'o// ye shes 'khor lo rang 'byung ba// 'dod pa'i gzugs dang gzugs med pa//
118a2(rgyud 'grel): srid pa rnam pa gsum zhes pa// rim pa yis ni sbyangs na su// phyi nang ye shes mchod pa ni// srid pa gsum ni ma lus pa// skad cig gcig gis dgug par bya// zla nyi a dang ka la sogs// rnam pa gsum du 'gro 'ong ba//
118a3(rgyud 'grel): sku yi rdo rje sogs bzlas pa// so sor sdud pa la sogs drug/ gser ni btse ma'i 'dab ma la// sku dang gsung thugs sbyor ba yi// rdo rje pad+ma dga' la sogs// ro nI mnyam par 'gyur ba yi// rdo rje gsum ni bsgom par
118a4(rgyud 'grel): bya/ shes rab pad+mar sems thig le// lhan cig skyes la bde dbang gis// mi shigs pa ni bsgom par 'gyur// bsnyen pa bdud rtsi lnga la sogs// rigs kyi gtso mo bzhi yis ni// sngags kyi bzlas pa la sogs
118a5(rgyud 'grel): pad+maso sor srung ba la sogs 'gyur// rdo rje pad+ma las skyes pa'i// bdud rtsi nye bar bskul ba'o// dga' ba la sogs rdo rje gsum// pad+mar ro ni mnyam song ba// bsgom pa bsgrub par 'gyur ba'o// shes rab sbyor
118a6(rgyud 'grel): ba mi 'dzag gang // sgrub pa chen po nyid 'gyur te// phra mo yi ni sbyor bas so// dang po stong pa'i byang chub nyid// de nas thig le zla 'dus pa// de nas sku ni bskyed pa nyid// rab mchog ro yi rigs kyis ni// yi ge rnams ni
118b1(rgyud 'grel): dgod pa nyid// 'di rnams thun mong bsnyen pa ste// rdo rje rnam pa bzhi dang ni// dbu ma yi nI sgrub pa'o// 'di ru thabs ni rnam pa bzhir// bsgrub pa'i yan lag de bzhi no// so sor sdud pa rnam pa bcu// rgyal ba
118b2(rgyud 'grel): ni dbang por 'gyur// de bzhin bsam gtan mi bskyod pa// srog dang rtsol ba ral gri can// slar la yang ni rnam pa bcu// bzung ba ron chen phyag rgya can// g.yung mo rjesu dran pa ni// pad+ma 'dzin pa ru ni
118b3(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// dpal gyi ting 'dzin 'khor lo can// re re yang ni lnga ru dbye// slar la yang ni gang dbye ba// a la sogs dang ka la sogs// so sor srung pa yul can ni// yul can rnam pa bcu po rnams// yul
118b4(rgyud 'grel): la 'jug pa med pa'o// shes rab rtog pa dpyod pa rnams// dga' ba mi g.yo bde ba dang // bsam gtan sems ni gcig pa'o// gtu mo 'di ni snang ba gang // lus la nges par gsal 'gyur ba// na mkha'
118b5(rgyud 'grel): de ni rjes dran 'gyur// srog dang rtsol bA gnyis kyi lAm// ma 'khrugs pa ru 'gyur ba ni// dbu mar srog nI 'jug pa'o// thig le ru ni srog 'jug cing // gnyis kar 'gro dang 'ong ba dang // bzung ba nyid ni
118b6(rgyud 'grel): sems gcig pa// shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid kyi// lhan cig skyes pa de dbang gis// ye shes sku ni ting 'dzin pas// 'di ni chu sogs dbye ba yis// gsum du yang ni 'gyur ba yin// sna tshogs bdag
119a1(rgyud 'grel): po'i sgrub thab so// phyag rgya gsum dang tshad ni gsum// rnam pa gsum ni srid dbang gis// las dang kun rtog bzang mo yis// so sor srung ba'i rnal 'byor pa// yul
119a2(rgyud 'grel): dang rnam par bral ba dang // sngags rnams kyis ni byin brlabs nas// bsam gtan sbyor ba drug pa yis// mngon shes lnga ni thob par 'gyur// srog dang rtsol ba dag pas na// zla ba nyi ma dag dang
119a3(rgyud 'grel): bral// byang chub sems dpas mchod par 'gyur// bzung ba yis ni stobs kyis ni// nyon mongs la sogs bdud bcom zhing // stobs bcu lnga ni 'jug par 'gyur// rjes dran gyis ni dag
119a4(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur// dri med 'od 'phro'i dkyil 'khor te// gzhan yang ya shes sku la so// de phyir dag pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// nyi ma cung zad tsam gyis ni// yA shes sku ni 'grub par 'gyur//
119a5(rgyud 'grel): so sor sdud la sogs pa yis// gal te gzir bar ma gyur na// sngags pa rnams kyi 'dod mi 'grub// sgra la sogs pa'i yan lag ma'i// pad+ma rdo rje nor bu ru// thig le bzung ba bsgrub par bya// bsnyen
119a6(rgyud 'grel): pa dang po'i sbyor ba ni// nam mkha' ru ni rnam pa bcu// 'khor lo can 'gro blta ba'o// bgegs ni mthar byed kyang blta ba// bdud rtsi'i lam du song ba yang // nye ba'i bsnyen po yan lag drug/ shes rab la sbyor
119b1(rgyud 'grel): zla thig lnga// gzhan yang rdo rje nor bu ste// yi ge gsum ni 'grub par 'gyur// bde ba ma nyams gcig zhi ba// lhan cig skyes pa ru ni 'gyur// bsgrub chen ye shes sbyor bas so// srog dang rtsol ba kun nas ni/
119b2(rgyud 'grel): mgo bo'i bar ni phan pa ste/ mnyam pa'i bde ba 'brus steng ba// de las steng ni mi phan pa// 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa byed pa'o// sems can nyes pas bzlog pa'i rgyu// gtsug tor sgo nI phug na su// mchog
119b3(rgyud 'grel): tu bde ba'i gro 'phang du// 'di ni sbyar bar bya ba nyid// phung po med pa'i rnal 'byor pa// mnyam pa'i bde ba la 'jug mod// 'on kyang 'jig rten grags pa med// dbus srog dang 'jug pa ni// yul dang rnam
119b4(rgyud 'grel): par bral ba nyid// sna tshogs yum gyi sku 'khyud pa'o// bad+mar bcug pa'i rang rdo rje// spros pa las ni de bzhin te// rdo rje'i dbusu zhugs par bya// sa la ma lhung ba bde bA// shin tu chags pa'i chags pa
119b5(rgyud 'grel): song / rnal 'byor pa yi sbyor ba 'di// phyag rgya dngos grub drodon gyi phyir// mchog tu yang ni khyab pa'i bdag// dpal ni gsang las gsung ba yi// de ltar
119b6(rgyud 'grel): yan lag rnam pa bzhis// gal te bsgoms pas skyon no// de nas sngogs kyi bzlas pa bya// oM kA la tsakra ya tsu hUM swAhA/ oM tsAhU~M hUM swAhA/ oM badz+ra d+hU trI shwa re ts+yai ho swAt+ma/ oM a mo g+ha sid+d+ha ye swAhA/
120a1(rgyud 'grel): b+h+yoraSh+Tas b+hA b+hU ya stAH/ au am+b+hi ta b+hU ya sAH/ ma Tha ra tsan+na yaH/ oM lats+tsha n+na s+yA s+yAt+ma/ smyom+b+ha ma kI yai s+thAH/ au b+d+hag+d+ha/ yAM smASh+Ta/ smr-it+tha nA yaM s+yASh+Ta/
120a2(rgyud 'grel): oM badz+ra pA Ni ye swAhA/ oM kha gid+hA ya swAt+ma/ oM To ti gad+hA ya s+t+wa~MH/ oM ma ke shwA rU yA swAt+ma/ oM sAH ni ba ra na bi saM bi na~M s+yaid+d+ha/ oM sa man+ta b+hA rA smai s+yAd+d+ha/ oM gauHn+ni yai swAt+ma/ oM rU pa badz+ra yai swAH/
120a3(rgyud 'grel): oM nAs badz+ra s+ye s+t+waM/ oM s+ya @ts+tsha/ shASh+Tha sa s+yAt+ma/ oMd+d+hamad+hA hU~M dz+dza swe skaMtAM/ oM big+h+nAr+m+mAk+Sha ya s+yAHoM dz+nyAn+ta ku yA s+yAt+ma/ oM b+hid+hA nAT+Ta/ oM ya rmA tsa~Mk+Sha sa swAH
120a4(rgyud 'grel): de nas bzlas pa skyo ba na// mchod pa bcu dang sgeg sogs dang // chang dang bdud rtsis mchod nas ni// de nas bdud rnams tshor gcod pa'i// phreng ba'i sngags kyi bstod par bya// oM na mo badz+ra satwA ya/ na mo
120a5(rgyud 'grel): bud+d+ha b+ho d+hi sit+su Sh+TAn mo bAdz+ra bo d+hin+ma R+Sha dzi Sh+Tan mo bi shra mA tre/ na mo bud+d+he bo d+hi satwA de b+hI Sh+TaHnA mo badz+nyA nA ki nI b+h+yaHna mo b+ha gA ba te kA l+yA tsak+tA yaM/ badz+re b+hin ba dz+hik+Sha r+N+Na ya/ ma hen+da nI laM bar+N+Na shaR+Shi d+hA ya/
120a6(rgyud 'grel): ma ga d+hi d+h+r-i ya/ krAr+N+Na shi ta rag+ha tse rar+N+Na ya/ biSh+Nu k+ShA si ta kar+dz+dza ya/ nI la si ta prI taM dak+ShadaMSh+T+rA ka rA lo gra b+hi Sha Na mu khA ya/ kal+ma rak+to shi ta saM bye ta ra swan+d+ha saM/ dI da sha b+hu dzA ya?/ shaDI sha ti kA rA ya/
120b1(rgyud 'grel): khas rgya la k+Sha kyi d+hAs sa shwA sgya ga mun rbA gan pa ba shru bad+ha thAs sa e na r+dz+dza A y+ya ts+tsha r+dz+dzar+dz+dza sh+'u rAd+d+ha kAs shA Sh+TA dwa ba sh+tsa ga d+hu mAm+mA d+ha nAs rgya mamatshogasan sa
120b2(rgyud 'grel): kAn d+he muN DA mA lA ba laM bi ne/ shi ra si badz+nyA paT+Ta mu ku Te ka pA la mA lAr+d+ha tsan+na d+ha rA ya/ kuN DA la ru tsa ka kAN+Di kA me kha lA nU pU ra b+hasma ya dz+nyo pa gI ti sho ro ma Ni ma hA mu dre nA gena? dra bi b+hu ShA NA yaH/ badz+ra Da ki
120b3(rgyud 'grel): nI san to Shi dra hr-i da yA ya/ in+dag+ni yA ma nAM d+h+r-i t+ya d+yA ru Na d+hA yu/ gu bI re shwe nA prat+sA/ biSh+Nu bi nA ya ka k+Shar ti kai ya nan+ta da maur+d+ha ka lA gra ha na Sha trA k+She tra pU la/ su rin drA su ren dra pau Nin dr-i b+hU ten+na na ren rba
120b4(rgyud 'grel): saM sU ta tsa ra NA s+yA rigs drug bkod pa'i bskyod pa dang // mchog sbyin rdo rje'i bstod paso bstod// de nas mtshan phyed gtor ma sbyin// oM oM badz+ra tsan+d+ra sarba d+harma su b+h+yo shud d+hA sarba d+harma suM shrI shung d+hA
120b5(rgyud 'grel): ya swot+ma/ oM AHbadz+rI sUr+ya sarba d+harma pra bo d+hi ka sarba d+har+m+ma pra bo d+ha yA s+t+r-ihA/ oM ts+yai badz+nyA na la sarba d+ham+me pra d+hi pa ka sarba d+har+m+ma pra b+hi b+h+r-i s+yA s+yAhA/ oM ho sarba d+harma badz+rI mr-i trA ka ra sarba d+harma badz+nyA mr-i taM
120b6(rgyud 'grel): ku ru ku ru swA hA/ de ltar sngags dang phyag rgya yis// gtor ma byin rlabs zin nas ni// phyag rgya sngags kyi spyan drang bya// oM ha hU~M hiM hrI badz+ra b+hai ra bA kaR+Sha ya kar+t+r-i pra bi sha ya pra be shai ya
121a1(rgyud 'grel): ban+sa d+hA ya ban dz+nyA sa/ t+yoSha sa to las// b+h+yaH/ sarban kau nin+na hr-i da pa ts+tshar+b+hu thA phreM phaT/ derdzas maston rnams byon pa dang // wA bskyed dang srung
121a2(rgyud 'grel): byin brlabs pa'i// cho ga'i rim pa rdzogs par bya// mchod pa rnams pang gtor ma bas+ho// oM prad+d+ha// s+ye/ yA ma/ ar+g+haM/ sa sro rbe sh+tsa / in dza~M A
121a3(rgyud 'grel): sa pa ri bA d+hi b+hUHi daM ba laM/ gan d+haM/ puSh+paM/ d+hU paM/ d+hi paM/ ak+Sha taM da da ma hi te tsA ka t+ya saM pa ri bA ra shI g+h+ra mi daM ba li gr-ih+na du kha ngan+wa tu pi bran tu dzaHhU baM hoHsan tip+tA saurba
121a4(rgyud 'grel): sAtra nAM shUn+tiM puMSh+TaM rak+Sha ba rA ma gub t+taM kur ban d+hu huM hU~M phaT/ badz+ra d+ha rA dz+nyA pa ya ti s+yAt+tha/ A rA yang mchod cing bstod pa dang // yI gi brgyas phrin la so sor ba shagaswA// gtsug tor+ya du ni rtse lnga
121a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i// rdo rje ru ni gyur pa yin// phyi nas rtse mo nyes 'gyur du// gyur pa chos kyi 'khor lo'o// des ni nyis 'gyur du bsgres pa// lhan cig skyes par 'gyur ba dang // de yi yang ni gzhan nyis 'gyur//
121a6(rgyud 'grel): longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor lo dang // sprul pa yi ni 'khor lo'o// nga yi nang du rtse gcig go// mnyam pa'i bde ba'i 'bras ster ba// gsang ba'i pad ma la gnas pa// phyag rgya sgom pa'i don
121b1(rgyud 'grel): du gsungs// nyin dang mtshan mo'i dus ni// 'dod chags zang don nyid du ni// gsung gi rdo rje myang don du// sngags pa rnams la gsungs pa nyid// nyes par bya ba khon min// nyi ma sa sa'i dus
121b2(rgyud 'grel): su ni// zlas kun blang ba'i don du ste// mi 'ju ba yi rgyu ru ni// dpal gyi spyod pa dngos grub rgyur// ro bsreg gnas su mtshan mo ni// 'gro ba rtse ba'i don du min// rnal 'byor pa gang srogs
121b3(rgyud 'grel): gcod pa'i// nyin dang mtshan du byed pa na// de ni srog 'jig pa ru gsungs// sgra gang kha dang bral ba ni// snying la yod par rab gyur pa// de ni brdzun du smra ba nyid// kun mkhyen gyi
121b4(rgyud 'grel): nI ye shes sar// 'dzin pa yang ni byed pa gang // rnal 'byor par yang de gsungs so// bde ba'i thig le ma lhung ba// gzhan gyi bud med du ni 'gyur// bsten pa chags bral min pa'o//
121b5(rgyud 'grel): srog dang rtsol ba'i me yis ni// rI bod can yang zhu ba'o// btung ba chang gi btung ba'o// mthe bong tshogs nas gtsug tor du// chos kyi dbang gi 'gro ba ni// nya mthar thug pa rang gi
121b6(rgyud 'grel): sems// gtsug tor nas ni rang gi sems// yang ni 'di ni 'gro 'gyur ba// nag po'i phyogs kyi mthar thug par// rnal 'byor pa yi spyod pa des// nyi ma re re'i dus su ni// 'dod pa'i
122a1(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub rab tu ster// spyir dang 'dor ba lus tshad pa// mchog gi kha yi pad mA las// tshig myi 'byung zhing gnyid ldog pa'o// 'gul dang na dang rdul b+ha dang /
122a2(rgyud 'grel): yid ni 'khrul dang brgyal ba ni// du ba la sogs rdo rje can// de rnams gsal ba rnam pa bcu// srog can lus kyi gnas skabs so// 'jig rten 'dod pa'i gnas skyabs ni// nges pa kho nar
122a3(rgyud 'grel): gsal ba las// su zhig rgyal bar su 'dod pa// thig le dkar po'i rgyun ni gang // nyin dang mtshan mor lhung ba ni// mA mA k+Shi ni de chang ngo // go gu la sogs mig la sogs// nyi ma re re bzhin
122a4(rgyud 'grel): spros pa// bdud rtsi lha rnams bsten pa ni// rang gi rigs kyi sar song ba// lha rnams dag pa'i lus la'aM// stong pa'i sems de brtson pa yis// lhan cig skyes pa khyab byung ba//
122a5(rgyud 'grel): gnas 'jig pa seMNA~M// na gyi sbyin pa snang ba dang // bung med s+ho kyis / mi 'dzug pa ni tshul khrims s+ho// bad+hIHs+m+R+YuM sogs su 'gyu b+h+yAM/ sa kor
122a6(rgyud 'grel): sa / sa rab sems byer// de basbyin gyis sa/ gro sems ca // sa kyi ngon du /
122b1(rgyud 'grel): srid pa'i dron ni mi byed pa/ thob pa gzhan ni bzhi pa'o// // dri med blo
122b2(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer gyis ni mun pa thams cad spong bar byed pa rnams// skye bos bla ma'i 'dod pa gang zhig dang po de ni gzung bar byas nas su// bcings las
122b3(rgyud 'grel): grol 'dod de ni bdag gis des grol byas po'o// de ltar dag pa dri meng gang yin de yis rtag tu 'gro ba'i yid// dus 'khor
122b4(rgyud 'grel): zhabs zhes de la gnas pa'i go 'phang rtag tu bsam gyur cig/
122b5(rgyud 'grel): dus kyi 'khor lo'i yan lag bzhi pa'i sgrub thabs dus kyi zhabs chen pos mdzad pa rdzogs so//
123a1(rgyud 'grel): paN+Di ta bi wa shrI dang lo tsAb kyi rngo zla ba'i 'od zer gyis bsgyur ba'o//
124a1(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan rgyu skar gyi dkyor gyi sgrub thabs yan lag bsu gcig pa zhes bya ba bzhus so//
124b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ shrI nak+Sha tra maN+Da lA sA d+ha nA me ka da sAM ga nA mu/ bod skad du/ dpal ldan rgyu skar gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub thabs yan lag bcu gcig pa zhes bya ba/ dpal dge
124b2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i bshas gnyen la phyag 'tshal// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sku// nyin mor byed pa'i 'od lta bu// pad+ma rgyas pa 'dra ba'i spyan// sangs rgyas seng ge'i gdan bzhug sgra// lha yI mchog la phyag 'tshal
124b3(rgyud 'grel): nas/ rnadapal ldan dus kyi 'khor lo yi// rgyu skar dkyil 'khor sgrub thabs bri// mtshan nyid ldan pa'i gang zag gis// rgyud nas bshod pa'i gnas drag tu// rten dang yo byad bsams nas ni// dngos grub yan lag
124b4(rgyud 'grel): bcu gcig bsgom// bsrung dang kha sogs dag pa dang // bdag nyid dag bya bA dag bsrung dang // tshogs gnyis bsags dang dkyil 'khor bskyed// byin gyi brlabs dang dbang bskur dang // phra mo'i thig le'i rnal 'byor dang //
124b5(rgyud 'grel): mchod bstod rjes kyi bya ba'o// cho ga de dag re re la 'dra// cho ga dang ni ting 'dzin dang // nga rgyal bzung ba gsuM gsu mo// drang por tho rangs sngar longs nas// na mkha'i dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma'i// rol mos gnyid sado bA ru
124b6(rgyud 'grel): bsams// thal sbyor sngags 'dis phyag bya'o// oM sar+b+ba bI ra yo gi nI na maHkA ya bkr-it+ta pra Na me ban+da naM ka ra~M yA mi// de nas khams bsangs maN+Dal bya// me tog tshom bu lha grangs bzhin// sku gsung thugs kyi rten
125a1(rgyud 'grel): sa pa rnam ma ga/ smyug g+h+ra dgas / nas bya na/ sa shA d+hA
125a2(rgyud 'grel): rnas pa li// shwes kyi tshogs ban la b+h+yon+ta// dA nA~M smA lAn du rje'i stobs// bskung ba'i 'khor lo rab sbyar byas// de rje 'dzalas// skyu gas las b+h+ya / ga las 'aman
125a3(rgyud 'grel): zhig 'gyur 'di lnga the tshom med// rdo rje 'brar ba pad+ma chen po// skye shes 'byung ba'i la sogs 'dis// brjed byed la sogs bgegs kyi tshogs// gnas 'dir m+b+ha gnas gluzhan du dengs// rdo rje rnams la me dpung 'bar//
125a4(rgyud 'grel): sngags 'dis bgegs rnams sreg par byed// oM AHhuM ho he k+ShaHd+hAHhwAHhAd+har ra ra ra/ badz+dza na lo sar+b+bA bA ra Na d+ham+b+ha pra la ya s+yA b+hA da m+bA ra k+Sha yi ka bir+N+Na bi d+hA yA k+Sha d+hIn+te/ d+hA sha d+hiHtA n+tik+Sha yA bAk+tsit+tA naM/ dA ha da hA
125a5(rgyud 'grel): pA tsa pa tsa/ \u0f7fsmiM ku ru ku ru hUM hUM phaT phaT zhes pas bdud rnams bsreg par bsam/ o AHhUMr+ya badz+rA tsin+na s+thAng+ku rA duk+Sha wAg+h+na ya/ k+ShA ya b+hAk+Sh+mIt+t+ra dz+nyA na b+hU k+Sha raM ku ru kU ru s+yAh+nA/ zhes pas sna tshogasu rdo rje yis// bdag nyid s+yA dung
125a6(rgyud 'grel): rtsig pa bzhi/ steng du mnga' yo dra ba ni// tho rangs grib ma'i bar du bsgom// yang na gnams 'byor paro// i tsu paM sha k+Sha ya badz+ra kU r+tha bA ra~M ku ru ku ru swAhA/ zhes pas maM dpung ra ba bsgom// oM hrI sA rA dzA la badz+ra kA sha bo te dza
125b1(rgyud 'grel): drAg+h+nak+Sh+ma pr-i thi bi badz+ra swA b+hA ba pawAr+d+ha d+ha b+hA badz+ra maN+Da la nI ku ru ku ru swAhA/ 'byung ba lnga brtsegs gyur pa las// ra ba sum ldan gzhal yas khang // dbus 'a l-i rtsibs brkyang bsam// oM bAHbi shwa badz+rA pAr+b+ba ku ru ku ru s+yAd+d+ha/
125b2(rgyud 'grel): oM raHbadz+ra sUr+ya badz+ra sUr+ya sa naM ku ru ku ru swA hA/ zhes pas gdan rnams bsdam par bya// oM huM kro d+hen+do hA kro d+hA nA mAdz+nyA dA ya ka swAhA/ dbusu rdo rje shugs khro bo// 'chung par 'gyur bar bdag nyid bsam// oM hi badz+ra kr-i d+hA rA dza
125b3(rgyud 'grel): mahA uSh+NI Shau d+hA di shi raSh+TaM ku ru ku ru swA hA/ oM yai badz+ra kro d+ha rA dzA ti ba la big+h+nAnu ka pUrbangi shI rat+naM ku ru ku ru s+yA hAM/ oM r-i badz+ra kro d+ha rA dz+ha dzaM b+ha ka duSh+Ta pra dz+nyAn+ta ka dASh+Ti dwi shi ra ShaM ku ru ku ru swA hA/ au waM badz+ra kro d+ha rA dza ma na kra bI rA
125b4(rgyud 'grel): ga pad+mAn+ta kaut+ta ra di shi rak+ShaM ku ru ku ru swAh+ma/ au laM badz+dza kro d+hA rA dza stam+b+ha ka ya mAn+ni ka pash+tsi ma ngi shi raSh+TaM ku ru ku ru sAhA/ au wAHbadz+dza kro d+ha rA dza ma hA bai la bAM yU byaM ngi shI r+yaSh+TaM ku ru ku ru s+yAMhAM/ au wAHbadz+ra kro d+ha rA dzA tsa le shAn+di
125b5(rgyud 'grel): shi rat+taM ku ru ku ru swAhA/ A rAHbadz+dzi kro d+ha rA dza Ta krI ne rit+taM ngi shI rASh+TaM ku ru ku ru swAhA/ au yaHbadz+ra kro d+ha rA dza nI la dAstA Ag+ne stAM bI shI raSh+TaM ku ru ku ru swAhA/ au hAMHbadz+ra kro d+ha R+Sha dzi sr-i b+hU d+hau daM shi rak+ShAM ku ru ku ru s+yAt+tha/ sngar gyi rdo rje
125b6(rgyud 'grel): shus po byos // po'i bu mi mi mas// khro bo chungs sa na no/ bye pa phyog su gang mangs pa/ hU~M'i ts+tsha mu hU~M s+ho/ 'i na thong po'i 'dul gro thubs kyi byo la sug N+Di N+Dit+ya d+hu
126a1(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin phyogs skyong brgya sang s+ho// klusu gyur ba'i rlung du bsgyud// ga r+b+ha dzo d+d+hon+dar+b+hu bu b+hUts+tshing+ku/ de bzhin bza' bcu smras nas m+b+ha/ ngas phyi rol dkod la bsrung // ga R+Sha tsha bi Sh+Ti pu b+hU b+h+r-i thAM/ de bzhin/
126a2(rgyud 'grel): klu rgyal bcu yang spro// sU yi ra ba'i nang du bsrung // kaMk+Sha tsa~M tsI dz+dza ts+tsha pu thu tshi trA~M/ 'byung po bcu yang skyes nus ni// de I phyi rol bsrung bar bya'o// oM sar+b+ba tA thA ga ta raN tsak+Shu swa b+hA thAt+ma ko&haM/ sngags kyi nga rgyal bzung bar
126a3(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// bsrung ba'i 'khor lor yan lag ste dang po'o// / bdud rtsi lnga dang stobs lnga yi// ri lu s+yan chung tshang tsam byA// ye raM kaM go ku da ha na bI mu me rA shu/ rlung mye thod par bcu po bsam//
126a4(rgyud 'grel): oM badz+ra tsan+da sar+b+ba d+har+m+ma su bi shud+d+haHswa b+hA ba sarba d+harman+di sho d+ha ya swA hA/ zla ba oM gyi dag par bya// oM AHsUr+yA sar+b+ba d+har+m+ma pra bo d+ha ka sar+b+ba d+har+m+man+na bau d+hA ya swA hA/ nyi ma AHyi 'od kyi spel/ oM huM badz+nyA na la sar+b+ba d+har+m+ma pra di pha
126a5(rgyud 'grel): kA sar+b+ba d+har+m+ma nA pra dI pi ka ya swA hA/ sgra gats+tshan hUM gi 'bar bar bya// oM hau sarba d+har+m+ma badz+rA mr-i tra kA ru sar+b+ba d+har+m+ma nA badz+rA mr-i ta ku ru ku ru swA hA/ dus me haM yAM sAM bdud rtsir bsam// rang nyid lce rtse hUM yig las// rdo rje gyur te 'od 'phros pas//
126a6(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi bkug ste myangs par bsams// oM sar+b+ba bI ra yo gi nai pra Na yA mi swA hA/ gtsug tor steng du ba~M las ni// zla ba'i gdan la rdo rje dkar// baM gi mtshon pa zhi rgyas la// las gzhan dag la nye sogs sbyar// oM AHhuM haM/
126b1(rgyud 'grel): haM NA pradz+nyo pA ya/ At+ma ka k+Sha ya b+hUk+ShIt+ta dz+nyA na/ a d+hi pa ti/ ma mAk+tA ya b+huk+Shit+ta badz+rI badz+ri mr-i taM swA b+hA baM/ ku ru ku ru kan+d+ha d+hA tu/ yA ta nAM niHswa b+hA baM s+yAt+tha/ rdo rje la sogs zhu ba'i chus// lus kyi dri ma thams cad dor// zhi
126b2(rgyud 'grel): zla ba lta bur dkar la rig par bsgom// las gzhan rang rang kha dog go// sA d+hA Te shud+d+ha/ s+yAr+b+ba d+har+m+ma swa b+hA ba/ des drug pa'i nga rgyal bya'o// kha la sogs pa dag par bya ba'i yan lag ste gnyis pa'o//
126b3(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid dus 'khor zhal gcig pa// phyag gnyis yum dang ldan pa yi// dpral bAr oM las mtha' yas bsam// mgrin par AHlus rin byung bsam// snying gar hUM las don yod grub// lte bar ho las rnam
126b4(rgyud 'grel): snang mdzad// gtsug tor haM lasA mi bskyod pa// gsang baR+Sha DA les rdo rje sems// rigs drug po ni dgod par bya// a i r-i u l-i a e ar o al ha ya ra la waM la/ lag g.yon sor mo'i tshogs gsum
126b5(rgyud 'grel): lA'o// lU lpA R+Sha sA NA/ Al oM Ar+ya aM A/ l-I U r-I I A/ g.yas pa'i sor tshigs gsum la dgod// oM hraHsar+b+bAstA ra/ dz+nyA mA ra kre shUn+ta ka ra/ badz+ra tiSh+Tha duHkha tshe da mA ma ka rA bi shud+d+ha ya swA hA/ lcag
126b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i yi ge rdo rjer 'gyur// oM AHhuM ho haM k+ShaHk+Sha ya bIk+tsir+N+Na d+hi pi ti/ badz+ra kA ya ma ma kA ya bAk+tsit+ta dz+nyA na badz+ra badz+ra kA ya swa b+ha bi ku ru ku ru swA hA/ mdzes pa'i phyag rgya kun tu reg/ rdo rje'i rang bzhin lu suM bsam// oM sarba
127a1(rgyud 'grel): ta thA g+hAt+yA dz+nyA \u0f7f la sa thA rmAd+hak+ShaSh+ThAn+tu/ mdza'i lus cing rgyal bya'o// bdag drug par bya ba'i yan lag ste gsum pa'o// / de nas lhag b+ha sbrul sbyar te// oM t+t+ra hring ya nas/
127a2(rgyud 'grel): oM ts+tshu shi rA si wa shuT/ s+t+r-i s+t+raM shi kha yU wa shaT/ oM hUM ka pyA tsA ya d+h+waM/ au hU Ne d+b+ha bo Sh+yAT/ A~M t+maHany+dzA ya phaT/ go cha dang ni mtshon tshwa'o// oM sarba ta thA ga ta tri da ya shi ra si si khar+Noka pa tsa ne trASh+TaM badz+ra sha nU ga
127a3(rgyud 'grel): swa b+hA bAt+ma ko&haM/ zhes pa'i sngags kyi nga rgyal bya'o// go cha'i yan lag ste bzhi pa'o// rang gi snying gare paM las ni// pad+ma a las zla ba'i steng // hUM las rdo rje rtse lnga pa// 'od zer lnga ldan phyogs bcur spro// bla ma dkyil
127a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor rgyal sras rnams// spyan drangs mdun gyi mkha' la bzhugs// 'od zer slar la snying gar bsdu// zla dkyil ka sogs sde tshon drug/ ring thung brtsegs pa bcu gnyis las// mchod rdzas lha mo gyur pa spro// oM ts+tsha badz+ra gAn+d+he
127a5(rgyud 'grel): gar+b+ha a tsa nAM ku ru ku ru s+yAn+ta/ oM ts+tshi badz+ra ma le mA lAr+dz+dza naM ku ru ku ru s+yAhA/ oM r+N+Na badz+ra d+hu bi d+hU b+hAH ni ku ru ku rU s+yAt+tha/ o n+d+ha badz+ra pra d+hi pre pa d+hi b+hUrtsa naM ku ru ku ru sAt+ma/ o b+hU badz+ra mr-i te naM bid+ya b+hU dzaM ku ru ku ru sAt+ma/ d+d+hi au
127a6(rgyud 'grel): badz+rI Sha te k+Sha ti pa lArtsa na~M ku ru d+d+h+r-i ku ru swAhA/ oMD+D+h+ya badz+ra la s+yai sab+hA b+ha ra NaSh+TaMpu dzAM ku ruM ku ru swAhA/ oM d+b+ha badz+ra ha s+ye D+h+we g+haN nA dadra pU dz+nye ku ru ku ru swAhA/ oM b+hU badz+rar+b+hi grA d+ya wa d+ya pU dzA ku ru ku ru swAt+ma/
127b1(rgyud 'grel): oMm+b+ha badz+ra nr-i t+ye nr-i d+hA b+hU d+h+r-i k+sha ru ku ru s+yAt+ma/ oM s+thA badz+rA gI te kI d+hu b+hu d+h+r-i ku r+yA ku ru sUd+d+ha/ oM s+thA badz+ra ka me sar+b+ba b+hUd+b+ha bau d+hI swA tA n+tak+Sho d+hA din+na badz+ra su ra ta b+hU trAM ku ru ku ru swAt+ma// sna tshogs mchod pa byas te sdig pa rnam pa mang
127b2(rgyud 'grel): bshags bgyis la/ bsgrub pa po r+g+haM sa ni lus dang ngag dang yod dang pos gsu stAM mya la gus mchi byed ba / rdzogs sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' sna tshogs dge ba gang byas pa'i dge 'dun dang de drug
127b3(rgyud 'grel): kun+da la rje su yi rang nas ni sdig bral byang chub skyo nyid la rjesu 'jug/ sangs rgyas rnams la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul zhing mya ngan mi 'da' bzhugs par gsol/ sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun srid pa'i
127b4(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs 'joms dag la byang chub bar du skyabasu mchi/ 'dir ni sems can don phyir rdzogs pa'i byang chub bdag 'gyur smon lam gdab par bgyi/ bsod nams rtsa ba gsum sogs dran// ye shes tshogs ni stong nyid
127b5(rgyud 'grel): bsgom// phyi dang snod bcud thams cad ni// dngos dang bral bas stong pa nyid// rgyu la 'das pas mtshan ma myed// 'bras bu med pas smon pa med// skye 'gags med pas 'dus ma byas// oM shU n+yA tA dz+nyA nA badz+ra swa b+hA bAt+ma
127b6(rgyud 'grel): ko&haM/ oM a ni mi ta dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA bAt+ma ko&haM/ oM a pr-i Ni hi ta dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA bAt+ma ko&haM/ oM a ma b+hi saM swA ba dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA bAt+ma ko&haM/ rang nyid thugs mtshan yi ge sogs thig le'i bdag nyid skar
128a1(rgyud 'grel): mda' bsgrim/ rim pas bsdus d+hu 'dzin sde ga/ su chu me rlung na mkhyu'i khams// rang bzhin dathugs pas yul dang bral// kun ga nAm+b+ha shes 'od grus lta bu sgom// oM sar+b+ba t+yA thA g+h+ra r+dz+dza /
128a2(rgyud 'grel): NAdz+nyA nA badz+ras d+d+ha rmAH ko / de yi rgyal bzung ba d+ha / tshogs gnas ng+yas gas pa'i yan+d+ra lcag ste sna/ de nas sto nyid du nga las // Ni stengs sna tshogs rdorje dang // ngo rdzo
128a3(rgyud 'grel): gung rtsi bas brgya s+ho// lte bdu a las chos 'byung // d+hI d+d+ha/ d+hA rad+h+waM/ b+h+yaHhUM/ b+h+rUM sa d+d+ha/ d+hum / k+ShaM hUM/ ts+tsha/ rlung gnag zlum po rgyal mtshan can// me dmar gru gsum gra yu byung mtshan// chu drA/
128a4(rgyud 'grel): zlub po pad+mas mtshan// saM gser gru bzhi 'a tshanA~M// de drug snying ring 'og tu ya // sna tshogs 'irgyu gra mo// de stengs lhun po kha khyor lhan// nyi nA bad+d+ha sgra gcan bcas// de steng oM mam zlam sa ni/
128a5(rgyud 'grel): gzhul sgyus ldang brdugs mchod rten ni// rang bani rnon gru bzhi ni// rin chen snam bu phru gu dang // dru ba dri phyung mnga' yab dang // sgo dang hU~M babs bcu gnyis dang // gsum dang lnga po gnyis// sku gsung thugs kyi
128a6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo'o// snying po ye shes 'dab ma dag/ rdo rje phreng bas bskor ba'o// phyi ma thugs kyi dkyil 'khor lo// pang sogs ka ba bcu drug dang // chu skyes rdo rje rabs mdzes// lha yi snam bu dag gis bskor// de nas
128b1(rgyud 'grel): gsung gi dkyil 'khor la// chu skyes 'dab ma brgyad pa brgyad// pad+ma'i phreng bas yongasu bskor// phyi rol sku yi dkyil 'khor la// bang 'dab bzhi brgyad bcu drug pa// bcu gnyis 'khor lo'i phreng bas bskod//
128b2(rgyud 'grel): rol gling ni bcu gnyis dang // nyi ma dang ni zla ba dang // chos kyi 'khor lo bum pa che// rnga bo che dang byang chub shing // rdo rje 'bar ba'i phreng bas bskor// dbus kyi pad+ma lte ba'i steng // zla ba nyi ma sgra gcan dang // bdud dang
128b3(rgyud 'grel): drug po yab yum dang // bdud ni gdong cig kha dog dmar// lag bzhi mnga' dang lcags kyu g.yas// g.yon pa gzhu dang zhags pa 'dzin// yum ni dga' mo dang bcas g.yas// drag po gdong gsum mdog dmar
128b4(rgyud 'grel): poHg.yon pa thod pa khA b+h+rUM 'dzin// dbu mA'i yum bcus gson du gdeng // de stengs mngon par byang chub pa// a i raM/ u le/ a a al o a la/ ha ya ra wa la aM AHswa d+ha rA yA hA/ Al/
128b5(rgyud 'grel): a sAr/ kr-I yA d+h+waM I AM/ zla ba yi ge mtshon pa steng // me 'ong ye shes dang bi'o// Al+lA/ y+Ya/ d+hartA/ we wA/ \u0f7fswad+d+ha/ srAk+thaSh+TA rban+tha/ d+har+dz+dza dzat+tAn+na/ pra thA b+hU r+d+ha smA/ D+hAD+hA nar+d+hartA/ ts+tshar+m+maH
128b6(rgyud 'grel): dz+dza!/ ga khA g+ha g+h+rA \u0f7f/ da b+ha ga kha ka/ !dz+ha dza tsha tsa/ Na D+ha Da dza Ta ma b+ha ba pa pa/ na d+ha da tha ta/ na shaM Sha thA sa/ la ba ra yaM ha/ la pa ya NaD+hi/ mayi ge mtshan pa 'ag/ mam nyiyaM she sa gnyis
129a1(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// bar du dri za'i ye ge hUM/ so sor rtog pa gsum pa'o// hrI yig gcig gyur rdo rjer gyur// bya grub ye shes bzhi pa'o// phaT kyi sha chas yongasu rdzogs// chos dbyings ye shes lnga pa'o//
129a2(rgyud 'grel): gtso bo sku mdog sngon po la// kha dog phyogs pani ngag tu gsungs// zhal bzhi phyag ni nyer bzhi pa// mgrin gsum zhabs gnyis brkyang bzhugs pa// dbus zhal mthing ga mche gtsegs drag/ g.yas pa dmar po
129a3(rgyud 'grel): chags pa che// glayon pa dkar po zhi ba'i zhal// rgyu ba ni ser po ting 'dzin bzhugs// ral pa'i ther tshugs bcu gnyis spyan// sna tshogs rdo rje zla phyed dang // rdo rje sems dpa' dbu brgyan pa'o// glang chen stag lpags na
129a4(rgyud 'grel): daza' can// mgrin gsum gnag dmar dkar po'o// dpung pa drug ni sngo dmarar+ya dkar// phyag dar bcu gnyis de bzhi no// phyag mgo nyi shu rtsa bzhi ni// gnapa dmar+ya dkar po'i rim pa bzhin// mthe bong la sogs sor mo bcu//
129a5(rgyud 'grel): ser dkar dmar gnag snga rims bzhin// tshigs kyi phreng ba sngo dmar dkar// rdo rje ral gri rtse gsum dang // gri gug mda'o dang lcags kyu dang // Da ru tho ba 'khor lo mdung // dbyug pa dgra sta g.yas pas 'dzin// dril bu
129a6(rgyud 'grel): phub dang kha T+wAM ga/ thod pa gzhu dang zhags pa dang // rin chen pad dkar dung dang ni// me long lcags sgrog tshangs mgo g.yon// cod pan snyan cha mgul rgyan dang // gdu bu dpung rgyan ska rogs dang // zhabs gdub rnams ni
129b1(rgyud 'grel): rdorjes brgyan// mgo bo'i phreng ba po shal dang // thal ba phreng ba gtsug nor bu// bu chen bcu yis de bzhin brgyan// g.yon dkar g.yas dmar 'arkyang ba'i zhabs// yum ser zhal bzhi phyag brgyad ma// g.yas pa/
129b2(rgyud 'grel): g.yon dmar rgyab zhal gnag/ gri gug lhagas+t+ya g+h+ya TA mA ru// phreng ba g.yas pas 'dzin pa mdzad// thod pa zhags pa pad+ma dang // rin chen nor bu g.yon na 'dzin// rgyan rnams gtso bo ngag dang mthun// g.yon brkyang gtso
129b3(rgyud 'grel): sku la 'khyud// de nas 'khor lo drug po la// oM AHhUM ho haM k+ShaHdgod// de nas 'gro drug sems can rnams// bkug nas dkyil 'khor de lnga gzhug/ yA ba yum mkha' gsang byin brlabs te// snyoms 'jug sgra yis
129b4(rgyud 'grel): rnam snang sogs// nang du bkug nas bzhugs par bsam// ya ba yum byang chub sems kyis ni// b+ha gar de la dbang bskur bya// sems can de rnams dkyil 'khor lha// zhal gausum phyag drug so gsu gyur// thabs dang
129b5(rgyud 'grel): shes rab gnyis med pa'i// mchog dga'i bde bas gang bar bsam// Du D+hi ShAM N+yo kl-i/ DA k+Shi k+Shau k+Sh+ya k+ShaM/ Da k+She k+Shar k+Sh+ya k+Sha la NAMHk+Sha NaM k+Sha ra wau ShA la k+ShaM/ k+tar+b+ba ShA TA T+ra/ D+hA r+yANA d+hA nA/ de sogs lus kyi dkyil 'khor lha// phyung la
129b6(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gzhug par bya// spyi mgrin snying gar oM AHhUM/ gtsug tor haM bsams lte ba ru// ho las gtu mo ye shes 'di // rab 'bar gtso bo yab yum gnyis// bde chen 'od du zhu ba las// tshad med bzhi yi lha mi'i
130a1(rgyud 'grel): glus// 'gro ba'i don du gzhengs pas bskul// spyan mA bdag ni 'gro ba'i ma// rnal 'byor pa yi rgyu mthun gnas// bdag gi dkyil 'khor rang bzhin gyis// dus 'khor gzhengs la bdag chags
130a2(rgyud 'grel): mdzod// bdag ni srin mo mA ma k+Shi/ rnal 'byor pa yi rnam smin gnas// bdag gi dkyil 'khor rang bzhin gyis// dus 'khor gzhengs la bdag chags mdzod// gos dkar bdag ni bu mo ste// rnal 'byor pa yi skyes bu'i
130a3(rgyud 'grel): gnas// bdag gi dkyil 'khor rang bzhin gyis// dus 'khor bzhengs la bdag cag mdzod// sgrol ma bdag ni che mo ste// rnal 'byor pa yi dri meng gunas// bdag gi dkyil 'khor rang bzhin gyis// dus 'khor
130a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhengs la bdag chags mdzod// lha mos klu mdzad bcom ldan khyod// sems can+da kun la phan mdzad pa// rdo rje can gyis bdag bsrungs mdzod// lha mo'i bla mas 'dod can 'dod pa mdzad don bzhengs// de ltar
130a5(rgyud 'grel): bskul bya gasman nas ni// chos sku stong pa'i rang bzhin las// mig 'phrul lta bu bzhengs mdzad// hUM paM spro zhing bskul bas zhu// rdo rje dang ni gri gug hU~M du gyur// de bzhin gtso bo yab yum bzhengs// de nas 'khor
130a6(rgyud 'grel): kyigyi lha spro'i phyir// rdo rje pad+mar byin brlabs la// thabs dang shes rab snyoms 'jug sgras// chos kyi dbyings nas sangs rgyas rnams// bkug la yab kyi zhal du thim// b+ha ga gnas rgyud yum gyi ni// pad+mar zhugs te
130b1(rgyud 'grel): b+ha g+har brgyud// yum gyi zhal nas yab zhal du// zhugs nas yab kyi rdo rje nas// sa bon yum gyi pad+ma ru// yi ge spros nas phyogs phyogs gnas// de nas phyag mtshun de lngas sku// de la phyir spros gdan la
130b2(rgyud 'grel): dgod// a dang rdo rje las gyur pa// mi skyong zhal gsum phyag drug s+ho// spros nas slar yang gci la thim// rdo rje dbyings phyug sku mdog sngo// spros nas slar yang gtso bor thim// snying po so shos 'khor lo yi/
130b3(rgyud 'grel): chu skyes 'dab brgyad zla ba'i steng // a A/ aM aHha hA/ haM hAHlha mo zhal bzhi phyag brgyad de// shar du nug mo 'bar ma ste// sku dang mdun gyi zhal mdun gnag/ g.yas dmar g.yon dkar rgyab ser zhal/
130b4(rgyud 'grel): spos dang tsan dran gur gum snod// bla ba ga bur ldan snod g.yas// dril bu pad+ma lha shing gi/ me tog dang ni phreng ba g.yon// nub tu ser 'bar mdun zhal ser// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar rgyab sngo zhal/
130b5(rgyud 'grel): dung drang nor bu gling bu dang // Da mA ru ni phyag g.yas na// pi wang rgyud mangs dang ni mda'// dril bu 'khrol dang ra dang g.yon// byang du dkar 'bar dbus zhal dkar// g.yas gnag g.yon ser rgyab zhal dmar//
130b6(rgyud 'grel): 'o ma'i snod dang chu snod dang // lha'i sman dong chang snod g.yas// bdud rtsi'i snod dang grub pa'i bcud // a ru ra dang 'bras zan g.yon// lho ru dmar 'bar dbus zhal dmar// g.yas ser g.yon sngo rgyab dkar zhal/
131a1(rgyud 'grel): mar me mu tig do shal dang // cod pan gdu bu phyag g.yas na// na bza' dang ni sku regs dang // rna cha dang ni rkang rgyan g.yon// shar lhor du ba nag mo dang // nub byang mar me ser mo dang //
131a2(rgyud 'grel): byang shararA mkha' gsal dkar mo dang // lho nub mig rgyu dmar po bzhi// zhal ni phyogs bzhi'i lha mo mtshungs// phyag brgyad thams cad rnga yab bsnams// mnyam brkyang ba yi stabasngo kyi bzhugs// rdo rje skyil
131a3(rgyud 'grel): mo krung gi yag/ yum ni pad+ma'i bzhugs stabaso// mtshams kyi gru chang bzhi dag la// oM AHhuM ho/ chos kyi dung dkar byang shar du// graN+DI dmar po lho nub mtshams// shar lhor yid bzhin nor bu gnag/
131a4(rgyud 'grel): dpag bsam shing ser byang nub po// 'dod ma log ma bdun cu gnyis// phyogs na bco brgyad 'gying bag can// 'khyud pa'i stobs kyis phyag sbrel nas// kha khyer la gnas mchod par byed// de nas thugs kyi pad+ma la//
131a5(rgyud 'grel): phyogs la nyi ma gdan ngag la// i ri/ u li/ shar du don yod grub pa gnag/ lho ru rin chen 'byung ldan dmar// byang du snang ba mtha' yas drakar// nub tu rnam par snang mdzad ser// mtsham su zla ba'i gdan dgra
131a6(rgyud 'grel): liHI rI U lI/ shar lhor sgrol ma nag mo ste// lho nub gos dkar mo ni dmar// byang shar mA ma kI ni dkar// byang nub sangs rgyas spyan ni ser// rdo rje skyil mo krung gi yab// yum ni pad+ma'i bzhugs stabaso//
131b1(rgyud 'grel): hihI hr-i trU~M hu hU~M hU~M trA~M hUM hraHde rnams par brgyad bum pa brgyad// steng 'og gnyis drang bum+b+ha dgar bcu'o// skyo bzhi nyi ma'i gdan dag la// ya raM waM laM/ yaHraHwu lashar du dgegs dgra brtson 'grus
131b2(rgyud 'grel): gnag/ lho sgo de shes rab dzam+b+ha dmar// byung du pad+ma nga rgyal dkar// nub tu gra shrIn d+hu rengs ma sar// khro bo g.yas brkyad khro bo bzlog/ khyams la sems dpa'u nyi ma'i gdan// a I Ar oM al aM
131b3(rgyud 'grel): shar smang na mkha'i snying po gnag/ shar stong kun tu bzang po s+ho// lho smyud sa'i snying po dam+bAr// byang smang sbyin ras gzigs dbang dkar// nub smad sgrib pa rnam sel ser// lho stong phyag na rdo rje sngo// sems ma rnams la
131b4(rgyud 'grel): zla ba'i gdun// A oM Ar oM Al aM/ byang stong sgra yi rdo rje ljang // shar lhor reg gi rdo rje gnag/ lho nub ro yi rdo rje dmar// byang shar gzugs kyi rdo rje dkar// nub byang dri'i rdo rje ser// nub stong chos dbyings
131b5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sngo// de rnams zhal dang phyag mtshan ni// dbus sngo g.yas dmar g.yon dkar zhal// rdo rje gri gug dgra sta g.yas// dril bu thod pa tshangs mgo g.yon// dbus gnag g.yas dmar g.yon ser zhal// ral gri gri
131b6(rgyud 'grel): gug rtse gsum g.yas// phub dang thod pa kha T+wAM g.yon// dbus dmar g.yas dkar g.yon gnag zhal// mda' dang cang te'u lcags kyu g.yas// gzhu dang zhags pa rin chen g.yon// dbus dgar g.yas gnas
132a1(rgyud 'grel): g.yon dmar zhalnga// tho ba mdung dang rtse gA sum+b+ha g.yas// pad+ma me long phreng ba g.yon// dbus srer+ya g.yas drukaR+Sha gasmon sto zhal// 'khor lo dbyug pa rdo rje g.yas// dung dang lcags sgrog dril bu
132a2(rgyud 'grel): g.yon// yab yum yul la bsam pra ni// 'du byed gzugs ni gnyis med yab yum ste// 'du shes tshor ba de bzhi no// sna dang dri yin mig dang gzugs// lha dang ra yin reg drang lus// rna ba sgra yin sems dang
132a3(rgyud 'grel): chos// bgegs mthar byed dang rengs byed dang // shes rab mthar byeng nga rgyal can// pad+ma mthar byang rmugs byed ma// gi shin rje mthar byed brtson 'grus ma// yab bzhugs dA ru yum 'khyud cing // yum bzhug
132a4(rgyud 'grel): sa ru yab 'khyud pa'o// kha khyer mchod pa'i lha mo dang // 'dod lha bdun cu rtsa gnyis// de nas gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi// shar gyi ro stengs pad+ma la// hA hI ya yAM hai yu AM ying // dbusu rgan byed pad

132a6(rgyud 'grel): kha T+wAM g.yon na'o// shar lho mkha' lding pad+ma la// k+ShA k+ShI yA yA s+t+r-i k+ShI yU y+m+R+YuM yAHlte bar khyab 'jug pad+ma la// dpal ldan sgyu ma grags mau la// dpal mo dpal rgyal rnam rgyal mo// rgyal byed dpal ldan 'khor
132b1(rgyud 'grel): oMson+dan// nag mo 'khor lo dbyug zo g.yas// pad+ma dung ni gu yon na'o// lho ru ma he pad+ma'i steng // hah+ne rai R+R-i hU~M ru rmA r+ya/ lte byar phag mo 'dab ma la// keng rus drus mtshan rab khro'i gdong // dus kyi lce ma
132b2(rgyud 'grel): gtsigs ma dang // dus mA mi bzang lus nganA ma// dmar mo dbyug pa ral gri g.yas// mdung thung lcags kyu g.yon na'o// lho nub rma bya pad stengs na// k+ShAHkr-I rA rIn+tau b+h+r-i d+hAr+m+ma rAHlte bar gzhon nu ma 'dab ma/
132b3(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma lus meng gzhonu ma// rI ngags bdag 'gro rin chen phreng // mig bzangs rul ma bzang mos bskor// dmar mo mdung thung lcags kyu g.yas// rin chen zhigs pa g.yon ni'o// byang du khyu mchog pang stengasu//

132b5(rgyud 'grel): thugs g.yon nu'o// shar seng ge pad+ma'i steng // NaM Tu b+h+rUM b+h+rU~M lpA rtsa lU ts+tsha wAHdbus dpral chen 'dab ma la// phar dpal zla ba'i ri mo dang // zla zhal dang mdog 'dzin ma dang // pad+ma'i dbang phyug sgrol mo'i
132b6(rgyud 'grel): mig/ dri meng ri bong 'dzin mas bskor// dkar mo pad+ma bgrang 'phreng ga yas// g.yon na me tog rim chen mo// nub tu glang chen pad+ma'i steng // hA tAM lA lI/ r-I hU~M lU lA~M laM/ lte bar dbang po 'dab ma la// rdo rje'i 'od dang
133a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje'i lus// gsar spyan ma dang 'dod dbang ma// ri mo 'bri dang rtsom ma dang // zug rngu mang ma sgrol ma bzang // ser mo rdo rje mnga' ni g.yas// dril bu gzhu ni g.yon na'o// byang nub dad+ma pa
133a2(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma'i steng // k+ShA smr-i la l-I b+h+r-i lu l+lI lAMHlte bor tshangs ma 'dab mA la// gtsang sbra ma dang pad+ma'i mig/ chu skyes can dang blo gros ma// dag dab gru ma klog dAn ma// sar mo pad+ma dbyug pa g.yas// sbrul dang phu ba ni gasno

134a1(rgyud 'grel): brgya byin dri rdo d+he/ nadz+ha rje sogs sum+b+ha nu po// sgren po g.yas pa rdo rje mda'// dri lta bu gan+d+ha ni g.yon nu'o// nub byung dru pa pad+ma'i steng // d+hAdz+dzid+d+hi d+hA d+hA d+hAb+hU k+Shak+Sh+ma b+hArmAHSh+Tad+hAd+hid+hIr+N+Nad+hIH/ d+hA d+hIt+tAd+d+had+hA r+m+mAnats+tshib+h+yaH

134a3(rgyud 'grel): khu wa~M khaM/ ka ki kr-i kukl-i kaM/ lte bar khyab 'jug dri dze r+d+ha/ da rdo rje sogs sum cu po// sngon po 'khor lo dbyug tho ga yA sa// pad+ma lnga skyes dung ni g.yon// lho stong ma he pad+ma'i steng // kA k+Shi R+R-i Tu mA~M k+ShaHkhA lpo Sh+To khyA A~M khyAHg+h+ra g+ni g+h+nAM g+hA kr-I g+hA
134a4(rgyud 'grel): prA d+hI b+h+r-i k+Sh+ma nA~M k+Sh+ma/ d+hA d+h+r-i d+b+ha d+hA dz+r-IM d+haHlte ba ga shin rje dri rdo rje/ ka rdo rje sogs sum cu po// sngon po dbyug pa ral gri g.yas// lcags sgrog zhags pa g.yon na'o// byang stong khyu mchog pad+ma'i steng // wa ni d+h+r-i nu dz+nyA na/

134a6(rgyud 'grel): mA sI swA swA s+t+waM sngar khA ba~M bA~M thA b+h+rU~M k+Sha/ A Sh+Ti dz+dza Sh+T+r-iSh+ThashA hrI n+do shU g+ne shA~M nA nI nA~M d+h+wa d+hA rmAHlte bar gnod sbyir rje ro rje/ sa so yis rdo rje sum cu po// sngon po rin chen po con g.yas// ne ru mi rgyal pa badrug yon// rdo gyil
