137a1(rgyud 'grel): 'chang ba// mi phyed rdo rje gsum gyi dngos// deng bdag byin gyis brlabs na su// gsung gi rdo rje mdzad du gsol// phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sngangs rgyas rnams// rdo rje mi phyed gsum gyi bdag/ deng bdag
137a2(rgyud 'grel): byin gyis brlabs nasu// gsung gi rdo rje mdzad du gsol// mgrin par nyi ma AHdmar bsgom// snying khar sgra gtsun+da cho ga gsum// thugs kyi rdo rje yab yum bskyed// dbus gnag g.yas dmar g.yon dkar zhal/
137a3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje 'khor lo pad+ma g.yas// dril bu rin chen ral gri gAyon// sgro bsdu sngar bzhin gsol ba gdab// oM a b+hi Shiny+tsa Tu maM tsit+taM badz+ri na/ sngar bzhin dbang bskur thugs kar bzhugs// dpal ldan rdo rje thugs 'chang
137a4(rgyud 'grel): ba/ mi phyed rdo rje gsum gyis dngos// deng bdag byin gyis brlabs na su// thugs kyi rdo rje mdzad du// phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// rdo rje mi phyed gsum gyi bdag/ deng bdag byin gyis brlabs na su//
137a5(rgyud 'grel): thugs kyi rdo rje mdzad du gsol// thugs kar sgra gcan na hUM nag bsgom// de nas gsum la rigs drug ste// lte bu gsang ba gtsug tor du// ka hoHswa ha ni dgod par bya// 'khor rnams la yang de bzhino// oM sar+b+ba ta thA
137a6(rgyud 'grel): oM.A ya bA k+tsit+ta badz+ra swa b+ha bAt+ma ko&ha~M/ zhes pas rgyal bzung bar bya'o// byin gyis brlabs pa'i yan lag ste bdun pa'o// thugs pa'i hUM gi 'od zer gyis// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor
137b1(rgyud 'grel): mdun du bzhugs// oM hUM hUM hUM hU~M hu~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/ oM A I d+h+r-i U lAM badz+ra nA kr-i n+yo badz+rA mr-i ta g+ha Te rU b+hi Shiny+tsaM tu maM swAh+na/ oM aM ai ri uM l-i sarba bud+d+haHbadz+ra mu ku tsa ma ma pAny+tsa bud+d+har+dz+dzak+ShaM ban+d+ha yan+du hUM hUM phaT/ oM a A aM a
137b2(rgyud 'grel): hUMhU~M ha~MHpheM ho sarba pA ra ma ta ma~M ma badz+rI pa T+wAM ban+d+ha yan+tu hu~M hUM phaT/ oM d+hI hau d+h+r-i ne bidz+nyA na swa b+hA be kA ru N+yai pradz+nyA d+h+r-i kaM badz+ra badz+ra g+har+N+Na sa h+ye ta ra kA ra yaurma ma badz+ra satwa/ sa pradz+nyo da~M darbu hU~M hUM phaT/ oM ai A/ e aM/ ar Ar/
137b3(rgyud 'grel): oM au/ a la Al/ AM aHsarba b+ho d+hi satwaHswa b+hAR+YA/ sarba karmo pa b+ho ga badz+ra pa taM me ma da dan+tu swA hA/ oM hI hA ya yA ra rA wa wI la lA sarba kro d+ha rA dzaHsa b+hAR+Sha mai tri krU ru Na mu de to pauk+Sha/ sa ma ta sra haM baM/ badz+ra pUrbaM ga maM nA
137b4(rgyud 'grel): mA me da dan+d+ha hUM hUM phaT/ oM e waM e wAM pad+ma badz+ra ts+tshits+tshi br-idz+nyo ba yan+t+ra mA lA/ d+hi pra ti badz+ra su khyA dz+nyAn+ti gai dz+nyA na ma me da dan+tu hUM phaT/ dbang bdun gsol ba gangab pa'o// UM A/ rA rI u lI pany+tsA d+hA d+hu bi sho d+ha nI s+yAhA/ cod pan
137b5(rgyud 'grel): rigs lngas dbu brgyan byakon// oM a a r-i a l-i pany+tsa tA thA gaM tA pa ri shud+d+ha swA hA/ oM a A aM aHha hA hUM hU~M/ pheM ho da sha pA rA mi ta ta pa raM pU ra Ne swA hA// oM AHhUM hoHsur+b+ba tsan+na thaM sho d+ha ka swA hA/ oM a A
137b6(rgyud 'grel): e ai ar Ar o o al A la e aHgi Sha an+d+ra sa~M bi sho d+ha ni swA hA/ oM ha~Mh+na ya yA ra rA la lA tsa tu brah+ma bai ra bi shud+d+ha swAhA/ oM haMk+Sha d+harma tsakra pra bar+d+ha ka~M swA hA/ zhes pas dbang bdun bskur bar bsam/ oM sarba ta thA
138a1(rgyud 'grel): ga ta sap+tA b+hU mi b+hA pa to he/ thob pa'i nga rgyal bzung ba'o// oM oM pradz+nyo pA yau kA la shrA b+hI She ka ma mA dA d+hA tAM huM hUM phaT/ oM d+h+ye pradz+nyo pa skr-i badz+ra sat+kA b+hi sh+yA mU ta ro pradz+nyA dz+nyA nA b+hi She kr-i me d+yA d+ha trUM hUM hUM phaT/ zhes pas
138a2(rgyud 'grel): dbang gsum bskur bar gsol baM bta ba pAs bdag tshul bzhin du bum pa dang / gsung dbang shes rab ye shes sku// oM oM badz+rI sad+d+hi na badz+ra kau la shA b+hi She ke nA b+hi ShIb+h+yo badz+rA sarba pu t+ye tsi la b+hU mi lab+h+yo he/ oM AHoM badz+ra satwe
138a3(rgyud 'grel): na gu h+yA b+hI Sh+yek+te badz+ra satwa yu ba rA dz+re na ba b+hu mi lab+h+yo haM/ oM hu~M badz+ra satwe na pradz+nyA dz+nyA ne nA b+hi She ke nA b+hi Shi kA haM dri ti byAdz+ra d+hA ro haM d+harma me g+ha b+hu mi lab+h+yo haM/ thob pa'i nga rgyal bzung // oM ho pradz+nyo pa yAt+ma kA badz+re sitwa ma hA mu d+hA dz+nyA nA b+hi She kaM me pra
138a4(rgyud 'grel): yats+tshi/ oM A huM hoHphaT/ zhes pas gsol pa gangab pa dang // bla med dbang ni bskur bar bsam// oM hUM d+harma d+hA tA k+Sha ra tsA tun+tha b+hi She ka to badz+ra satwe nAt+ma na hi dr-i tI yo d+ha dA sha b+hU mi laMSh+To haM/ badz+ra satwa mahAnr-iHpa rA m+bA k+Sha raHtra
138a5(rgyud 'grel): lo kyaM bi dza ya kA la tsikra b+ha g+ha wA e baM kA raHzhes pas thob pa'i nga rgya'o// de nas phyag rgya drug bcas la// oM haM haHbA ma dak+ShiN+ya kar+N+Na yor badz+ra kuN+Da li huM hUM phaT phaT/ oM aM aHka ts+ya kleN+Te badz+ra me khA lA badz+ra kar+t+ti huM hUM phan+d+han+tu phaT
138a6(rgyud 'grel): oM a AHbA ma parba~M Ni ka ra~M yor badz+ra ru tsha bo hu~M hU~M phaT phaT/ oM has+tha bA ma pa'i rtsa la pa yong badz+ra nU pu ra hu~M d+hu phaH phaT/ oM tsa~M b+da ban+d+ha ka ra mi hA shrI ts+yai tras b+hA ba badz+ra shi ro/ ma Ni shi mi mchi lo bswa ts+yai hU~M ba~M hriM/ oM
138b1(rgyud 'grel): Ar+d+harA rI shwa ra badz+rA d+hA tsan+d+ra badz+ra pan+d+ho b+hAhuM hUM phaT phaT/ oM a AHa sarba swa re ka tri sa ra swa b+hA bA/ badz+rA yadz+nyo pa bi ta san+te hUM hUM phaT phaT/ de nas phyag rgya bzhi bcas lA/ oMk+ShaHdud+d+hAn+na b+hI ma na k+Sha yaM ka ra bAh+ma ts+tshar+m+ma/ kAn+no ts+yai b+h+rUM par+tha/
138b2(rgyud 'grel): Sh+T+r-I shAdrA swa ra sau p+ta hU~M s+t+ra m+b+ha d+hIm+b+ha br-in+d+ha nAM sa b+ha ba de d+he ku lA sha tA si ro b+hi nu d+ha mA la san+na ba la~M bi ni swan+d+he hu~M hU~M phaT phaH/ oM hi hrIdz+dza hur+g+haM ban+d+ha san+na g+hi shud+d+ha s+yA b+hA ba shI ra si ka pU lau m+b+ha li huM hUM phaT phaT/ oM Shat+t+ya k+tsik+ShI r+N+Na
138b3(rgyud 'grel): n+da d+hu d+hASh+T+r-iswAr+b+ba b+hodz+dza d+hid+yA m+bu pan+d+ha / denas kyums d+d+ha bar+d+ha dz+nyA phaT/ oMb+h+ya rmA pAn+d+ha/ oM
138b4(rgyud 'grel): aum+b+ha bad+d+ha/ oM g+h+r-i badz+dza b+hAnA rbA prAts+tsha/ ISh+TAHbAd+dak+tha shAn+te prAn+taM/ s+yASh+TaHbyAd+h+waM NAMm drA kAr+m+ma b+h+yaT/ auSh+TAHbadz+dzas+yAn d+hA pan+ta/ au n+d+raHbadzaM tsatradz+dza r+thaM/ smr-i rtAHdz+dzabar+b+had+hAH/ au T+TAn+tab+h+yad+h+we dan+tab+h+yAM \u0f7f/ au
138b5(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra pa ra shu hUM phaTe/ de nas ga~M yon gyi phyag rgyu btso'o// oM hUM badz+ra gaN+DI hU~M phreM phaT/ oM hUM badz+ri khaM Ta ho phruM phaT/ oM hUM badz+ra khA T+wA~M gra ho phreM phaT/ oM hUM badz+re ka bA la ho phreM phaT/ oM hUM badz+rA tsA pa~M ha~M phreM phaT/ oM hU~M badz+re b+hA sha ho phreM phan+tu/
138b6(rgyud 'grel): oM trAM badz+ra rat+na ho phreM phaT/ oM hUM badz+ra pad+ma ho phreM phaT/ oM hUM badz+ra shaM khaM ho phreM phaT/ oM hU~M badz+rA da ru ho phreM phaT/ oM hUM badz+ra shAM khaM le ho phreM phaT/ oM hI tsa~M duN+ye ta mu kha swa b+hA ba brah+ma shi ro ho phreM phaT/ de nas chu'i phyag rgya bca'// oM hUM
139a1(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra dzA ya nA gen+d+ha badz+ra dza TA mu ku Ta ban+d+he tiSh+Tha tISh+Tha hUM hUM phaT phaT/ oM k+ShuM badz+ra bi dzA ya nA gen+d+ha badz+re ban+d+ha ban+d+ha tiSh+Tha tISh+Tha huM hUM phaT/ oM h+ye h+yA badz+ra karko Ta ka byAdz+nyA pad+me b+h+ra ma da Sh+T+rI na kun+da la yo/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha huM hUM phaT
139a2(rgyud 'grel): phaT/ oM hUM hA badz+ra bA su ki shaM ka pA la bA ma dak+Shi Na ru tsaM kA yau tiSh+Tha tiSh+TaM huM hUM phaT phaT/ oM hr-i s+thA badz+rA nan ta ku la kau mai khaM la kaN+Di ka yaHtiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha huM hUM phaT phaT/ oM hAM h+na badz+re tak+Sha ko many+dzu pad+mo bI ma di Shi Na pU da n+tu pU ra lo
139a3(rgyud 'grel): tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hu~M hU~M phaT phaT/ zhes pas nga rgyal bzung bar bya'o// dbang bskur bai rA yan lag ste brgyad pa'o// / sngar bshang lha mo bcu gnyis kyi sngags brjod pa dbul bar bya'o// oM A
139a4(rgyud 'grel): huM hrIHphaT/ sngon du mchod yon dbul ba nI/ oM pra byA ra sat+kA re ma hA rasmin+da tIts+tsha swAhA/ de nas me trog sogs dbul rin chen gser gyi me tog sna tshogs dri mchog spros sogs mar me dang / dril bu mo long bla re dang
139a5(rgyud 'grel): ni sna tshogs 'bras bu ba dan gar dang rol mo dang / sna tshogs mchod pa byas te gzhan rnams bcu po bdag nus ji ltar gsungs bzhin dbul/ bdud rtsi sngar bzhin byin bshad pa// hUM byung rdo rje'i lce yis myang // oM
139a6(rgyud 'grel): bud+d+ha ya na maHoM d+harma ya na maHoM sad+d+ha ya na maHoM swa b+ha bi ka kA yA ya na maHoM d+harma kA yA ya na maHoM saM b+ho ga kA yA ya na maHoM tsar+m+ma Na kA yA ya na moHoM tsit+ta badz+rA ya~M na maHoM dz+nyA na badz+ra ya na ma
139b1(rgyud 'grel): oM wA kA ya bAdz+nyA ya na maHoM shwAH mu na ye nA maHoM ka la tsAkrA ya na maHoM badz+ra sad+d+ha na maHde bzhin lha'i sngags rnams la// na ma bdags la bdud rtsi mya // srin lug drug gis mchod par byA//
139b2(rgyud 'grel): de nas snyan pa'i dbyangs kyis bstod// grong la thog mtha' dbus maung gan+da dang 'chi dang srid pa dang ni sgra dang dri sta ro dang ni// reg bya gzugs dang sems te rang bzhin dong ni skyeskye bu med cing rtswa lcag thar pA pyod
139b3(rgyud 'grel): med// sa blon grasal ba'i dus mu lus sbrid pa ru ni bde dang sdug bsngal rang bzhin mi mnga' bya/ mtshan med mya ngan 'das par bya blo bral zhing yon tAn+ta pAl b+ha de la phyag 'tsho lo// dus dang sna tshogs la sogs rdo
139b4(rgyud 'grel): dud zla med rnying skyes byu gan+da 'gro smyosmra ba ming // brtsegs pa li gnas nA byA stu dang khyA migu mgo bo lag pa rkang pa rnams kun du// 'byong bya'i mtha' dang 'byung po'i mgon te gnas pa'i snying pa 'dzin cing byu b+ha rnams kyi r+g+ha/
139b5(rgyud 'grel): rig pa dang po rnal 'byor gyis bgrang go 'phang mchog gis bde ba dus 'khor lo 'du // skyes bu mdzad nus pa yis gzugs can dri meng glog 'dra gra zi brjid nyi ma bcu gnyis pa// ye shes rdo rje 'od zer mchog gi go 'phang la gaH
139b6(rgyud 'grel): tshechog drag de la phyag 'tshalo// dgar po 'jig rten gsum mgon ri bong 'dzin pa las 'jigs 'jig rten spyi bor yang dag bzhugs// bdud rtsi 'chi ba sel zhing sring ze'i 'jigs pa 'joms pa thig mo'i gzugs la phyag
140a1(rgyud 'grel): 'tshalo// sems tsam sngags kyi gzugs la sum cus yongasu bskor ba bde dang sdug bsngal ngo bo lA/ mkhas pa rnams la zhi ba'i gzugs kyis nyi mdzad nyams myong gdug pa rnams la mi
140a2(rgyud 'grel): gdug pa// gang zhig gang du rang gi yid la las byas de yi 'bras bu de ru bskyed par byed// 'jig rten dbang phyug sna tshogs srid gsum bskyed mdzad rdo rje sems dpa' la yang phyag 'tshalo// gcig dang du ma ma yin
140a3(rgyud 'grel): gcig ste mnyam dang mi many+dzam mnyam pa g.yas dang g.yon pa mdun drang rgyab// steng 'og kun nas dkar dang ljang khu kha dog chen po sna tshogs gzugs can thudu ring po ste// ring thung su dang yon tan med pa yon tan
140a4(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas skyes bu bud med skyes bu min// gang zhig kun nas rten byas gcig tu b+ha gaM bzang ma mcho gi b+ha ga khyod la 'dug/ gzhan ya bstod pa ci rigs bya// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta many+dzu pU dza badz+ra swa b+hA b+hAt+ma ko&hUM/
140a5(rgyud 'grel): mchod bstod nga rgyal bzung bar bya'o// mchod pa dang stong pa'i yan lag ste dgu pa'o// // dpal ldan rdo rje can ni lo dang zla ba dbye ba'i dus kyi dag par 'gyur mi dbang kye// sems kyi rnam
140a6(rgyud 'grel): pa nyi ma ma yin nyan bzhin dbang gis sna tshogs rnam par dag/ du ba la sogs rlung rnams dag par rang snying pad+mar gtso bo'i 'khor lo gnas pa'o// drag po nyon mongs slas bcas bdud kyi tshogs bcas bdud kyi
140b1(rgyud 'grel): rje go zhabs kyi 'og/ dung dang gaN+DI nor bu ljon pa drug ni de bzhin sku'i rdo rje rtogs// bdud rtsi'i yan lag gis ni bum pa brgyad rgyal dang rnam rgyal bum pa byung snyems sogs// 'du byed don yod grub pa tshor /
140b2(rgyud 'grel): dri med rin chen 'byung gnas 'du shes dpag med 'ong // gzugs ni 'khor lo can ta ri bong stobs dang khrag dang dri chu rin chen drug/ lha mo drug gi khams rnams kyi skye yul dang yul can gyi ni byang chub sems
140b3(rgyud 'grel): dpa' sras dang bcas// stobs kyi khro bo lnga ste gzhan rnams las kyi dbang po lnga poso// tsA muN+Da la sogs pa thun cher brgyad kyi pad+ma'i 'dab gnas nyi ma'i dus sbyor chu tshod rnams// lha min la sogs zla ba bcu
140b4(rgyud 'grel): gnyis pad+ma'i 'dra ba gnas rtsa dang dbugs kyi grangs rnam so// klu dang gra tu mo gsang ba la ste rgyal po nyis 'gyur rtsa rnams rnam par dag/ de bzhin 'dod pa la stsogs des ni rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis lus
140b5(rgyud 'grel): kyi bya ba dag/ skra yi sgrub pra ma lus dur khrongs gnas pa spu rnams kyis 'byung po'i tshogs rnamaso// khams gsum dag ni ma lus pa// sangs rgyas ngo bor bsgom par bya// de nas pad+ma rnam par sbyangs// a yis
140b6(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma 'odab brgyad la// hUM gis yi ge rdo rje bcas// shes rab la ni mthun phyiraro// hUM rigs rang gi yab kyi rdo rje ni// rtse mo lnga par rnam par bsgom// de dbus a las pad 'dob brgyad// de nas rdo rje pad+mor dgod// de nas
141a1(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor d+hU phaT brjod// bsgrub cing bde chen bsgom par bya// glatu mo lte bar rgyus klu bcom// ho yai s+ye shes dbus nas// dri med zlog 'dug N+DI brjid 'bar// phu khams skye mched la sogs
141a2(rgyud 'grel): bsregs// ri bong spyi bo las 'bab pa// thig lce'i gzugs te rdo rje tsam// gnas bzhi rim bcas slar snying 'og/ rgyar ldan mye long gnas lta bur// dus gsum ye shes ra 'byung ba// gsung dag ye shes 'bar
141a3(rgyud 'grel): bar gcig/ dung can rgyan chen gtum mor brjod// lce stengs rigs ngan d+hU ta'i sku// srog lnga sna rtser yungs kar gzhug/ srog 'gags stong nyid ma bcos dang // de la yid bzhag bsgom par bya// oM sarba ta thA
141a4(rgyud 'grel): t+yA a nu rA gaN badz+ra sU b+hU hA adz+dza ko&haM/ rnam dag drin+da pa'i thig le rlung // phyi mo bsgom pa'i yan lag ste bcu pa'o// / de nas nga rgyal bzung bar bya'o// bsgom pas skyo na sngas
141a5(rgyud 'grel): bzlas te// las la shes pa'i phreng bya bzung // sngags kyi sgra sbyangs grogs po ru// gang 'gyur ba yi sngags de bzlas// oM na mo badz+ra sAd+hA ya/ na mo b+haHbo d+h+waM swA twe b+h+yaHna m+bo badz+ra kro d+hun+d+ha rA dze d+hAdz+nyAn mo bI sh+tsa
141a6(rgyud 'grel): ma tr-i/ na mo bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwa de bi b+h+ya/ na mo badz+ra nA ki ni b+h+yaHna mo b+ha ga bi te ka la tsikrA ya badz+ra b+hai ra ba b+hI ka rA ya/ ma hinI la bar+t+ta sha ba rI d+hi ya/ ma ra mr-i sha dza~M dA ya~M/ kAn+ta si na rak+Sha tsau ri NA ya/ kr-iSh+Na rak+Sha si
141b1(rgyud 'grel): kar+N+Na ya/ nI la si ti b+hi ta raHdaMSh+mA ka ra lo gra b+hI Sha Na mu khA ya/ kr-iSh+NA rak+tA si ta sa b+h+ye ta ra swan+d+ha yA/ dA sha b+ha dzA yA/ ShAT bi sha trI kA nA ya/ badz+dza khan+tha Ti shu la kAn+ti k+Sha/ b+hU d+h+waM ku sha Da mA ru ka/ mrang+ga ra/ tsASh+Ta
141b2(rgyud 'grel): byAn+taM/ dAd+b+ha/ paR+YA/ badz+ra g+hur+ts+tsha khaiT/ khar+N+Na gaM/ kA prA la/ tsa b+hA prI shaM/ rat+na ka mau la shr-i l-i/ a dar+Ya/ b+h+r-i kha l+yA/ brAh+ma/ shI ga dza tsama? d+h+r-ig rA ya/ b+hUb+h+yAM/ tsa ma Ni ba sin+na yaM/ s+yAn+te m+bur+N+Nam+b+ha stA ba laM be ni/
141b3(rgyud 'grel): shiR+Sha s+t+ri/ badz+ra pAn+d+ha ma ku Te badz+raM/ ka pU la maM wA d+hA tsan+na d+hA rA ya/ kur+b+ha lA ru tsa ki/ krar+t+ti kA/ me kha lA/ nU b+hA ra/ b+h+yasmA yadz+nyo pa b+h+r-i ta shi rlo ma Ni/ mat+sa mu d+hA nA gen+d+ha bo b+hU Shat+tA ya/ bAdz+dza nA kI nI s+t+r-in+tau Shod+b+ha d+hA da yU yA/
141b4(rgyud 'grel): in+dag+ni ya ma naiR+R-it+ya ba ru NA ba yu ku be re shA nra brAh+ma bauny+tsa bI nA ya kaM kArti kI ya nan+di mai hA kA lA gra ha/ naMk+Sha trak+Shi tra pA la su ron+d+ra pa Nin+da b+hu ten+da na ren+d+ra saM sU ta tsi rat+naM yA/ rtsa ba'i sngags// oM AHhUM hU~M haMHhUM
141b5(rgyud 'grel): ka la ts+tsheH dudrAn+ta da ma ka d+h+r-i trI dza rA mo ra tAn+tA// trai l-i dz+nyA ya/ mahA b+hI re shwa r+ya/ badz+nyA b+hai ra bA/ badz+ra kA ya/ bad+d+ha b+ha tA/ bAdzI ni d+ha/ dzaM shwA ta/ badz+rI g+h+rAN+Da/ badz+rI dzaM hwA/ badz+ra dan+d+ha/ badz+ra nA kha/ dz+r-i ke shwA/
141b6(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra lo ma/ badz+rI b+ha ra Na/ badz+ra hA sa/ badz+ra gI ta/ badz+ra nr-i t+ya/ badz+rA yu d+ha ka ra/ badz+ra kro d+ha rA dzA d+hi pa ti/ badz+ra DA ka/ badz+ra DA kaM nI dzaM la pa ra shr-i ti/ shI g+hA a gats+tsha gats+tsha/ badz+ra satwa dz+nyA yA sarba mA ra big+h+na bi nA ya ka kin+na NAM
142a1(rgyud 'grel): ra ke pu ru Sha ga ru Da gAn+taH yaN rak+Sha sa b+hu ta ma hA pre ta/ kum+b+haN+Da A pAsmA ra/ k+She t+yA pA la/ be tA TA/ b+hU ta nA/ duSh+mAn+da gA gra hA da ya ye sarba dzA ra/ sar+b+ba bya d+hI/ ku dro pa d+hA ba kA rI NaHsarba satwa nAM sar+b+ba pa k+Sha
142a2(rgyud 'grel): ra tAM s+yAM sar+b+ban+d+haHshrI b+h+yAM badz+dzi ku shwe nA kr-i b+hU kr-i Sh+Ta/ Ud d+hA di r-I shiM ga tA nA k+saMn+ma kl-iSh+TaM pUHngi shi g+h+ra tA nA kr-iSh+Ta kr-iSh+Ta/ dak+Shi NA dzi shi gat+t+ra naM kr-ISh+mA kr-i Sh+ya/ ud+b+ha ra ngi shi gA tA nA baM Sh+yA kr-i Sh+yaM/ pa g+h+r-i ma paM shi ga tAn+d+ha ba Sh+TuH
142a3(rgyud 'grel): bA ya byaM ngi shi ga tAn+ta kr-i b+h+r-i kr-I Sh+ya/ I shwa na ngi shi gat+kanAM kr-i b+ha kr-I Sh+ya/ nar+d+hi dz+yo Sh+ra shi gau na tA n+ta kr-i Sh+yA kr-i Sh+ya/ ag+ne ya pi shi ga tA nA kr-iSh+NA kr-ISh+TaM/ a d+ho ngi shi ga tA nA kr-i kr-i Sh+mA/ A kA sha maN+Da la ga tA nA kr-I dz+yo kr-I Sh+ya/
142a4(rgyud 'grel): yu maN+Da la ga tA nA kl-i d+hAkle Sh+yaM/ te dzo maN+Da la ga tA n+yA kr-i b+h+yA kr-iSh+ya/ to ya maN+Da la gA tA nA kr-i g+ha kl-i Sh+ya/ pr-i b+hI mAN+Da la ga tA nA kr-i Sh+yA kr-i Sh+ya/ kA ma d+hA tu maN+Da lA ga tAM nA kr-i b+hakr-Ikl-i Sh+ya/ rU pa b+hi tu gra ShA n+da kr-i h+yA kr-I h+ya/ a
142a5(rgyud 'grel): rU bA dz+nyA tu ga tAn+do kr-i ShAM kr-i Sh+TaM/ k+Sha ya d+hA tAM ga N+Da nA kro dz+ha kr-i Sh+yA/ b+ha kA d+hA tu ga tAHkl-i Sh+mA kr-iSh+Ta/ tsad+b+ha d+hA t+ya gad+b+ha ts+tshakr-I Sh+yA kr-i Sh+yA/ pany+tsa skAn+na bad+b+ha nA kr-ilpA kr-iSh+Ta/ b+hAny+dzi d+hA tu ga d+hA nA kr-i dzU kl-i N+yA/ b+hUny+tsaM dri ya g+hA NA nAM kr-i Sh+Ta kr-iSh+Ta/
142a6(rgyud 'grel): pany+tsa bi Sh+ya sa ga tA nA kr-i Sh+Na kr-i Sh+ya/ pany+dzi karme na d+hI ya ga tA nA kr-iSh+Na kr-i Sh+yaM/ pany+tsa karmin+tI ya bi Sha ya ga tA nA kr-i Sh+Na kr-i N+yai/ sarba to yau tri ku tra tsit+ta ga k+Sha n+da kr-i Sh+Na kr-i N+yai/ mahA sl-i shA ni badz+rA tsI dz+wa l-i ta b+hU mA ni be ti sa na
142b1(rgyud 'grel): sa badz+ra b+hU she na sarba d+hu dzeSh+Ta ban+d+ha ya ban+d+ha ya/ badz+ra br-i kha la yU sarba pA de Shu ne ro d+hA yA naM ro d+ha yA/ ma mA sarba satwe Sh+Tak+tA ya bak+ShI N+Do ba dra ba ka ra ra tAn+tA na muh+ma lo d+ha badz+re Na tsAr+Na sa tsUr+N+Na yA/ bAdz+ra khar+the na ni kr-in+ta ya ni krin+ta ya/
142b2(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra tri shU li na b+h+re dA ya b+h+r-i da sau/ dz+nyA kr-in+t+r-i k+Sha yA hA na ha na/ badz+ra b+h+r-i Ne na bar+N+Na br-in+d+ha/ bad+d+ha kI la kauHkI la ya kI la ya/ badz+dza mung+gu rai b+h+r-i ko Ta s+yA/ badz+ra tsashre Na ts+tshe drA s+yA ts+tshe ya/ brAdz+ra buts+tshi nA b+hir+tha b+hin+na/ badz+ra dut+te na trA Da ya t+yAH
142b3(rgyud 'grel): saHbadz+rI pa ra shu nr-its+tshan+na ts+tshin+na/ sAr+d+ha tri ko Ti khartI kri d+h+yA shrA shwA na b+hUm+b+ha sarba b+huM tau b+h+yo ba liM ku ru gu R+YA/ badz+ra Da ma ru ke na badz+ra nA kau nIr+N+Na b+hA he ya thA hA ya/ badz+ra nI kI ni b+h+r-im+bA ra k+Sha yI k+ShA nai ru d+hI r-i ni bi nga ya ni bai dr-i yaM/ pa
142b4(rgyud 'grel): tAd+hA rI NI b+h+yaHpyAny+tsamr-i ti ni br-i da yA byA d+yA s+yA/ sar+b+ba badz+re nA k+Shi nIs tis+yArbaM sad+d+hiM nAM shAn+ti ny+dzi/ bin+dI kAM rAH bA ra Na gub+hI ku ru kun+mA dr-i hUM phaT/ zhes b+ha nAM phreng ba'i sngog so// oM AH ho d+h+waM swA hA/ snying byo'o//
142b5(rgyud 'grel): oM ts+tshats+l-i d+h+r-ih+nud+b+ha NAM swA hA/ nye ba'i snying po'o// oM kA la tsarbA s+yA AHhUM hU~M phaT s+yain+d+he/ oM dA na b+hA ra mi tA yaM hUM phaT swA hU~M/ oM shI l-i bA r+yA mi tA ye hu~M phaT swA hA/ oM Tan+ti pA ri mi NA yau tsu b+h+rUM baiT+Te swA hA/ oM b+hir+ya pA ra
142b6(rgyud 'grel): mi tA ye hUM phaT swA hA/ oM d+h+ya na pA ra mi tA yai hUM phaT swA hA/ oM pradz+nyA pA ra~M mi tA ya hUM phaT swA hA/ oM u pA ya pA ra mi tAM yai hUM phaT swA hA/ oM pra Ni d+ha na bA ra mi tA ye hUM phaT swA hA/ oM bA la pA rl-i ra mi tA yai hUM phaT swA hA/
143a1(rgyud 'grel): oM dz+nyA nA b+hA ra mi tA ya hUM phaT swAhA/ oM dz+nyA ya g+haT+Te b+h+yo hu~M phaT swA hA/ oM bI dz+nyA ya g+ha Te b+h+yo hu~M phaT swAhA/ oM sarba tsib+h+yo b+h+yo hu~M phaT swA hA/ oM s+yarba mu drA b+h+yo hu phaT swA hA/ oM ts+tshin+d+ra ma NA ye hUM phaT swA hA/
143a2(rgyud 'grel): oM d+har+m+ma gar+b+ha hUM phaT swA hA/ oM d+harmA sha khA ya huM phaT swA hA/ oM kal+la br-ik+to ya huM phaT swA hA/ oM ak+Sho b+hU hu~M phaT swA hA/ oM a mo g+ha sid+d+hi ye hUM phuT swA hA/ oM rAt+na saM b+hA ya hu~M phaT+Te swA hA/ oM a mi tA b+ha ya hUM phaT swA hA/
143a3(rgyud 'grel): oM bai ro tsa n+do ya hUM phaT swA hA/ oM lo tsa nA yai hUM phaT swA hA/ oM mA ma kyai hUM phaT swA hA/ oM pAN+Da rA yai huM phaT swA hA/ oM tA ra ye huM phaT+Ta swA hA/ oM badz+ra d+hA tI shwa r+yaM huM phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra pA Na ye huM phaT swA hA/ oM kha
143a4(rgyud 'grel): gar+b+ha ya huM phaT swA hA/ oM k+Shi tI gar+b+hA ya hUM phaT swA hA/ oM lo ke shwa rA ya hu~M phuT swA hA/ oM sarba ni ba ra Na bI saM b+hi ne huM phaT swAhA/ oM saM man+ta b+hU drA ya huM phaT swA hA/ oM gan d+hA badz+rA yai hUM phaT swA hA/ oM ru pa byAdz+nyA yai huM
143a5(rgyud 'grel): phaT swA hA/ oM r-I saM badz+rA ya hu~M phaT swA hA/ oM s+phoR+Sha badz+rA yai huM phaT swA hA/ oM shap+tiM badz+rA yai huM phaT swA hA/ oM d+har+m+ma d+hA tU badz+rA ya hUM phaT swA hA/ oM uSh+NI Sh+Ta ya hu~M phaT swA hA/ oM big+h+nAn+ta kra ya huM phaT swA hA/ oM pradz+nyA nA kA/
143a6(rgyud 'grel): ta ya hUM phaT/ oM pad+mAn+te kA ya hUM phaT swA hA/ oM ya mAn+ta kA ya hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM stam+b+ha na ye huM phaT swA hA/ oM ma Ni ma n+ye huM phaT swA hA/ oM sto b+hi n+yai hUM phaT swA hA/ oM a ti bIr+N+Na ye hUM phaT swA hA/ oM a ti na~M lnga
143b1(rgyud 'grel): yaiye hUM phaT s+yAhA/ oM sar+b+ba d+hA ro NI b+h+yo ts+yai phuT swAhA/ oM ShA D+D+h+ya g+hA s+yA b+h+rUM phaT swAhA/ oM badz+ra nAMr+t+ti kA ye huM phaT swAhA/ oM badz+ra b+hU nA hU~M hu~M phaT sUt+ma/ oM bud+d+ha mU hA shA n+ye hUM pAn+d+ha swAt+ma/ oM bad+d+ha oMts+tshin nu phaT swAd+d+ha/
143b2(rgyud 'grel): badz+rI prah+ma ts+yai hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra mohA lab+h+yAM hu~M pheMT swA hA/ oM badz+ra kau mAn+yai hUM phan+da swA hA/ oM badz+ra ba~MSh+Na byai hu~M phuT swA hU~M/ oM aSh+TaSh+Ta ke na tsa truSh+TA Shi badz+ra yo gI nI b+h+yo hu~M phaT swA hA/ oM Sha Ta tra~M shA tits+tsha b+h+yo ts+yai phan+d+ha swAhA/ oM badz+ra
143b3(rgyud 'grel): be huM phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra nI R+R-i t+ya ye hUM phaT swA hA/ oM badz+rAg+ni ye hUM phaT swA hA/ oM pradz+nyed+d+hA ye hUM phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra na drA ya hUM phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra shU ra ya huM phaT swA hA/ oM badz+rI brah+ma Ne hUM phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra bi nA ya kA
143b4(rgyud 'grel): huM phuT swAtrA~M/ oM badz+ra kIN+Di kaM yA ya hu~M phaT swAhUM/ oM b+hidz+nyo ba ya~M be hU~M phaT swAt+ma/ oM hU~Mdz+dza sA mA yai hU~M phaTaH/ oM badz+ra yUSh+Te b+h+yo hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM bA ru N+yai hUM phaT swAhA/ oM ba ya byaM hU~M phan+d+ha swA hA/ oM I mi n+yai hUM pUn+tu swAhA/ oM
143b5(rgyud 'grel): yak+ShI n+ye hUM phaT swA hA/ oM ma hA ba lA ya huM phaT swA hA/ oM a tsa lA ya hUM phaT swA hA/ oM Ta ki rA dzA ya hUM phaT swA hA/ oM nI la dAn+ta ya huM phaT swA hA/ oM sum b+hi rU dz+nyA ya huM phaT swA hA/ oM rA drA k+ShuM huM phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra shrI kha
143b6(rgyud 'grel): la yai hu~M phaT swA hA/ oM tsun+d+rA ye huM phaT swA hA/ oM b+h+r-i kun+d+he huM phaT swA hA/ oM ma r+yaM n+ye huM phaT swA hA/ oM pra t+ye ka mA sa d+he d+ha na ShiSh+Ti ut+ta ra traM sha ta badz+ra ti thai de bI b+h+ye huM phaT swA hA/ oM Sha Ta traM sha ta pra tIts+tsha b+h+yo huM phaT swA hA/
144a1(rgyud 'grel): oM badz+ra dz+nyA A s+yA hu~M phaT swAt+ma/ oM badz+ra kar ko Ta k+ShA ya tsu phaT swAhA/ oM badz+rA b+hA su kA yai huM phaT swAhA/ oM nan+d+ra yA huM phaT/ oM badz+ra rAk+ka ya hUM phaT swAhA/ oM badz+ra mahA pad+ma yA hu~M phaT swAd+d+ha/
144a2(rgyud 'grel): oM badz+ra ku li kA ya huM phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra shaM kha b+h+r-i lA ya huM phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra pad+ma ya hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra bi dzaM yA ya hu~M phuT swA hA/ oM shra nA s+yA ye huM phaT swA hA/ oM s+thA kA rA s+yA yuM huM phaT swA hA/ oM byAg+h+na s+ya hU~M phaT swA hA/
144a3(rgyud 'grel): oMdz+nye krAk+Sh+ma swA ya~M ts+tsha ya s+yAts+tsha/ oM ga ru n+d+ha s+yA ts+tsha sa su~M sru~M k+Sh+ma N+Ta m+b+ha sa hU~Mb+h+ya.oM prad+d+ha s+yA hU~M phaT swAd+d+ha/ A~M d+hi sa su~M m+b+ha hrIHoMH/ oM badz+dzatsa~MnI s+ye d+d+ha phan+da s+t+wa~MhU~M/
144a4(rgyud 'grel): s+yAsUR+YA ye hu~M phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra mAng+ga wA ya hu~M phaT swA hA/ oM badz+rI bud+d+ha yoM hU~M phaTadz+dza oM badz+ra br-i has+tha ta ye huM phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra shuklA yaM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ri sho na shU R+Sha yai huM phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra ke tA ba~M hUM phaT swA hA/
144a5(rgyud 'grel): oM badz+ra rA thAH hU~M phaT swAt+ma/ oM badz+ra kA lAg+d+ha ye hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM badz+re d+hU bi hu~M ban+d+ha s+yAt+ma/ oM badz+ra kas+yA yo hu~M phaT swAt+ma/ oM badz+ri k+Shi tra b+h+yo hU~M phaT swAhA/ oM d+hA d+hA shrA nA sa~M b+h+yo tsa~M phaT s+yAtAM/ oM Sho Ta sha kA la b+h+yo tsu pa
144a6(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ oM de sha dik+Sh+Na lo b+h+yo hu~M phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra nan+di ke shwa rA ya hUM phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra ma hA kA lA yo huM phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra g+har+dz+dza kan+d+ha ya hu~M phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra b+h+r-i ge ne hu~M phaT swA hA/ oM sarba k+She tra pA le b+h+yo hu~M phaT swA hA/
144b1(rgyud 'grel): oM sarba d+hU ti b+h+yo hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM hA rI t+ye hUM phaT swAhA/ oM sarba sid+d+hi b+h+yo huM phaT swAhA/ oM d+h+yAr+m+ma tsakrA ya hUM phaT swA hA/ oM b+ha dra g+hAT+TA ya huM phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra dUn+tu b+h+yo hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM b+ho d+hi br-i ThA ya huM phaT swA hA/ oM ru bud+d+ha
144b2(rgyud 'grel): b+h+yo d+hI sad+d+he b+h+yo na mo hu~M phaT+Ta swA hU~M/ pho nya badz+ra nyi badz+re ny+tsi badz+rI ny+tsa badz+rIrl-i badz+rI hi bodz+rI huM phaT swAhA/ oM dz+haiM badz+rI d+d+hi badz+ra dzI badz+rI dz+r-IM badz+ra dz+haiM ba~Mdz+ra d+ha~M badz+ra hu~M phaT swAhU~M/ oM dzaM badz+ra dz+dza badz+ra dzI badz+ra hUM badz+ra dz+r-IM badz+ra dzaM badz+ra hu~M pUn+ta swA hU~M/ oM tsha ba
144b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyu badz+ra ts+tsha br-idz+rI tshu badz+ra r+m+ma badz+re tshA badz+ra hU~M phaT swAt+ma/ oM nAM bAdz+nyA tsi badz+ra nI badz+ra nr-i badz+ra R+YA b+h+r-idz+dzi ts+tsha badz+nyA hU~M phaT swAt+ma/ de bzhin du stor bstan pa'i sa b+h+yon+ti kun la yang sbyar bar bya'o// s+yai ba ru d+hi hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM pa yi b+h+ye hu~M pan+d+ha swAH/
144b4(rgyud 'grel): oM ma ye n+ye hUM phan+d+ha swAhA/ oM yak+Sha n+ye tsu phaT swAhA/ oM n+d+ra lA dad+b+h+yAM hU~M phaT swAhA/ oM Tanr-i n+tu dz+nyA ya huM phaT swAhA/ oM a lA ya ts+yai phaT swAhA/ oM ma hA b+hA lA ya hU~M bAT+Ta swA hA/ oM sum b+hA rA dzA ya hu~M phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra r+ya ta
144b5(rgyud 'grel): huM phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra shriM khA wA ya huM phaT swAhA/ oM badz+ra tsun+de huM phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra b+h+ri ki ra hu~M phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra ma ri ts+yai huM phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra sha~MtrU~M sha ta ts+tshi b+h+yo hu~M phaT/ oM badz+re dza yA ya hUM phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra karko nA ya
144b6(rgyud 'grel): huM phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra bA su ki huM phaT swA hA/ oM badz+rA man+ta hu~M phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra tak+Sha kA ya huM phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra ma hA pad+ma ma huM phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra ku la na~M ka ya hUM phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra shaM kha pA lA ya huM phaT swA hA/
145a1(rgyud 'grel): oM badz+ra pad+mA ya huM phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra bi dza yA ya huM phaT swA hA/ oM shwa na s+ye huM phaT swAhA/ oM byAg+h+na s+ye huM phaT swA hA/ oM d+h+r-i ka s+yai huM phaT swAhA/ oM ga ru Da s+yai huM phaT+Ta swA hA/ oM u lU ka/
145a2(rgyud 'grel): s+ye huM phaT swAhA/ oM g+h+r-i d+hA s+yai huM phaT swA hA/ oM ka ka s+ye huM phaT swA hA/ oM sarba shud d+he b+hau hu~M phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra ts+tshan+d+rA ya huM phaT swA hA/ oM badz+rA sUR+tha huM phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra mai ga l+ye huM phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra bud d+hA ya hu~M phaT/
145a3(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ oM b+h+r-i h+ma ta ye hu~M phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra shukrA ya hUM phuT+Ta swA hA/ oM badz+ra raShe nau g+huR+Sha yA hUM phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra kAr+ha ri huM phuT swA hA/ oM badz+ra r+yA hu la hu~M phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra ka lAg+ne hu~M phuT swA hA/ oM badz+ra d+hU be ni ts+yai
145a4(rgyud 'grel): phaT swA hA/ oM badz+rA gas+yA huM phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra s+yArba na k+Sha tre b+h+yo hUM phaT swA hA/ oM dA da shwa rA shi b+h+yo hu~M phaT swA hA/ oM Sho Da sha kA la b+h+yo hUM phaT swAhA/ oM badz+rA nAnA de b+hI shwa rA ya huM phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra ma hA kA lA yA huM phaT/
145a5(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ oM badz+ra g+har+b+ha kAd+d+hA ya ts+yai phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra b+h+r-i gi r-i Te huM phaT swAhA/ oM sarba k+She Ta b+h+yo lo b+h+yohU~M phaT swAhA/ oM sarba d+hU trA~M b+h+yo hu~M phaT swA hA/ oM hU~M d+hi ti b+h+yo hU~M phaT swAhA/ oM sarba sid+d+hi b+h+yo hu~M phaT swA hA/ oM saH
145a6(rgyud 'grel): ma ni smyi/ mang du tshu la smra/ ma
145b1(rgyud 'grel): ci nus bya// khro rgyal la sogs gtor ma sbyin// dge bla 'di yis rnam gsum srid pa la gnas sems can rnams ni bla myed byang chub 'gyur bar shog/ thub pa 'khor bcus gtso bo'i byin gyis brlabs
145b2(rgyud 'grel): kyis sna tshogs phyag rgya'i dngos grub thob gyur pa// srid pa rnam gsum la gnas sems can bcom ldan dus 'khor stobs kyis de bzhin shog/ bskyod nams de yis sems can mi 'gyur mchog
145b3(rgyud 'grel): gi bde bar gyur cig de la 'dud// spyi bor rdo rje rtse lnga ru// gtso bo yab yum gshegasu gsol// thugs karu rtse dgu du ba sogs// dpral bar rtse mo bcu drug bsgom// rigs lnga ya ba yum
145b4(rgyud 'grel): bum par gshegs// mgrin pa rtse mo sum cu gsum// sems dpa' sems ma sgo ba gshegs// lte bar tso mo drug cu lnga// gsung gi dkyil 'khor gshegasu gsol// gsang bar
145b5(rgyud 'grel): phyi yi sgo srung gshegs// bya ba'i rdo rje bden bral sogs// las lA klu dang rab gtum gshegs// de nas lha'i rnam par ldang // tsho gas gnas rnams bsrung bar bya// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga
145b6(rgyud 'grel): ta ya ti badz+ra satwa haM do daN Da da ma~M ko huM hU~M phaT phaT swA hA// lha'i nga rgyal gyi spyong lam bya'o// rjes kyi bya ba'i yan lag ste bcu gcig pa'o//

147a1(rgyud 'grel): dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs bzhugaso// /
147b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gur skad du/ shrI kA lA tsakra sA d+hA na nA ma ni/ bod skad du/ dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dang po'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshalo//
147b2(rgyud 'grel): dpal ldan srid gsum mgon pa mchog tu bde ba'i bdag nyid rnam par rtog pa ma lus rab tu sbyangs// spro dang sdud pa'i rgyur gyur dngos dang dngos med mnyam pa'i ye shes skye dang 'jig pa rnam par bral/
147b3(rgyud 'grel): skye bo rnams kyi bsam pa rnams la dgongs te hUM yig la sogs las byung dkyil 'khor gyis ni bskor// badren pa dag la gnas pa'i mchog gi snying rje dang ldan dang po'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshalo//
147b4(rgyud 'grel): 'jam pa'i dpal gyis bsdus rgyud du// sgrub thabs gsungs pa de bzhin du// 'jig rten mgon gyis 'grel mdzad pa// de dag blangs twe bri bar bya// bstan bcos brtsom pa'i dus med cing // mdzad las
147b5(rgyud 'grel): dbyung bar ma nus kyang // bsgom phyir sgrub thabs 'di byasdu pas// blo ldan rnams la bzod par gsol// dang por sngags pa mchog tu snying rje dang ldan pa gzhan gyis bya ba byed par 'dod pas/ zhi ba la sos
147b6(rgyud 'grel): las kyi bye brag gis// rgya mtsho'i 'gram la sogs pa'i gnas ying du 'ong ba'i bsam gtan gyi gnasu/ bla ma dang / rgyal ba dang / de'i sras rnams la gus paso/ bcom ldan 'das dang po'i sangs
148a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyas kyi bris sku la sogs pa bzhugasu gsol/ mchod pa dang maN+Dal la sogs pa gzhung nas bshad pa ltar bshams pa la 'jam pa la sogs pa'i stan la bsdang la/ shin tu
148a2(rgyud 'grel): gus pa dang ldan pa'i rang gi yid kyi phyag btsal ba la sogs pa rnams dang / phyi'i mchod pa rgya chen po rnams dbang po rnams dang mnyam por bzhag pa ste/ ji ltar gsungs pa ltar dag par byas pa'i bdud rtsi
148a3(rgyud 'grel): lnga'i ri lu sran ma tsa na ka tsAm khar bcug nas/ lus dang drag dang / yid dang ye shes rnam par dog par bya ba la sogs pa rnams bya b+hA ni/ de yang mchog gi snying rje dang bdud rtsi'i dbang gis sems la brten pa'i
148a4(rgyud 'grel): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis dpal dri ma med par lha nyid yongasu rdzogs par bya ba'i don du lus dang ngag dang / yid dang ye shes rnam par dag par gsungs pa/ oM AHhUM ho haM k+ShaHpradz+nyo prA yA
148a5(rgyud 'grel): ta ma ka k+Sha ya bIk+ShIt+ta dz+nyA nA d+hi pa ti ma ma kA ya bAk+ShIt+ta ta dz+nyA na badz+ri badz+ra badz+rA mr-i ta swa b+hA baM ku ru ku ru kan d+hA d+hA twA ya twA nA niHswa b+hA baM swAhA/ zhes pa'i sngags brjod la/ gtsug tor du baM yig yongasu gyur pa las rdo rje
148a6(rgyud 'grel): zla ba'i dkyil 'khor cha bcu drug pa yongasu rdzogs pa lta bu sngags pas bsamo// de nas gtsug tor nas bsams te sen mo'i bar gyi lus sbrul pags pa rjes pa ltar bas mo// de ltar zhi pa dang rgyas pa dag la'o//
148b1(rgyud 'grel): dang s+ya sogs pa gzhung rgyas kyi rnyog nas mA b+hi so// de nam+b+ha yang de nyid du gsungasmra pa'i// sab+hA ba bung d+haHsasad+hamAr+g+ha sa b+hA ba byung d+ho&hUM/ skyes pas brjod// de nas phrul bar ma byin yongs gyur pa
148b2(rgyud 'grel): las 'od dpag med sku mdog dkar po/ mgrin par aHyig yongasu gyur pa las rin chen 'byung ldan sku mdog dmar po/ thugs kar hUM yig yongasu gyur pa las don yod grub pA su myadog nag po// lta bar
148b3(rgyud 'grel): tsa yig yang su gyur pa las ngan yang grub pa sku mngag nag pa/ lte bar te yig yongasu gyur pa lngas rnam par snang mdzad sku mdog ser po/ gtsug tor du haM yig yongasu gyur pa las mi bskyod pa sku mdog ljang gu
148b4(rgyud 'grel): gsung gan su k+She yig yongasu gyur pa las rdo rje sems dpa' sku mdog sngon po rnams dgod pa ni/ gsung bar 'gyur bu'i sku mdog dang phyag mtshan rnams dang ldan pa'o// 'di ni rdo rje'i zhal dag pa dang rigs drug
148b5(rgyud 'grel): dgod pa'i nges pa'o// de nas log pa dag pa'i sngags badz+ro // oM hAHsar+b+ba s+yA rA dz+nyA mA ra rme n+ta ka rA badz+ri tiSh+Tha duHkhA ts+tshe da maM ma ga ra~M bi shi d+hA ya s+yAd+d+hi/ zhes pa'i sngags 'di nyid kyi lhag pa mAny+dzu ba ni lag pa dag
148b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i nges pa'o// de nas a la sogs pa'i mthar thug pa'i dbyangs yig bco lnga ni/ a i r-i u laM/ a e ar au al/ ha ya ra wa la/ rnams lag pa g.yon pa'i mthe chung gi rtsa ba'i tshigs nas brtsams
149a1(rgyud 'grel): te mthe bo'i bar gyi tshogs rnams la nA mkha' la sogs pa dgod pa'o// de nas lag pa g.yas pa'i mthe bo'i steng gi tshogs nas brtsams te/ mthe'u chung gi tshigs kyi bar du l+yA yig lA
149a2(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa dgod pa ni/ lA wA rA sA/ Al o.oM Ar e aHl-I U R+R-i I A/ rnams ni sa la sogs pa rim bya bzhi no// de nas thal mo sbyar ba'i nang du zla ba dang nyi ma'i dbu suM hUM yig kha dog sngon po bsam/ yang
149a3(rgyud 'grel): de nyid du gsungs pa wAr zla bA dang nyi ma dang sgra gcan gyi sa bon dang ldan pas rtse lnga'i phyag rgya bcings te/ gtsug tor nas brtsams nas/ dad+mo pa'i sen mo'i bar du bdag nyid la rig par bya zhing sngags brjod la/ oM A
149a4(rgyud 'grel): hUhUM ho haM k+ShaHkA ya bAk+ShIt+ta dz+nyA na d+hi pa tro badz+ra kA yA mA ma kA ya bAny+dzit+ta dz+nyA ne badz+ra badz+rI kA ya s+t+wa~M b+hA baM ku ru ku ru swAhA/ de'i dra rgyal dang bcas pas/ oM sarba tA thA gra tA badz+rI kA yA swa b+ha bAt+ma ko&haM/ zhes pa ni lus dang ngag dang
149a5(rgyud 'grel): yid dang ye shes rnam par dag pa'o// de ltar rigs drug la dgod par byas nas/ de nas yan lag drug la dgod pa ni/ lag pa gnyis thal mo sbyar ba'i mthe bo gnyis snying grar gtad / oM hrIM hri da yA ya nA ma zhes pa'o//
149a6(rgyud 'grel): mgo bor oM hUM si ra si swA hA/ zhes pa'o// gtsug tor la oM hAM she khA yai bau Sha Ta zhes pa'o// yan lag thams cad la oM h+ni ka ba tsa ya hUM zhes brjod cing lag pa gnyis kyis lus thams cad la reg par bya'o//
149b1(rgyud 'grel): oM d+hI n+te pra ya wa Sha Ta zhes pa so// mig lA oM h+naHas+t+ra sa paT zhes pas phyogs thams cad du mthe bong drang mdzub mos se gol gtogs shing dge ba'i bya ba la gaskyon gyis/ mi dge ba'i byA byA la g.yas pas dag //
149b2(rgyud 'grel): de nas A~M sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta d+h+r-i da ya si ra/ shi kha kaM ba tsaM ne tra as+t+ra badz+rI Sha T+wA~M ga s+yA b+ha pad+ma ko&ha~M/ zhes pa ni yAn lkog drug la dgod pa'i cho ga'o// de nas srong 'khor gyi don du na mkha'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbum+b+ha dang byor
149b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo bzhi bsgom bya ni/ de nas de nyid du gsungs pa ltar srung ba'i 'khor lo rnam par bsam par bya ba'i phyir/ de yang drang por yaM yig yongasu gyur pa lngas rlung gi dkyil 'khor 'og dang steng du b+h+rUM yig yongasu
149b4(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa las rdo rje kha sbyoro// de nas raM yig yongasu gyur pa las me'i dkyil 'khor dang / waM yig yongasu gyur pa las chu'i dkyil 'khor dang / lam yig yongasu gyur pa las sa'i dkyil 'khor rnams rim
149b5(rgyud 'grel): pa bzhin du/ kha dog nag po dang / dmar po dang / daglar po dang / seng po rnams kyi 'og dang steng du tsu yig yongasu gyur pa las rang rang gi kha dog dang bcas pa'i rdo rje gnyis gnyis dang bcas pa rnams/ gzhu'i
149b6(rgyud 'grel): dbyibs dang / gru gsum dang / zlum po dang / gru bzhi'i rnam pa la rlung yab dang / bkra shis pad+ma dang 'khor lo rnams kyi spras pa go bar bya'o// de nas yang de nyid du gsungs pa ltar dkyil 'khor bzhi gcig tu gyur pa
150a1(rgyud 'grel): sU d+mo'i grib ma'i mtshams dang / grong khyer mi mtshams dang / phyi rol du na mkha' drang sa g+hazh-i 'dus par snang ba'i mtshams te/ de yang dkyil 'khor gzhi cig tu gyur pa zla bzhi rgyu dang ldan
150a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gzhal yas khung bsgom pa dang / de ltar ra ba gsum bsgom pa dang / de ltar grong khyer srung ba'i don du zong khyer gyi mtsham su ra ba lnga bsgom par bya ba dang / de ltar 'og thams cad du rdo rje'i mdung dang /
150a3(rgyud 'grel): steng du mnga'i dra ba shin tu rno ba dang / dbusu rdo rje'i sa gzhi rnams grong khyer gyi mtsham su bsgom par bya'o// de nas gzhol yas khang gi dbu su pad+ma 'am/ 'khor lo khru bcu gnyis pa mu khyud dang bcas pa 'dab ma
150a4(rgyud 'grel): brgyad pa bsgom par bya'o// dbus kyi lte ba khru bzhi dang ldan pa nyi ma dang byAcas pa'i gang no// 'on kyang 'di'i bye brag nI hUM yig yongasu gyur pa lngas rdo rje'i sa gzhi dang / oM yig yongasu gyur pa 'am/ b+h+rUM yig yongasu
150a5(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa las gzhal yas khang dang / baM yig yongasu gyur pa 'am/ oM yig yongasu gyur pa las pad+ma dong / raM yi ga yongasu gyur pa las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom zhes bya'o// dri ltar ra ba l+ya sogs pa bsgoms
150a6(rgyud 'grel): nas/ yang de nyid du gsungs pa ltar sngags kyi bye brag tu gyur pa 'di lta ste/ oM AHhU~M ra badz+ra tsan+d+ra sUd+hi ra tsu ka lAg+na ya/ ka ya d+hakr-iN+Da dz+nyA na badz+ra pra kA r-I ku ru ku ru swA hA/ zhes pa ni ra ba'i sngag so// oM huM bi shwa kA ya badz+ra
150b1(rgyud 'grel): d+hu r+d+ha b+hA r+yaM ku ru ku ru swAt+ma/ zhes pa ni gzhal yas khang gi sngag so// oM pan+d+ha bi shU badz+ra pad+ma ku ru ku ru swAhA/ zhes pa ni pad+ma'i sdug so// oM raHbadz+ra sUn+d+ha badz+ra sUrbA sa nAM ku ru sur+yA swAhA/ zhes pA ni nyi ma'i gdan gyi sngag so//
150b2(rgyud 'grel): de nas de'i steng du oM ya~M gr-I dkar po yongasu gyur pa las/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor me long lta bu'i mi shes kyi rang bzhin/ kr-i yig la sogs pa gsal byed 'dus pa'i bdag nyid las/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom pa
150b3(rgyud 'grel): me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi rang bzhi no// snang de nyid du gsungs pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bdag nyid g.yon dang g.yasu bskor ba dbyangs yig sum cu aHchog drag dang klang kor dang bcas pa
150b4(rgyud 'grel): bsgom pa ni/ a i raM U lAM 'di rnams ni dang po lnga bsdus pa'o// de yang smon tan gyi dbye byas A ai ur+ya o al rnams ni gnyis pa lnga rnams bsdus pa'o// de nas rgyun gyis gyur pa ha ya ra wa la dz+nyA ni ga suM b+hI bsdus
150b5(rgyud 'grel): pa lnga'o// bsdus pa bcoM lnga'i mthar thig le nI aM yig ste/ bcu drug pa 'dri rnams ni gauyon bskor g+hi so// de nas g.yas bskor gyis nag po'i phyogs kyis dang po la sogs pa dgod pa/ lba wA R+Sha yA hUM/ Al oM
150b6(rgyud 'grel): Ar e A/ l+li u r-I I A/ de ltar bco lnga dang gnam stong gi mthar tsheg drag ni AHste 'di ni de ltar dbyangs yig bcu drug ces bya'o// de nas de'i steng du aHyig dmar po yongasu gyur pa las nyi ma'i dkyil
151a1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin du bu mo'i bdag nyid bas mo// yang de nyi du gsungs pa'i ka yig la sogs pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gsal byed bzhi bcu'i bdag nyid de yang
151a2(rgyud 'grel): ha ya ra la wa rnams dang / sde tshan drug ste suma? cu rtsa lnga dang / de nyid kyis bad pAsa? la wa ya Da D+hA rnams bzung ste/ wA lpA r+ha nA wa wAR+Sha Ad+has+thA d+hA lan+tha/ d+ha b+hU dzaH/ pra pra b+ha dz+nyem+ba/ D+hAt+tA r+har+N+Na d+hA/ ts+tsha ts+tsha d+h+we dz+nyA&/
151a3(rgyud 'grel): ga wa mra d+hA tra/ rnams te bzhi bcu tham pa sa la sogs pa'i dbye bas g.yas bskor gyiso// dwe ltar g.yon bskor du/ da g+hA gA kha ka/ nya dz+ha dzA tsha tsa/ NaM D+ha Da thA kaMnra/ ma b+hA ba pa pa/ na d+ha da tha tA/ \u0f7fR+sha shaM lAH/
151a4(rgyud 'grel): sa ha ha ya ra wa la D+ha Da ya ba la ste/ de ltar bzhi bcu ste gsal byed brgyad cu zheso// de nas de dag gis dbusu hUM yigra sngon po las byung ba'i sna tshogs rdo rje hUM gis mtshan pa so sor rtogs ye shes kyi bdag nyid
151a5(rgyud 'grel): bsgom par bya'o// de nas gsum po gcig tu 'dres pa la hriHyi ga gis spras pa bya ba grub pa'i ya shas kyis bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o// de nas lus kyi yan lag thams cad rdzogs pA haM yig gi bdag nyid chos kyi
151a6(rgyud 'grel): dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin 'og nas phyag 'tshal ba'i skabasu 'chad pa'i dpal dus kyi 'khor lo te/ 'on kyang phyag nyi shu rtsa drug pa phyag lhag ma gnyis kyis glang po che'i pags pa 'dzin pa la
151b1(rgyud 'grel): khwa dog sngar po zhabs brkyang bskum du bzhugs pa/ zhal gcig ma spyan gsum ma/ phyag gnyis kyi gri gug dang thod pa bsnams pa/ phyag rgya lngas spras pa'i sna tshogs yum gyi mgul nas 'khyud pa/ sbrul
151b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyun gyis brgyan pa/ stag gi sham thabs sbyangs pa/ khro bo'i dab po rdo rje shugasu bdag nyid bsgom// yang de nyid du gsungs pa ltar phyag rgya la sogs pa dgod pa las/ phyag rgya drug rlung gi lus la dgod pa/
151b3(rgyud 'grel): oM haM ha/ b+h+ra ma da r+thi Na kar+b+ha yor badz+rA kut+tA le hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ oM aM ar+thakA n+yai kAr+N+Ne badz+ra me khA badz+ra kar+t+ti ka huM hUM phaT phaT/ U A A b+h+ra mo da~Mk+Shi Na ka ra yor badz+ra ru tsa ko huM hUM phaT phaT/ oM ha hA bA myA dak+Shi Na pA d+yA
151b4(rgyud 'grel): yor badz+rA nA pu re huM hUM phaT phaT/ oM haM baM prany+tsa k+Sha rA mahA shU n+yai swa b+hA wa badz+ra shri ro ma Ni shi rA si sar+b+baM ge b+hasma huM hU~M phaT phaT/ oM aM ar+d+ha na ri shwa ra badz+rA r+d+ha tsan+d+ra badz+ra phaT TA/ ud+d+he huM hUM phaT phaT/ oM a aHoM
151b5(rgyud 'grel): sar+b+ba so rAM kau tr-i swa ra swa b+hA ba badz+ra ya dz+nye pA b+hI taM skan+te huM hU~M phaT phaT/ zhes pa ni phyag rgya drug gi cho ga'o// de nas 'chung par 'gyur ba'i glang po'i pags pa'i phyag rgya bzhi'i sngags rnams brjod parar+ya byA ste/ oM k+Sha
151b6(rgyud 'grel): dudrAn+na/ b+hI ma na k+Sha yaM ka re byA g+hA tsarma ka To huM hUM phaTaM phaT/ oM haM k+ShaHtr-i shat+sa ra sap+ti ti hraHswa ngiN+ya byany+dzan swa b+hA ba d+ye t+ya ku la sha ta si ro b+hirmur+N+Na mA la skan+d+ha bo liM bi ni skan+d+he huM hUM phaT phaT/ oM ha hi ts+tshi hu hUM pany+tsa swan+d+ha
152a1(rgyud 'grel): bi shud d+ha s+yA b+hA bA shI ra sri kra pA la mA le huM hUM phaT phaT/ zhes pa ni phyag rgya bzhi'i cho ga'o// de ltar phyag rgya bcu rnams pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i dbye ba dang / gnas bcu drug gi dbye bas spyod pa
152a2(rgyud 'grel): nyid bcu drug ces pa ni phyag rgya dgod pa'i cho gla'i rim pa'o// de nas g.yon dang g.yas kyi phyag mtshan gyi sa bon rnams brjod par bya ste/ oM k+ShaHkro d+ha badz+ra hu~M phaT/ oM k+ShaHkhaD+ga huM phaTaHUM k+ShiMHbadz+ro tri shru
152a3(rgyud 'grel): la hUM phaT/ oM k+ShaHbadz+ri kar+t+ta ri huM phan+tu/ oM k+ShAHbadz+ra bA Na hUM phaT/ oM Sh+TaHbadz+nyA ku nr-i huM phaT/ oM k+ShAHbadz+ra Da mya ru ka huM phaT/ oM T+TAHbadz+ra mud+ga ra hUM phaT/ oM ny+dzaT+Tebadz+rA tsAkra huM phaT/ oM k+SheHbad+d+he kun
152a4(rgyud 'grel): hUM phAT+Ta/ oM T+TaHb+hUdz+dza dar+N+Na huM phaT/ oM Sh+TaHb+haidz+nyA pa ra shu huM phaT/ zhes pA rnams ni g.ya s+ye kyi phyag mtshan rnamaso// de nus g.yon gyi phyag mtshan rnams ni/ dang por haM yig brjod par bya// oM hUM badz+ra
152a5(rgyud 'grel): gar+b+he ho pheM phaT/ oM haM badz+ra khe tra ho pheM phaT/ oM hUM badz+ra kA pa lu ho pheM phaT/ oM haM badz+ra tsa pa ho pheM phaT/ oM hU~M badz+ra pA shwa ho pheM phaT/ oM hU~M badz+ra rat+na ho pheM phaT/ oM hUM badz+ra pad+ma ho pheM phaT/ oM hUM badz+ra shaM
152a6(rgyud 'grel): kha ho pheM phaT/ oM hU~M badz+rA da ru'o pheM phaT/ oM hU~M badz+ra br-i khe lho po phaT/ oM hAM tsa turbe ta swa b+hA ba brah+ma shi ra ho pheM phaT/ zhes pa rnams phyag g.yon pa rnamasu mtshan ma dgod pa'i rim pa'o// de nas glang
152b1(rgyud 'grel): sasu sa dusam+b+ha r+m+ma rgyun rgyun ga rgyu rgyun tu d+hA d+hA/ mA du sa m+b+ha glu r+dz+dzad+hA rbAnA/ b+hU klu ga gas
152b2(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas nas bzung ba ni/ g.yas kyi mgro bo'i phyogs kyi lag pa dang / g.yon gyi rkang pa de nas bzung bar bsdam pa ni pags pa bzung byi'i rim pa'i cho ga'o// de nas klu'i rgyal po bcu dgod pa'i sngags ni/
152b3(rgyud 'grel): oM hu~M badz+ra dzaM ya nA gen+d+ha bar+d+ha dza TA mu ku n+yA b+han+d+he tiSh+Tha tiSh+Te huM hUM phaT phAT/ oM N+yai badz+ra bi dza yA nA gen+d+ha badz+rI pan+d+ha b+hAn+d+he tISh+Tha tiSh+Tha huM hUM phaT phaT/ A~M h+yaM d+hA badz+ra karko Ta ka badz+ra pad+mo b+h+ra maM dak+Shi Na kuN+Da la~M y+yaHtiSh+Tha tISh+ThA hUM hUM phaT
152b4(rgyud 'grel): phaT/ oM hUM h+na badz+rA ba su ki shaM khA pA l-i bA maM dak+Shi Na ru tsa kaM yoM/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha huM hUM phaT phaT/ oM hUM hA badz+ra nan+te ku l-i kau me khA la kaN+Tha ka yoHtiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha huM hUM phaT phaT/ oM hAM h+na badz+ra t+ya k+Sha ko ma hA pad+mo bA ma daShI Na pA rA rU pu
152b5(rgyud 'grel): ra yo/ tISh+Thi tauSh+Tha hu~M hUM phaT phaT/ de ltar sngags dang phyag rgya dgod par byas la/ mkha'agro ma rnams dang bcas pa'i rkang pa bcu drug pas bsdams pa rnams bskrang pA dang / bdud la sogs pa bskrad pa'i sngags dus kyi
152b6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo'i sngags pas yang nas yang du bzlas pa 'od lta ste/ oM na mo badz+ra satwA ya/ na mo bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwe b+h+yaHna mo badz+ra kro d+hen+da rA dze b+h+ya/ na mo bi shwa mA tre/ na mo bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwa de bi b+h+ya/ na mo badz+ra DA ki nI b+h+ya/ oM na mo b+ha ga pa
153a1(rgyud 'grel): te kA la tsak+ShA ya/ badz+ra bai ra bA b+hI ka R+Sha ya ma hen+na nI la bar+N+Na sha ba rI R+Sha yA/ mA ra kle sha hri da yA g+hAn+ta s+thi ta rak+ta tsa raNA ya/ kr-iSh+Ta rak+ta si tA kar+N+Na ya Ni la si ta b+hi ta rak+ta daMny+dzA ka ra lo gra b+hI Sha Na mu khA ya/ kr-ISh+Ta
153a2(rgyud 'grel): rak+tA saM ta sa b+he t+yA ra kan+d+ha ye/ d+hA daM sha d+hA dza ya/ ts+tsho sha ti kAn+ta yaM/ baidz+dza Shanr-i d+hib+hU lAM kar+Na rI b+hUdz+dza aM ku shai TA mA ruM kaM mud+dA ra tsaH kAr+N+Na dar+m+ma par+N+Na badz+dza g+hartA khe Ta ad+d+haM gA ka pA l+ra ts+tsha b+ha b+h+raM sher d+h+waka ma la khA A d+hAR+YA
153a3(rgyud 'grel): kho la brah+ma shr-i ro gA dza tsi ra ma d+hIk+Sh+Na rA ya/ b+hug+d+ha tsarmA NI ba sa nA ya/ kAn+te mur+b+ham+b+ha lAM bA liM bi na shi ra si bad+d+haM phaT mu ku Te badz+ri kA pA lA ma lUr+d+ha tsin+na d+h+r-i rA yaM/ kuN+Du la ruM tsa ka kud+d+hi ka maM kha wA nA pU raM b+hasma yAdz+nyo pA b+hI tI shi ro ma Ni
153a4(rgyud 'grel): mahA mu drA nA gren+d+ha bi b+hU Sha N+DA ya/ badz+ra Da kiM nAM saM to Shi ta hr-i da yA ya/ its+tshits+tshi ya ma nAM ri t+ya bA ru N+ya bA yu ku be re shA n+yA br-ih+ma biSh+Nu bi nA yA kA karti ki yaM nan+di ma hA kA laM gra ha nar+Na trar+Ne tr-i pA lA/ su b+h+yAM su rain+ti pa NI da d+hA ten+na na rIn+d+ha saMs+yA ta
153a5(rgyud 'grel): tsa ra t+na ya~M/ zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi rkang pa bcu drug pa'i sngags// bdud rigs brgya'i phreng ba'i sngags kyi sa bo n-i rnams ni gong du sngags brjod pa'i skabasu bshad pas 'dir ma bri sa// rkang bya bdun cu rtsa gnyis pa ni
153a6(rgyud 'grel): gzhung ches dogs pas ma briso// de nas rdo rje dgod par bya ba de nyid gsungs pa ltar dpal dang ldan pa'i yan lag rnams la dgod pa ni dpral bar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dkar po la oM yig dgo // mgrin par nyi ma'i
153b1(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor dmar po la AHyig dgo // snying gar sgra gargyan gyi dkyil 'khor nag po la b+h+rUM yig dgod// lte byar dus me'i dkyil 'khor ser po la ho yig dgo do// gtsug tror dang gsang bar rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam
153b2(rgyud 'grel): par shes pa dang ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor ljang gu dang sngon po la haM k+ShaHdgo // de ltar dkyil 'khor drug bsgoms la dkyil 'khor de rnams nyid la rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du sa dron de rnams yongasu gyur pA las rdo rje
153b3(rgyud 'grel): rnams tAM/ rtse mo bcu bdun pA dang / rtse mo sum+b+ha cu so gsum pa dang / rtse mo dgu paM dang / rtse mo drug cu rtsa lnga pa dang / rtse mo lnga pa dang / yang rtse mo sum cu gsum pa zhes pa ste/ rdo rje rnams kyang se se'i dkyil
153b4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gyi kha dog dang 'dra bar ji ltar gsungs pa'i tshad ltar bsgom par bya ste/ yang de nyid nas gsungs pa ltar rdo rje nor bu rnam par dag pa sbyor gcig bsgom par bya'o// spyi gtsug gi 'khor lo rnam par dag pa sor
153b5(rgyud 'grel): gnyis pa'o// dpral ba'i 'khor lo rnam par dag pa sor bzhi pa'o// mgrin pa'i 'khor lo rnam par dag pa sngor lnga pa'o// snying ga'i 'khor lo rnam par dag pa sngor brgyad pa'o// lte bu'i 'khor lo rnam par dag pa
153b6(rgyud 'grel): sor dgu pa'o// gsang gnas kyi 'khor lo rnam par dag pa sor bcu gnyis pa'o// de nas g.yon gyi dpung mgo'i tshig la nga de d+l-i du d+l-i ngaM/ g+ha g+hi g+h+r-i g+hu g+h+r-i g+haM/ ga gi g+h+r-i gu glai gaM/ khaM khi khI khu khr-i khaM/ ka ki k+ShaM ku kl-i ka
154a1(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa na mkha' la sogs pa ste/ thung du drug gi dbye ba dang / ka'i sde tshan yongasu gyur pa rdo rje rtse mo sum cu rtsa gcig pa bsgom par bya'o// de nas dpung g.yo g.yas pa'i tshigs la
154a2(rgyud 'grel): mrAHgr-I g+hag+h+nAM bI b+h+yAM/ kyAt+mag+h+r-i k+Sh+ya b+h+r-i k+ShI stAM/ b+hUH g+hA g+h+r-i b+hU g+h+raM/ b+hAHb+hi k+ShAb+h+yAM gI b+h+yAM/ dz+raHdz+dzA d+hudz+ha d+h+ri d+h+waM/ zhes pa ni sa la sogs pa ste ring po drug gri dbye ba dang / g+huH'i sde tshun yongasu gyur pa las rdo rje rtse mo sum cu so gcig pa byas mo//
154a3(rgyud 'grel): de ltar las kyi 'khor lo bcu gnyis rnams laM rdo rje bsgom parabye ste/ de yang de nyid du gsungs pa ltar gru mo g.yon pa la tsa'i sngo tshan thung ngu'i bdag nyid// gru mo g.yas pa la ring po'i bdag nyid // de ltar g.yon pa'i
154a4(rgyud 'grel): mkhrig ma'i tshigs la Ta'i sde chen thu du rnamaso// g.yas pa'i mkhrig ma'i tshogs la ring po rnamaso// g.yon gyi spyi mgo'i tshogs la pa'i sde chen thung ngu rnamaso// g.yas kyi spyi mgo'i tshigs la ring po rnamaso// pus mo
154a5(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pa'i tshigs la ta'i sde tshan thung ngu rnamaso// pus mo g.yas pa'i tshigs la ring po rnamaso// long bu g.yon pa'i tshigs la sa'i sde tshunu thung ngu rnams kyi rang bzhino// long bu g.yas pa'i tshigs la ring po'i bdag
154a6(rgyud 'grel): nyid// zhes pa ni tshigs rnams la rdo rje dgod pa'i cho ga'o// rdo rje de rnams kyang na mkha' la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshad dang mnyam pa/ de nyid kyis bsgom par bya'o// de nas rim pa de bzhin bya ba'i 'khor lo rnams la/
154b1(rgyud 'grel): lag pa g.yon pa'i muthe chung nas brtsams te/ rtsa ba'i tshigs rnams lnga thung ngu drug gi dbye bas ka'i sde tshan nga la sogs bya drug drug las byung ba'i rtse mo bdun bdun dang ldan pa'i rdo rje lnga bsgom par bya'o// dwem+b+ha
154b2(rgyud 'grel): g.yas kyi many+dzu bo'i tshogs steng myA nas bar+d+ha mu s+yA te/ tshigs lha la ring po drug drang ldan+d+ra pa'i grwa la sogs pa drug drug yongasu g+hu r+ya pa lAste rdo rje rnam so// g.yon gyi sor mo'i dbus kyi tshogs rnams lA tsa'i sde tshun
154b3(rgyud 'grel): thung ngu'i bdag nyid las rdo rje rnamaso// g.yon gyi sor mo'i dbus kyi tshig rnams la ring po'i bdag nyid rnams laso// g.yon gyi sor mo'i steng gi tshigs lwa Ta'i sde tshan thung ngu'i bdag nyid rnamaso// g.yas kyi sor mo'i rtsa
154b4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i tshigs rnams la ring po'i bdag nyid la so// rkang pa g.yon gyi sor mo'i tshigs rnams lnga snga ma ldar pa'i sde chen thung ngu rnams kyis bdag nyid laso// rkang pa g.yas pa'i tshigs rnams la snga mA ltar ring po rnams kyi
154b5(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid laso// de nas g.yon pa'i tshigs rnams snga ma ltar ta'i sde tshan thung ngu rnams kyi bdag nyid lngaso// g.yas pa la ring po'i bdag nyid laso// de ltar g.yon pa'i tshigs rnams la s+ya'i sde tshan thung ngu'i
154b6(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid rnams laso// g.yas pa'i tshogs la ring po'i bdag nyid las rdo rje rnams te rim pa bzhin sde tshan rnams yongasu dag pa la ljang gu dang / nag po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / ser po'i kha dog
155a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams// so so'i tshigs kyi tshad kyiso// de nas rna ba la sogs pa'i rdo rje dgod pa ni/ de nyid las gsungs pa ltar/ rna ba dag tu a A dag las rdo rje rtse gsum pa bsgom par bya'o// smyu bug dag
155a2(rgyud 'grel): tu I a dag laso// mig dag tu ar Ar dag laso// lce dang mchu dag la o au ngag laso// rdo rje dang gsang ba dag la al Al dag laso// yid dang khu ba 'dzag pa'i rtsa dag la aM aHngag laso+o te/ 'di rnams
155a3(rgyud 'grel): kyang rim pa ji lta ba bzhin kha dog gi g.yo ba dang ldan par sor gcig gi tshad kyiso// yang de nyid du gsungs pa ltar rna ba la rdo rje sor gcig pa zhes paso// de nas gtsug tor la sogs pa rnams la rdo rje dgod pa ni/ de
155a4(rgyud 'grel): yang de nyid las gsungs pa ltar gtsug tor dang mgo bo dag la h+yA hA dag las dz+yor+d+he rtsi lnga pa'o// lce dang rkan dag la yA yA dag las rdo rje rtse lnga pa'o// lag mthil dag la ra rA dag laso// rkang mthil dag la wa wA
155a5(rgyud 'grel): dag lngaso// 'phongs kyi glayas g.yon drag la la lha ngag laso// de ltar rdo rje'i lusu bdag nyid bsgom par bya ba ni/ de rnams kyi gtsug tor la sogs pa rnam par dag pa gsungs pa'i mtshan nyid// de nas
155a6(rgyud 'grel): bdud kyi tshogs bsreg pa ni/ de yang de nyid nas gsungs pa ltar/ de rnams las 'od zer 'phros pas rdo rje 'bar bas phyogs bcu na gnas pa'i bdud kyi tshogs sems can rnams la rnam par 'tshe ba rnams
155b1(rgyud 'grel): bsregs nas/ steng du ljang gu 'byung ba dang / 'og tu sngon po 'bur ba dang / shar dang shar lhor nag po 'bar ba dang / lho dang bden bral du dmar po 'bar ba dang / byang dang dbang ldan du dkar po 'bar ba
155b2(rgyud 'grel): dang nubA dang nub byang du ser po 'bar ba dang zheso// bdud kyi tshogs bsregs pa'i sngags brjod par bya ste/ oM AHhUM ho haM k+ShaHhraHhraHhraHhraN+Dar ra rA ru/ badz+ra a nau la sar+b+ba ba ra Na d+har+m+ma pra lA yA s+yA b+hA ba saH
155b3(rgyud 'grel): mA ra k+Sha yi ka big+h+na bi nA yau kA d+ha nAM da sha dig+hA tA naM kA ya bak+ShIt+tA ni/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsaM b+hasmi ku ru ku ru hUM hUM phoT phaT zhes pa ni bdud rnams rnam par sreg pa'i cho ga'o// de nas lus dang ngag dang yid kyi chos
155b4(rgyud 'grel): rnam par dag pa gzhal yas khang ra ba gsum dang / ra ba lnga rnams kyis nang dang / phyi rol bsrung ba'i don du/ khro bo la sogs pa rnams rim pa ji lta ba bzhin spro bar bya'o// de nas yang de
155b5(rgyud 'grel): nyid nas gsungs pa ltar dang por rdo rje shugasu bdag nyid bsgoms la/ de nyid kyi thugs kar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor lha h+ya yA ra wa la rnams brtsegs pa'i gzugasu bas mo// de'i steng du hA las byung ba'i 'chad par
155b6(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ba'i phyag dang mtshan ma dang zhal rnams dang ldan pa'i sku mdog ljang gu sna bug g.yon pa nas spros te/ gtso bo'i dbu'i steng du gzhal yas khang gi nang du zla ba 'am nyi ma'i steng du gtsug tor can
156a1(rgyud 'grel): g.yas brkyang du bzhugs pa'o// de ltar hA yig ring po las byung ba'i gnod mdzes rgyal po kha dog sngon po sna bug g.yas nas bton nas rdo rje'i sa gzhi'i steng du nyi ma 'am zla ba la dgodado//
156a2(rgyud 'grel): de ltar yi yig las byung ba'i bgegs mthar byed kha drog nag po/ sna bug g.yon nas byung nas shar phyogasu zla ba 'am nyi ma la dgod par bya'o// de ltar yI yig las yongasu rdzogs pa'i dbyug sngon can kha dog
156a3(rgyud 'grel): nag po sna bug g.yas nas bton te/ me'i mtsham su nyi ma 'am zla ba la dgod do// r-I yig las byung ba'i shes rab mthar byed sku mdog dmar po mig g.yon nas bton nas lho phyogasu zla bya 'am/ nyi ma la
156a4(rgyud 'grel): dgod do// de ltar r-I yig lngas yongasu rdzogs pa'i 'dod pa'i rgyal po dmar po mig g.yas nas bton te bden bral du nyi mAM 'am zla ba la dgod par bya'o// de ltar zhu yig las yongasu rdzogs pa'i pad+ma mthar
156a5(rgyud 'grel): byed dkar po lce las bton te/ byang du zla ba 'am nyi mA la dgod do// wu yig las yongasu rdzogs pa'i mi g.yo ba dkar po dri chu'i lam nas bA ton+ma te/ dbang ldan gyi mtsham su zla ba 'am nyi ma la dgod do// l-i
156a6(rgyud 'grel): yig las yongasu rdzogs pa'i gshin rje mthar byed ser po chu min gyi lam nas bton te/ nub phyogasu zla ba 'am nyi ma la dgod do// de ltar l-i yig las yongasu rdzogs pa'i stobs po che ser po rdo rje gtsug tor
156b1(rgyud 'grel): nas bton te/ rlung gi mtsham su zla ba 'am nyi ma la dgod par bya'o// yang na bsdus pa'i rgyud kyi rjesu 'brangs nas thams cad nyi ma'i gdun la bzhugs pa ste/ dus kyi 'khor lo dgod pa'o// de nas
156b2(rgyud 'grel): gzhal yas khang gi phyi rol du zad par na mkha' la sogs pa spro ba ste/ de yang de nyid las gsungs pa lhur thugs kar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la nga nya NA ma nu rnams brtsegs pa'i gzugs sku bsgoms la da hA
156b3(rgyud 'grel): las yongasu rdzogs pa'i zad par na mkha' sngon du bshad pa'i sgo rnams nas bton te/ gzhal yas khang gi steng dang gnod mdzes rgyal po'i 'og tu stong pa'i dkyil 'khor la bsgom par bya'o// de ltar nyi ny+dzi dag las
156b4(rgyud 'grel): yongasu rdzogs pa'i zad par rlung shar dang me mtsham su rlung gi dkyil 'khor la bsgom par bya'o// de ltar NA~M NAM dag las yongasu rdzogs pa'i zud par mye lho dang bden bral du me'i dkyil 'khor la bsgom par bya'o// de ltar
156b5(rgyud 'grel): mu mU dag las yongasu rdzogs pa'i zad par chu// byang dang drabang ldan gyi mtsham su tshu'i dkyil 'khor la bsgo mu par bya'o// de ltar NAM NA~M dgra lwa yongasu rdzogs pa'i zad par rlung shar dang me mtsham su sa'i dkyil 'khor la
156b6(rgyud 'grel): bsgom par bya'o// de ltar g+ha dz+ha D+ha b+ha d+ha rnams brtsegs pa'i yi ge bsgoms la de rnams las phyogs skyong bcu spro ba ni/ g+ha b+hA dag las yongasu rdzogs pa'i tshangs pa dang khyab 'jug ljang gu dang sngon po/ ngang pa dang bya khyud la
157a1(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa/ rA ba la phyogs pa/ steng du bla khyud la gnas pa/ ra ba la phyogs pa/ steng du tshangs pa/ 'og tu khyab 'jug// de nasA dz+haiM d+hI dag las yongasu rdzogs pa'i bden bral dang rlung
157a2(rgyud 'grel): dgaHkha dog nag po/ yi dgas dang ri dgas la gnas pa shar drang me mtshams su'o// de ltar lho dang bden bral du/ nr-i NA~M las yongasu rdzogs pa'i gshin rje dang mI lha/ kha dog dmar po ma he dang lug la gnas
157a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// de ltar byang dang dbang ldan du b+hu d+hU dag las yongasu rdzogs pa'i rgya mtsho byad byed/ kha dog dkar po chu srin dang khyu mchog la gnas pa'o// de ltar nub dang rlung ngu d+h+r-i d+h+r-i dag las yongasu rdzogs pa'i dbang po dang
157a4(rgyud 'grel): glaganod sbyin/ kha dog ser po glang po che dang bi ma na la gnas pa'o// de ltar phyogs sbyong rnams ra ba'i nang du bsgoms par bya'o// de nas ra ba bsrung bya'i don du bza' rnams bsgom par bya'o// sngon du gsungs pa'i
157a5(rgyud 'grel): nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la/ ga dza Da ba nga rnams brtsags pa'i tshul du gnas pa las/ ga gA dag las yongasu rdzogs pa'i sgra gcan dang dus me/ stong pa'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa/ ra ba gsum la phyogs pa
157a6(rgyud 'grel): steng dang 'og tu na mkha'i dkyil 'khor la'o// de ltar dzi dz+r-IM dag las yongasu rdzogs pa'i zla ba dang nyi ma'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa/ shar dang me mtsham su dgo do// nr-i ts+tsho dag las yongasu rdzogs pa'i gza'
157b1(rgyud 'grel): lag dang bkra shis/ mye'i dkyil 'khor la glanas pa/ lho dang bden bral du dgod// de ltar bu b+hu dag las yongasu rdzogs pa'i pA wa sangs dang phur bu chu yi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa/ byang dang dbang ldan dag tu'o//
157b2(rgyud 'grel): de ltar dr-i d+h+r-i dgu las yongasu dag pa'i 'jug rings dang spen pa/ sa'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa nub dang rlung dag tu s+t+wa~M/ 'di rnams ni ra ba'i phyi rol tu bsrung ba'i don du gza'i tshogs rnams bsgom pa'o// de nas ra bA
157b3(rgyud 'grel): lnga bsrung ba'i don du gza' chags rnams bsgom pa'o// de nas ra ba lnga bsrung bar bya ba'i don du klu'i rgyal po rnams spro byar bya ste/ sngon du gsungs pa ltar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la kha tsha dza phra tha rnams brtsegs pa'i
157b4(rgyud 'grel): tshul du bsams nas kha khA dag las yongasu rdzogs pa'i rgyal ba dang rnam par rgyal ba/ ra ba lnga la phyogs pa steng dang 'og na mkha'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'o// de ltar chi tshwa dag las yongasu rdzogs pa'i karko Ta dang
157b5(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma dag/ shar drang ma mtsham su rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'o// de ltar dz+haiM Sh+T+r-i dag las yongasu rdzogs pa'i chu bdag dang dung skyong / lho dang bden bral du me'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'o// de phu phru dag las
157b6(rgyud 'grel): yongasu rdzogs pa'i dga' bo dang rigs ldan/ byang dang dbang ldan du chu'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'o// de ltar bru~M shrI ngag las yongasu rdzogs pa'i pad+ma chen po dang 'jog po nub dang rlung dag tu/ sa'i dkyil 'khor la
158a1(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'o// de nas ra ba lnga'i phyi rol du bsrung ba'i don du 'byung po lha mA yin rnams bsgom par bya ste/ sngon du gsungs pa ltar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la ka tsa Ta pa tA rnams brtsegs pA'i
158a2(rgyud 'grel): tshul du byasam pa ste/ de nas kyang rwa ba la phyogs pa steng dang 'og tu ka k+Sha dag las yongasu rdzogs pa'i ro langs dang ka sha mun+ta/ nA mkha'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'o// de ltar tsi tsI dag las yongasu rdzogs pa'i rI nA ra
158a3(rgyud 'grel): dang kiM pu ru la khyi dang bya rog gi gdong can dang / shar dang mer rlung gi dkyil 'khor la dgodo// de ltar TI m+b+hi dag las yongasu rdzogs pa dri zla dang 'byung po/ phag pa dang bya rgod kyi gdong pa can/ lho dang bden bral du me'i
158a4(rgyud 'grel): dkyilnga 'khor la dgau do// de ltar pu pU dag las yongasu rdzogs pa srin po dang yi dgas/ stag dang 'ug pa'i gdong can byang dang dbang ldan du chu'i dkyil 'khor la dge do// de ltar tr-i trA~M las yongasu rdzogs pa'i brjed byed ce
158a5(rgyud 'grel): spyang gi gdong pa dang / bya khyung gi gdong can/ nub dang rlung du sa'i dkyil 'khor lnga dgodado// de rnams thams cad shes rab dang ldan pa'o// yang de nyid du gsungs pa ltar ye shes dang / nam mkha' dang rlung dang / me drang chu dang
158a6(rgyud 'grel): sa rnams khams drug las byung ba'i khro bo'i rgyal po rnams dang / gzugs med dang / gzugs dang / phyogs bcu skyong ba dang / gza' rnams dang / klu rnams dang 'byung po rnams sde tshan drug gi bdag nyid srung zhing skyong ba
158b1(rgyud 'grel): bI dang nad rnamasu kha sbyor du gnas pa rnal 'byor pas dgodado// de nas bgegs drang log 'dren la stsogs pa rnams gsal gdab par bya ba ni/ de yang de nyid du gsungs pa ltar de las gzhan pa bgegs dang log
158b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dren la sogs pa rnams rdo rje lcags kyus khug cig/ rdo rje zhags pas chings shig/ khro bo'i rgyal po rdo rje phur bu rtse mo mdung gi rnam pa rnams gnas bcur sdang ba lA btab par bas mo// sngags rnams
158b3(rgyud 'grel): khA dog lnga dang ldan+da pi ste/ oM s+yAMHhuM ho hiH/ hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT badz+rA kI la k+Sha ya b+hUN+yat+ta dz+nyA nA d+hI pa twe ShAr+N+Na kha ShAts+tshu dza Shar+thAr+Na tsa ra Na sarba b+hig+h+na b+hi nA yA k+ShA d+hi duSh+mA naMk+ShA ya bAklit+ta dz+nyA nA ni kI la ya k+Shi lA hUM hUM phaT phaT/
158b4(rgyud 'grel): skyes pa n-i gdab po'i sngag so// oM smr-i badz+ra s+'ut+pA ra/ ts+tshin shwe ts+tsha swaM kAdz+nyAM N-i dA li/ n+na dz+haiM Sh+T+r-i oMts+tsha badz+dza d+hI akA~Mn+na k+Sha TAs+yA krIn+d+ha y+ya/ b+hUr+t+ti r-its+tshi dza~M d+h+r-i d+hIb+h+yar+m+mA panA~M phaT/ zhes pa nI 'dzung d+ha'i
158b5(rgyud 'grel): so// de nas nga rgyal byas nas phur bu rnams bsrung ba'i don du/ khro bo bcu la bka' bsgo ba ni/ de'i don du dpal dus kyi 'khor lho'i rgyud kyi rgyal por gsungs pa/ srong pa gsum gyi gnasu dbyug sngon can gyis
158b6(rgyud 'grel): bdud rnams ma lus brdung bar byed par 'gyuraro// dus mtha' nyi ma dang mtshungs khro bo mi g.yo ba yis 'ching ste phur 'debs shin tu brtson 'gruso// DA kis de yi brtson 'grus 'jig rten sa stangs gyur par gnod
159a1(rgyud 'grel): mdzes rgyal pos nges par byed pa'o// gtsug tor can gyis de yi rdzu 'phrul 'jig ste nges par khro bo'i lha mo rnams kyi snga mya bzhin du'o zhes paso// oM ts+yai kro d+hin+do haM/ kro d+ha nAM mAdz+nyA d+hA
159a2(rgyud 'grel): ya ka swA hA/ de nas khro bo rnams la so so'i sngags kyi rkang pas bka' bsgo ba/ oM hUM badz+ra kro d+ha rA dz+nyA ma hob+h+r-i Shor+d+ha di shi rak+Sha ku ru ku ru swA hA/ oM yaM badz+ra kro d+hA rA dzA ti ba la sarba big+ha nAn+ta ka pUr ba di shi rASh+Ti
159a3(rgyud 'grel): ku ru ku ru s+thA hA/ oM raM badz+ra kro d+ha rA dzaM dzAm+b+ha kA duSh+ya pradz+nyAn+na tA kA da Shi Na di shI rak+ShAM ku ru gu ru swA hA/ oM wA badz+ra kro d+ha rI dza bi ra ga pad+mAn+ta kot+tA ra di shi rak+ShAM ku ru ku ru swA hA/ oM la badz+ra kro d+ha rA dza staM b+hak+Sha ya man+ta ka pa k+ShI ma
159a4(rgyud 'grel): dwidr-ishai rAdz+dzu smai ru ku ru swA hA zhes pa yang ngo nyid las/ oM l-IHbadz+ra kro d+ha rI dzi ma hUM bi liM b+hA ya byAM di shI r+yAD+b+h+yAM su ru ku ru swAhwA/ oM wAMHbadz+ra kro d+ha r+the dz+nyA tsa laM sha nr-i daM shi rASh+TaM gu ru ku ru swAhA/ oM rUHbadz+rI kro d+ha d+hA dz+nyA \u0f7f\u0f7f/
159a5(rgyud 'grel): nai r-i dz+nyA di shi rak+ShAM ku ru ku ru s+thAh+ma/ oM swAHbadz+ra kro d+ha rA dza nI l+ya dud+b+hag+ne yaM di shi ra NaM ku ru gu ru s+yAhAM/ oM hU~MHbadz+re kr-I d+hu rA dza sum b+hU dz+yo ti raH ku ru ku ru s+yAt+su/ zhes pa'i sngags kyi rka pa 'di rnams ni/ rgyud kyi sgrub
159a6(rgyud 'grel): thabs las gsungs po'i tshi gros sngags pas dgodang par bya'o// dri nas oM sarba t+yathA gr-i tA pa~M sa d+hu hU~Md+hU '-i kyi zhes brjod la de rgyal bya'o// 'dzin bsrung ba'i 'khor mo'i cho ga'o// de nas sbyong pa nyid du
159b1(rgyud 'grel): nAnus bdag nyid gsung bar 'gyur ba'i bcom ldan 'das dus kyi 'khor lo/ zhal dang phyag bzhugs tshul rnamasu skad cig gis bsams la/ de yang de nyid las gsungs pa ltar bdag nyid skad cig
159b2(rgyud 'grel): gis lha'i skur bsgoms nas/ rang gri snying gar paM yig yongasu gyur pa las pad+ma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa/ de'i lte ba'i steng du AM yig yongasu gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i dbusu de kho na zhes
159b3(rgyud 'grel): pa ni/ hUM las byung ba'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa de la kha dog lnga dang ldan pa'i 'od zer 'phro ba rnal 'byor pas bsgom par bya'o// de'i 'od zer gyis thog ma med pa'i sngon du sangs rgyas pa'i drang po'i sangs rgyas kyi dkyil
159b4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gyi 'khor lo spyan drungs te/ nam mkha'i dbus na bzhugs pa la/ rnal 'byor pas mchod cing phyag 'tshal ba ni/ sgrub thabs kyi tshig rab tu bsdus par bya ba'i phyir dang / dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo
159b5(rgyud 'grel): bsgom pa rjesu bsgrub pa'i phyir phyag btsal ba'i tshigasu bcad pa rnams 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas rnams dang rgyal sras khro bo phyogs skyong klu rnams dang ni de rnams kyi// lha mo'i tshogs dang rgyas 'debs
159b6(rgyud 'grel): bdag dang mched po'i lha mo rnams la phyag 'tshalo// gang zhig brjod par gyur pa'i zhal gyis grangs rnams g.yas bskor gyis ni go bya ste// g.yas dang g.yen gyis rtsa ba'i phyag na chu skyes dang ni rang
160a1(rgyud 'grel): mtshan g+ho bar bya// sna tshogs pad+ma zla ba nyi ma sgra gcan dus me 'phrog byed zhal gcig kha dog dkar// rig byed phyug na rtse gsum nA ma ru dang dpal gyi dung drung khats+tsha gA 'dzin pa'o//
160a2(rgyud 'grel): rtse mo can gyi mig ldan g.yon du gon rmya lI bsgyel pa gnas te g+hayA su dran pa nyid// kha dog dmar blo 'dab lha lcags kyu guzhu dong zhogs pa rnams dang bcas pa de dag la// gau ri dwaga' byed ma yis bzung
160a3(rgyud 'grel): ba dkar dang ba'i g.yas brkyang zhabs kyi snying gor mnan// sa bon hU~M yig dang ni rdo rje dag las byung ba'i ral pa'i thor tshugs skyon po can// mi skyod pa ste zhal gyi pad+ma sprin dang 'od ldan ri bong can rnams rgya
160a4(rgyud 'grel): mtsho mtshungs// dbus dang g.yas dang g.yon rnams sngon po dmar po dkar po rnams dang ldan pa'i mgrin gsum pa// g.yon gyi dpung pa'i rim bzhin dkar min dmar dang dkar ba rnams te g.yas pa'i
160a5(rgyud 'grel): dpung pa gsum// de bzhin yin te bcom ldan 'das kyis lhag bla zung gsum phyag gi mgo bzhi pa gsum// sor mo rnams ni gser drang nyi ma sbyin dang ljang gu 'thebs sogs rim pa bzhin//
160a6(rgyud 'grel): de rnams rtse mo dbus dang rtsa ba rnams kyi tshigs ni sprin dang nyi ma thig le rnams// mi mgo skam po lnga rnams kha dog lnga dang ldan pas nyid kyi dbu la brgyan// mgrin la mgul brgyan nyid dang
160b1(rgyud 'grel): sked la ska rags rna rgyan gyis ni rna ba la// lag pa dag la yid 'ong lag gdub nang pa dag lA rkang gdub mdzes pas spras// dbu la ngar dpyangs sku la thugs kar mchod phyir thob pa rnams kyis brgyan// so so'i zhal
160b2(rgyud 'grel): rnams spyan gsum dang ldan nor bu rdo rje zla// dbu nyid la ste mi mgo brgya yis phreng ba mgo 'dzin la gnas// stag gi sham thabs dang ljon rdo rje ral grwa rtse gsum gri gug/ mnga' dang lcags kyu cung te thod pa 'khor
160b3(rgyud 'grel): sngo dung rnams// dbyug pa dgra sta gulpAs mIn rnams te dril bu phuSh+Ta chung kha T+wAM ga dang thod pa mnga' gnas zhags pa rin chen// chu skyes dang ni dung dang mchog gi me long lcags sgog rig byed gdong ldan mgo bo rnams
160b4(rgyud 'grel): kyi phyag nyid rnams lnga mtshan// phreM yig gi gug las byung byed meng gzugs can+da sku mdog ser mo// dpal ldan dus kyi 'khor lo las gzhan bzhugs pas rab tu 'khyud pa// phyag rgya dang ldan+da klu yI phyag gis
160b5(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma sna tshogs sum gyi dbu la dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' tso ng+ga pan la gnas// gri gug lcags kyu cang te phreng ba rnams ni rim pa bzhin du// thod pa zhugs pa chu skyes ran chen rnams ni phyag gis 'dzin mya//
160b6(rgyud 'grel): gsor dang zla ba dang ni sprin dang nyi ma rnams dang ldan pa'i// gang zhig zhal bzhi rnams na me yi spyan dang rab tu ldan ma// aM yig rdo rje dag las byung ba'i rdo rje sems dpa' gang zhig ye shes rnam dag pa// sgo dang
161a1(rgyud 'grel): nyi ma zla ba'i zhal gsum spyan dgu rdo rje 'dug sbyangs gnas pa'i mnga' bdag nyid// rdo rje sngon po gri gug dgra stu dril bu thod pa tshangs mgo rnams ni rim pa bzhin// phyag drug las yin
161a2(rgyud 'grel): ral pa dang ldan sku la rdo rje dbyangs kyi dbang phyug mo yis 'khyud// shes rab pha rol phyin mas 'khyud pa'i rnam par shes pa dag pa'i bdag nyid mi bskyod ldang // a dang rdo rje drag las byung ba'i mi bskyod rdo rje
161a3(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa'i rnam pa dang ni mtshungs// mi bskyod rnam pa dang mtshungs A dang gri gug las byung rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug mu// AHdang gri gug las byung shes rab pha rolnga phyin ma rdo rje sems ma'i rnam pa
161a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin// dag pa'i lus la sna tshogs pa'i// yum gyis 'khyud pa 'gro ba'i yab// dpal ldan dus kyi 'khor lo gang // 'khor lo'i dbus gnas la phyag 'tshal// rin che nr-i gtsug ma dang mtshungs pa'i//
161a5(rgyud 'grel): nag mo 'bar mA la sogs pa// brgyad rnams zhal bzhi phyag brgyad ma// mnga' bdag pad 'dra ba rnams la gnas// a yig rnams kyi gsang ba'i thod pa las byung dpal nyid nAg mo 'bar ma mdun du gnas
161a6(rgyud 'grel): na bza' nag mo sbyin dang nyi ma gser dang ri bong can gyi zhal rnams ram bzhin// bdug spos dang ni tsan dan gur gum bla rtsi ga pur dang bcas pad+ma'i snod rnams dang // dril bu pad+ma lha shing me tog phreng ba gang las gang
161b1(rgyud 'grel): ba de nyid rnams la bstod// g.ya su a yig dang ni mar ma ngag las byung ba'i dmar po// 'bar ma nyi ma ser dang dkar dang nag po'i zhal dang ldan ma// phyag na mar me mu tig phreng ba ced pan lag gdub
161b2(rgyud 'grel): rnams dang // gos dang ska rags rna rgyan rkang gdub rnams dang ldan la phyag 'tshal// g.yon du aM yig dang ni lha bshos las byung ba'i// dkar mo 'bar ma dkar nag dmar ser zhul dang ldan// 'o ma
161b3(rgyud 'grel): chu dang sman dang tshad dang ro rnams dang bdud rtsi 'bras bu zan snod phyag ljon nyid la 'dung // chu bdag tu ni a yig ngag las byung ba'i ser mo 'bar ma// gser dang zla ba bung ba dang ni drong byed rnams dang ldan
161b4(rgyud 'grel): ma dung dang gling bu dang ni nor bu cang twe pI wad dang ni// rnga dang mchog gi mkhar rnga zangs dung phyug na bsnams la phyag 'tshalnga// ha hU haM hA/ rnams las byung ba'i ser dang dkar drang dmar dang bung ba'i kha
161b5(rgyud 'grel): dog ldan// rlung dab dbang ldan srin po me'i 'dab ma rnams la lha mo rnams te mar me ma// me khyer ma dang smig rgyu ma ste dpal gyi du bi ma yis phyag rnams ma lus pas// rim bzhin rnga yab 'dzin ma rang
161b6(rgyud 'grel): rang mdog mtshungs snga ma las byung rnams phyag 'tshalo// rtse mo can dang srin po dbang ldan rlung mtshams rnams la gnas pa// hUM yig las byung nor bu dang ni AHyig las byung gaN+DI// oM yig las byung chu
162a1(rgyud 'grel): skyong ho yig las byung dpag bsam shing rnams// byung ba'i zla bya nyi ma gser mchog 'od ldan rnams la phyag 'tshal// sangs rgyas zhal gsum phyag drug pa// spyan dgu pang dkar nyi ma
162a2(rgyud 'grel): la/ DA thams cad rdo rje'i 'dug stangs bzhugs// de rnams ral pa'i cod pan can// dbang po A yig ral gri dag las byung ba'i don yod grub pa// rlung dang 'du byed rang bzhin bung bA nyi ma dkar ba'i zhal ldan//
162a3(rgyud 'grel): ral gri dang ni g+h+ri gug rtse gsum phub chung thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM ga rnams// bsnams pa'i gar min spyan gsum ldan la phyag 'tshal// ga ya su ri yig rin chen los byung dpal ldan rin chen 'byung ldan// dam po
162a4(rgyud 'grel): me dang tshor ba'i rang bzhin nyi mA zla ba bung ba'i// zhal ldan bdag gri mi'i madri'u byadag mda' dang lcogus kyu cang te'u// gzhu dang rin chen zhags pa phyag na bsnams pa rnams la phyag 'tshal// g.yon du u yig
162a5(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma las byung 'od dpag med ni dkar po// chu dang 'du shes rang bzhin bdud rtsi 'od 'phro sprin dang nyi zhal// dpo ldan+da gos dkar mo yis spras pa tho bo mdung thung rtse gsum// chu skyes dkar po mi long phreng ba rnams
162a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal// rgyab tu l-i yig 'khor lo dag las byung ba'i rnam snang ser po// sa dang gzugs kyi rang bzhin gser dang zla ba nag po'i zhal ldan// sgrol mas spras po'i 'khor lo dang ni dbyug pa rdo rje bsnams
162b1(rgyud 'grel): dang / dpal gyi dung dang lcags sgrog dril bu phyug na 'dzin la bstod// srungs rgyas rnams mtshungs btsun mo rnams// pad+ma dmar dang zla ba la// thams cad pad+ma'i 'dug stangs bzhugs// kun+da la rin chen cod pan
162b2(rgyud 'grel): bsam// l-i yig 'khor lo dag las byung ba'i spyan ma sa khams rang bzhin// rnam par snang mdzad mtshungs dang don grub dang bcas rlung mtshams gnas dang / A yA pad+ma las byung bdag gi mA ste chu khams rang
162b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin// 'od dpag med mtshungs rin 'byung dang bcos dbang ldan gnas la phyag 'tshal// haM yig las byung rgyal ba'i bum pa mtshan nyid dang ldan dang lda su kyi 'khor lo yi// shar gyi sgo ru khro bo'i gdan gyi phyi ru pad+ma
162b4(rgyud 'grel): nyid la dgod par bya ba ste/ de ltar tsi yig las byung gti muge rdo rje'i g.yasu dgod de bzhin rin chen sogs// g.yas dgong hU~M tuSh+NI las byung bum pa de rnams la ni phyag 'tshalo// hU~M hU~M hrI hri lAs b+hu sh+tsai ba spyan sogs
162b5(rgyud 'grel): grus su rIm bzhin dgod// hUM yig lhas byung rnam rgyal bum pa sgo gzhan gnas la phyag 'tsha lo// sangs rgyas ji bzhin rgyal sras rnams// 'on kyang rin chen cod pan ldan// lho mi de bzhin lha mo rnamyos// de ltar
162b6(rgyud 'grel): rim bzhin rab tu gnas// a yig rdo rje dag las byung ba'i dpal ldan phyag na rdo rje thugs kar rdo rje nyid// sngon po bzung ba rna ba'i dbang po'i bdag nyid mnga' bdag mi bskyod pa dang mtshungs pa ste/ ljang gu lho'i sgo'i
163a1(rgyud 'grel): g.yon gyi brtsig pa'i drung du de'i gdanA dang mtshungs par bzhugs pa la// spyi bo sa la reg ste de'i zhabs la shin tu dga' bas rab tu phyag 'tshalo// e yig ral gri dag las byung ba'i
163a2(rgyud 'grel): nam+ba khA'i snying po don grub dang mtshungs sgra nyid kyi// dbang po'i radwa bzhin dpal gyi rdo rje ma bcas shor sgo'i g.yus na bzhugs pa la phyag 'tshal// Ar yi go rin chen lasna byung sa'i snang bai r+yan tshan las byung
163a3(rgyud 'grel): sa'i snying po rin chen dang mtshungs sku mdog dmar po nyid mig gi dbang po'i rang bzhin dpal ldan gzugs kyi rdo rje mar bcas lho sgo'i gnas dang / oM yig par 'byung 'jig rten dbang phyug 'od dpag med
163a4(rgyud 'grel): mtshungs ro rdo rjer// bcas dang lce dbang rang bzhin byang sgo'i g.ya su gnas la phyag 'tshalo// e la yig 'khor lo las byung sgrib pa rnam sel mdzes pa'i gser dang mtshungs pa yi// lus kyi dbang po'i rang bzhin
163a5(rgyud 'grel): dal ldan rgyal ba rnam par snang mdzad dang mtshung s+ho pA/ gang gi pang na reg bya rdo rje ma dang bAcasA pa nub sgo'i g.yas phyogs no// rgyun du yang dag gnas pa de la rtag tu gus pas rab tu phyag 'tshalo// aM yig
163a6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje ngag las byung ba'i kun tu bzang // sku la chos kyi dbyings kyis rdo rje ma yis 'khyud// yid kyi rang bzhin dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpar mtshungs// shar sgo'i g.yon du gnas pa la phyag 'tshal// a yig dang ni
163b1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dag lus byung ba'i sgra yI rdo rje mA ste sgra yi rang bzhin dang // dpal ldan phyag dang mtshungs shes rab pha rol phyin ma dang mtshungs byang sgo'i g.yon du gnas// Al yig dang ni 'khor lo dag las
163b2(rgyud 'grel): byung ba'i dri yi rdo rje ma ste dri'i rang bzhin dang // dpal ldan spyan ma dang mtshungs na mkha'i snying po dang mtshungs rlung mtshoms bzhugs la phyag 'tshulo// oM yig chu skye sa dag lus byung ba'i gzugs kyi rdo rje
163b3(rgyud 'grel): ma ste gzugs kyi rang bzhin dang // dpal ldan bdag gi ma mtshungs sa yi snying po dang bcas dpal ldan la gnas phyug 'tsha lo// ar yi ge dang ni rin chen las byung bI yi ro yI rdo rje maM ste ro yi rang bzhin dang /
163b4(rgyud 'grel): dpal ldan gos dkur mo mtshungs 'jig rten dbang po dang bcas bden blta la gnas phyag 'tsha lo// oM yig dang nI r+yal gri dag las byung ba'i reg bya rdo rje ma ste reg bya'i rang bzhin dang // sgrol ma drung mAtshungs
163b5(rgyud 'grel): sgrib pa rnam par sel dang bcas pa mye mtshams gnas la phyag 'tsha lo// A yig rdo rje lngas byung chos dbyings rdo rje ma ste rdo rje dbyings ma dang mtshungs ma// kun tu bzang po dang ni bcas pa nub sgo'i g.yon
163b6(rgyud 'grel): la gnas pa la ni phyag 'tshalo// khro rnams ral gcig ma la ser lag rkang bshad rang bzhin te// sangs rgyas sras rnams dang mtshungs pa// g.yas brkyang zhabs dang sbrul gyis brgyan// oM yig dang ni
164a1(rgyud 'grel): ral gri dag las byung ba'i bgrogs kyi dgra nyid na mkha'i snying po mtshungs// rengs byed ma ni m+bA rI tsi mtshungs spangs nas shar sgo'i dbu su chu skyes dkar po dang // nyi ma lnga gnas pa dang raM
164a2(rgyud 'grel): yig dbyug pa las byung shes rab mthar byed sa snying dang // mtshungs dang nga rgyal ma mtshungs btsun bcas lho phyogs la gnas ngag lnga phyag 'tsha lo// byung ska pad+ma zla ba la gnas waM yig chu skyes dag
164a3(rgyud 'grel): las byung ba'i pad+ma'i dgra/ 'jig rten dbang phyug dang mtshungs ma ni khri gnyer can ma dang ni mtshungs pa dang // lam yog tho ba las byung gshin rje'i dgra nyid sgrib pa sel mtshungs shin tu brtson 'grus mya// rdo
164a4(rgyud 'grel): rje lcags sgog drang ni mtshungs pa po gnas nub phyogs lha gnas zhabs la phyag 'tshalo// rdo rje dud dang gzer bu dang // dpal 'bras cod pan na bza' dang // de ltar phyag mtshan rnams las byung // so so'i
164a5(rgyud 'grel): ming gis mchod byed pa// ka tsa Ta pa ta sa sde tsha na thung ngu tshogs las byung ba yi// lha dang gshin rje la sogs g.yas kyi 'dod yin rnams dang steng dang 'og/ 'dir ni rim pa bzhin du glu ma dri ma spros ma gsol
164a6(rgyud 'grel): zas ma// lha mo sgeg mo gar ma ma lus phyag gnyis zla ba'i zhal dang ldan// pa Ta haM dang snong mar me// mu tig phreng dang phreng chu skyes// rim bzhin phyag mtshan las byung ba// lha mo thams cad sa bon mdog/
164b1(rgyud 'grel): swAsA NA b+hA nA ts+tsha k+Sha'i sde tshan ring po brtsegs pa gyur las byung ba yi// chu sogs g.yon gyi 'dod yon rnams dang steng dang 'og rnams lnga// de ltar rim pa bzhin du sgyu ma bzhad mA bdud rtsi ma rnams dang //
164b2(rgyud 'grel): mar mi ma dang phreng bA ma drang 'dod pa ma rnams lnga phyag 'tshal zhes pa ni thugs kyi 'khor lo la phyag btsal ba'i tshig su bcad pa'i rim pa'o// lha mo tsartsi ka sogs sra ga'i rkang thabs dang // zhal
