164b3(rgyud 'grel): gcig spyan gsum rig byed lhag dang ldan pa yi// lte ba'i pad+ma la gnas gshin rje rtsa rnams kyi// rnam par dag pa'i rin chen dang ldan cod pan can/ shAr du ha yig gri gug lngas byung tsartsi ka/ gri
164b4(rgyud 'grel): gug rtse gsum thod pa kha T+wAM nyid pA bsnams// phyag na 'dzin pa'i dbang po dang bcas gang yin pa// ro dang pad+ma dmar gnas la phyag 'tshal// tsartsi k+ka sogs pad+ma bsnams// rim pas chu tshod rtsa rang
164b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin// mdun nas g.yas bskor rim pa bzhin// pad+ma bsnams la rolnga pas bzhugs// 'jigs byed drag po mche ba gnyis gtsigs ma dang kha nus me 'bar ma dang rlung shugs rab gtum mya//
164b6(rgyud 'grel): gtum mig ma dang sna chen ma rnams klu yi pang 'di ba rnams la tsartsi kA la phyogs nas gnas// brgyad rnams dpal gyi gtso mo dang mtshungs hri ya yin+ti yig rnams dang gri gug las byung bsgom/
165a1(rgyud 'grel): yu sl-i yaM rnams dang gri gug las byung dpal gyi rnal 'byor rnams la 'dir ni phyag 'tsha lo// haHyig dbyug pa dag las byung ba'i phag mo dmar mo dang ni bde byed dkar po dang bcas nyi
165a2(rgyud 'grel): ma yi// pad+ma mA he'i snying gnas phyag na dbyug pa ral gri lcags sgrog phub chung rnams dang ldan pa// gau shin rje la nI bzhugs pa'i zhabs gnyis dag la nges par phyag 'tshalo// keng rus dus mtshan ma dang waM
165a3(rgyud 'grel): gdong dus kyi lce dang brtsigs ma/ nag mo'i 'jigs ma gzugs dA na klu yi 'dab ma la gnas lha rnams// dpal gyi lha mo dang mtshungs hri ra ri rI hU~M rur+m+ma raM rnams dang // dbyug pa lus byung dpal ldan rnal 'byor
165a4(rgyud 'grel): ma la phyag 'tshal// hA yig rtse gsum dag las byung ba'i drag ma nyid kyi phyag na rtse gsum cang te kha T+wAM ge dang lho 'gro dkar po// rim pa ji lta bu rnams gshin rje dang bcas byung du khyu mchog dang ni pad+ma dmar po la
165a5(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa la phyag 'tshal// gau ri dang ni gaM gA ma dang rtag ma shin tu 'gyog ma 'degs ma mtshan nyid ldan ma dang // ser skya ma dang nag mo rnams te de ltar brgyad rnams drag mo'i klu yi pad 'dab la gnas rnams//
165a6(rgyud 'grel): dpal gyi drag mo dang ni mtshungs ma hu wa wi wAM hUM nyid rnams dang wu wAM waM rnams// rtse gsum ngag las byung ba de rnams kun la rab tu dang ba'i sgo nas nges par phyag 'tshal// hA yig rdo rje las byung dbang mo gser
165b1(rgyud 'grel): gyi kha dog dang mtshungs// rdo rje mnga' dang rnyil bu gzhu ni lag pa'i pad+mas 'dzin ma lha min dang bcas chu bdag phyogasasu glang po dkar po dang ni// pad+ma dmar po'i steng na gnas pa la ni rab tu phyag 'tshul// rdo rje 'od ma jo
165b2(rgyud 'grel): lus ma gAsar mchog ldan mA rigs 'dzin ma dang sna tshog sA ri mo me// chu shing ma dang zug rngu selA mra shin tu sgrol ma rnams ni lhag 'dzin pad 'dab la// gnas pa brgyad rnams dpal gyi gtso myo dang mtshungs hU~M la
165b3(rgyud 'grel): l-Idz+dza lu waM lAM ma rnams dang ni// rdo rje dag las rab tu byung ba'i rnal 'byor ma rnams kun la 'dzir ni nges par phyag 'tshalo// k+Sha yig dung dag las byung tshangs ma zhal bzhi nyi ma'i spyan ldan kha dog ster po dung dring dbyu
165b4(rgyud 'grel): pabaspyi thugs thod pa rnams dang ldan pa// srin gyi kha dog dang ni mtshungs pa'i 'phrog byung dang ni bcas pa rlung mtshams dang pa pad dkar steng na gnas pa la nI phyag 'tshal// nyi mo'i bu mo pad+ma'i mig mA chu skyes
165b5(rgyud 'grel): ldan mA ngag gi dbang phyug ma rnams dang // glu ma dang ni glog ma d+hA na mya rnams ni rig byeng zhal gyi pad+ma 'ang ba la ni gnas pa rnams rim pa bzhin du b+h+rUM lA wI s+t+rai b+h+rU~M l+yA wa~M la rnams dang dung dag las byung ba'i// tshongs
165b6(rgyud 'grel): ma dang ni rnal 'byor ma rnams kun la rab tu dang bas yang ngag 'tshalo// k+Shu dang pad+ma las byung bkra shis ma ni zla ba dang mtshungs pang phreng ka ma la dang rin chan nor bu phyag ldan ma// ro'i gdong can dang bcas dpal
166a1(rgyud 'grel): ldan phyogs na seng dkar steng na gnas pa'i zhabs kyi pad+ma la ni nges par phyag 'tshalo// dpal ldan dkar mo zla ba'i rI mo can ri bod 'dzin zhal dang pa'i mdog ma 'dzin byed ma// pad+ma'i
166a2(rgyud 'grel): dbang phyug ma dang 'od zer can ma dri med zla 'dzin ma rnams dbang ldan mtshams nyid du// brakra shis mau yi pang 'dab rnams la rim bzhin Shu wA wI wA Sh+Tu lgu b+h+r-i wAHrnams dang ni/ pad+ma dag las yang dag byung ba'i rnal
166a3(rgyud 'grel): 'byor ma rnams kun la thams cung du su phyag 'tshalo// g+h+r-i yig shik+Sh+mI las byung gzhonu ma nyid nyi ma dang mtshungs// shak+ti lcags kyu rin chen zhags pa rnams ni phyag gi 'dzin ma// bA den bral mtshams nas rma bya par+g+ga
166a4(rgyud 'grel): dkar po'i steng na gnas pa'i// tshogs kyi bdag po dang ni bcas pa gang yin de la phyag 'tshal// pad+ma mA dang yan m+meng+ga ma gzhon nu ma drang sang ge 'gros ma rin chen 'phreng ba ma// mig mAdzes ma dang kun ma bzang mo
166a5(rgyud 'grel): rnams ni gA tsi mo chu skyes gtsug phud can gyi 'gros ma yi// pad+ma'i 'dab ma la gnas rim pa bzhin du kr-I rA rI r+t+r-i Sh+T+r-i rU r+b+r-i ran+darnams dang ni// shug ti ngag las byung ba'i lha mo de rnams dang ni bcas+t+ra pa rnams la rgyun du
166a6(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshalo// DI yig 'khor lo ngag las byung ba'i dpal ldan khyab 'jug ma nyid// zhal bzhi dang bcas pa yi ga nag pa'i sku mnga' 'khor lo dbyug pa// chu skyes dang ni dag pa'i dung rnams 'dzin pa'i phyag ldan mo
166b1(rgyud 'grel): mtshams// pad+ma dkar po dang ni bya khyud la gnas de la phyag 'tshal// dpal mo sgyu 'phrul mA dang grags ma bkra shis ma dang shin tu rgyal ma dpal rgyal rnams dang // rab tu rgyal ma dpal ldan 'khor lo can ma
166b2(rgyud 'grel): dag ni khyab 'jug mu yi pad 'dub la// gnas pa rnams ni rim pa bzhin du k+Shi yAM yi yAM k+Shi yU IM yaHma lus pa rnams dang // 'khor lo dag las byung ba'i lha mo de rnams dang bcas rnams la dang po rgyun du phyag
166b3(rgyud 'grel): 'tshalo// lho sgo'i g.yon gyi 'dod yon rnams la ka kha ga g+ha dA rnams tsheg drag dang bcas pa'o// sa bon rnams dang so so'i phyag mtshan rnams las byung ba'i 'dod ma lnga rnams phyag gnyis ri bong zhal/ shar sgo
166b4(rgyud 'grel): la sogs kyi g.yas kyi 'dod yon rnams la sa bon rang bzhin tsA TA pra ta yi// sde tshan rnams las de ltar rab tu byung ba de rnams lha lnga so so'i phyogs la gnas pa dang // shar sgo'i g.yon gyi 'dod yon la/
166b5(rgyud 'grel): su sde las byung hA sde las// byung ba byang g.yon de las gzhan// Ni yi gro las byung rnams la 'dud// ces pa rnams gsung gi 'khor lo'i tshigasu bcad pa'o// tsaN+Di k+Sha stsogs dang mtshungs 'jig rten skyong ba rnams
166b6(rgyud 'grel): kyi rigs rnams// rigs byed brgyad dang bcu drug pad+ma'i 'dab ma gsum rtsegs la gnas// a sogs sa bon rnams dang rdo rje las byung rdo rje dang bcas// khyab 'jug la sogs rnams dang tshes kyi lha mo rnams dang
167a1(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa// du ngi dz+r-i dzu d+l-i ngaM/ b+hU b+hI b+h+r-i b+hu b+h+r-i b+h+yAM/ ka gI g+h+r-i g+ha gr-i gaM/ ka gi rje khu khwa ShAM/ ka ki kr-i ku kr-i kaM rnams dang 'khor lo las byung // pang gnas rnams ni mnga' bdag dang mtshungs rol pas
167a2(rgyud 'grel): gnas// dpal gyi dgun zla thA chung tshes rnams dang nr-i nges par dpung mgo'i tshigs kyi rang bzhi nI// 'di rnams dang bcas shar sgo'i g.yon du byA khyud pad+ma dmar po'i steng gnas rkang yig dang // 'khor lho las
167a3(rgyud 'grel): byung ba yi khyab 'jug ljang gu'i lus la dpal mo gnod sbyin dang ni mtshungs pas 'khyud// 'khor lo dang ni dbyug pa dag dang chu skyes dung dag 'dzin pa rnams la phyag 'tshalu// nya nyi ny+dzi ny+tsarl-inyaM/ dz+nyAd+d+hi r+dz+nyAdz+dzA d+h+r-idz+nyA/
167a4(rgyud 'grel): dza dzaM dz+r-IM dzu dz+r-IM dze/ chu tsho tshwa tshu r+g+ha tshe/ tsa tsi tsI tsu r+b+r-i tsa/ rnams dang ral gri las byung pang gnas rnams// mnga' bdag dang mtshungs rol pa sngo gnas pa dpal gyi dpyid zla 'bring po'i tshes rnams dang ni gtumA mo'i tshogs kyi
167a5(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin can nyid// 'di rnams dang bcas shar sgro'i g.ya su yi dgas dang ni chu skyes dmar po'i ste gnas pA// tsam+b+ha dang ralA g+h+ri dag lus byung ba'i srin+na po dmar po dbang mo dang bcas ral gri gri gug dang // phub
167a6(rgyud 'grel): da zong pa phyag gi 'dzin pa gang yin de la bdag nyid gus par phyag 'tshalo// ts+tshar+m+ma Ne/ d+had+hits+tshihU~MSh+T+r-id+hI/ Nin+da ts+tshir+m+ma Di/ Sha dzo dz+riM ru dz+riM dza~M/ waM hri dzI nu l+le TaM/ rnams dang shag ti las byung bang gnas rnams ni
167b1(rgyud 'grel): mnga' bdag dang mtshungs rol pas gnas// dpal gyi dbyar zla ra ba'i tshes rnams dang ni lag mgo'i tshogs kyi rang bzhin gcig nyid// 'di rnams dang bcas gshin rje phyogs kyi sgo yi g.ya su lug dang
167b2(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma dmar po'i steng // gnas pa rbaM dang shA ga ti las byung sregA za kha dog dmar po sha ga ti dbyug pa dang // chu skyes spyi thugs dus kyi phyag na bsnams bya drag mos 'khyud pa de lnga phyag 'tshalo// ma mr-i mAM mu m+l-i maM/
167b3(rgyud 'grel): b+ha b+h+r-i b+h+r-i b+hU b+h+r-i b+h+yAM/ ba bi b+h+r-i bu br-i bAM/ pha phi phruM phu p+l-i phaM/ pa pi p+l-i pu p+l-i paM/ rnams dang zhags pa las byung pad gnas rnams ni mnga' bdag dang mtshungs rol pas gnas// dpal gyi dbyar zla tha tshungs tshes rnams
167b4(rgyud 'grel): drang ni dpyi mgo'i tshigs kyi rang bzhin can nyid // sgo'i g.ya su chu sbyin dang ni pad+ma dmar po'i ste d+ha gnas pa// paM yig dang ni zhags pa dag lus byung ba'i chu bdag zhugs pa rin chen sbrul nyid dang // nor bu rnams ni
167b5(rgyud 'grel): rig byed phyag na 'dzin cing phagu mo dang bcas zhabs la phyag 'tsha lo// na ni nr-i nr-i n+yai nAM/ d+ha d+hi dz+nye d+hu dz+haiM d+haM/ da di d+ha~M du d+l-i ngaM/ tha thi b+h+yo thA thA thai/ ta ti trA~M d+hut+k+r-i trUM/ rnams dang rdo rje las byung bdu gnas rnams ni mnga' bdag da
167b6(rgyud 'grel): mtshungs rol pas gnas// de ltar ston zla 'bring po'i tshes rnams dang ni pus g.yon rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin can// 'di rnams dang bcas nub sgo'i g.ya su sna thag can dang chu skyes dmar po'i steng gnas pa//
168a1(rgyud 'grel): taM yigrwa dang ni rdo r+d+he dag las byung ba'i dbang po ser po phyag na rdo rje dang // mda' dang dril bu gzhu rnams 'dzin pa tsartsi ka dang bcas pa de la phyag 'tshalo// D+ha b+hI b+h+rU~M b+hU b+h+rU~M b+h+rUM/ sha shi shrIM shu
168a2(rgyud 'grel): shAMH'aShi rl-i 'url-i Sha/ tha gr-idz+dzi shru p+l-i kraM/ sA si s+t+r-i su sl-i saM/ rnams dang rtse gsum las byung br-id gnas ni mnga' bdag dang mtshungs rol pas gnas// dgun zla ra ba'i tshes rnams dang ni l+r-ing bu'i tshigs kyi rung
168a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin can de 'di rnams dang bcas pas byang sgo'i g.yon du khyu mchog dang ni chu skyes dmar po'i steng du yang dag gnas// saM yig dang ni rtse gsum mda' dang kha T+wAM ga/ gzhu rnams phyag gis 'dzin dang gAshin rje
168a4(rgyud 'grel): ngadang mtshungs ri yi bu mo pang gnas la phyag 'tshal// sA skr-i s+t+r-i sU sl-i sAMHkAk+ShI g+h+rA b+hU b+h+r-i b+h+yAM/ ShAdz+dziSh+TaM Sh+kuSh+TaM Sh+mAHshA shI shr-I g+hu b+h+r-i shwaHd+hA nI n+taM b+hU d+h+r-i TAHrnams dang dbyug pa las byung pad+ma gnas rnams ni mnga'
168a5(rgyud 'grel): bdag dang mtshungs rolnga pas gnas// de ltar dgun zla 'bring po'i chos rnams dang ni rkang g.yas long ma bI tshigs kyi rang bzhin te// de rnams dang bcas nub sgo'i g.yon du ming dang pad+ma nyi ma'i mdog lhun steng granas
168a6(rgyud 'grel): padar b+hUn+d+ha yig dpal gyi dbyug pa dag las byung ba'i gnod sbyin nor bu dbyug pa sre mo dang // pad+ma rnams ni phyag na 'dzin pa'i khyab 'jug dang mtshungs nor dbang bang gnas la phyag 'tshal// d+hU hrI hU~M hUM hU~M hrIHb+h+rUM b+h+rU~MhU~M
168b1(rgyud 'grel): b+hU b+h+r-i thAHdA d+hI d+hA d+hu r+b+r-i dAr+thar+thA d+hIdz+dzi d+hA d+h+r-i r+N+NaHnA nI nAM n+yA n+ti nAr+d+ha rnams dang dung las byung ba pang gnas rnams ni mnga' bdag dang mtshungasnga rol pa sA gnas// de wAr+ya ston+ma zla tha chungs tshes rnams dang ni pus mo'i tshigs kyi rang
168b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin can nyid// dang ba chu skyes dkar po lA gnas ni yig dang ni dung las byung ba'i tshangs pa nyid// ser po dung dang phreng ba chu skyes spyi blugs rig byed phyag gis 'dzin la khyab 'jug mas// 'khyud pa'i zhal bzhi ser dang dkar
168b3(rgyud 'grel): dang dmar ba dwe la phyag 'tsha lo// pA pI b+h+r-i pU p+l-i b+h+raHphA pI p+taM pU pr-I phAHbA bI b+h+yAM bru b+h+r-i bAHb+hU b+hI b+h+yAM b+hU b+h+r-i b+hUHmA mI m+l-i mU m+l-i mAHrnams dang staM re las byung pang gnas rnams ni mnga' bdag dang mtshungs rol pas gnas//
168b4(rgyud 'grel): ston zla ra ba'i tshes rnams dang ni g.yas kyi spyi mgo tshigs rnams rnam par rig pa yi// rang bzhin de rnams drang bcas dbang ldan mtsham su bya ba chu skyes dkar po'i steng gnas pa// mA yig ta rA las byung tshogs
168b5(rgyud 'grel): bdag dkar po sta re rdo rje zhags pa nor bu rnams// phyag gi rim bzhin bsnams la gdong drug mas 'khyud de yi zhabs la rgyun+da du phyag 'tsha lau// nA n+ti nAM D+hAd+h+r-i TAHthA thI Sh+TaM d+hu dz+r-I dzAHr+tha nI D+haM nr-i nAMn+taHd+hAn+ti nAM D+hu r+b+baM rnA/ NA NI NAM d+hu r+b+r-irmA/
168b6(rgyud 'grel): rnams dang dung las byung ba pang gnas dang ni mnga' bdag dang mtshungs rol pas gnas// dbyar zla 'bring po'i tshes rnams dang ni log mgo'i tshogs kyi rang bzhin de rnams dang bcas pa// bden bral mtsham su rma bya chu
169a1(rgyud 'grel): skyes dkar po lha gnA sa NaHyig dang nI dung dag lhas// byung ba'i ro yI gdong can+da dmar po shag ti dang ni mdung dang nor bu me long rnams// gang gi phyag na gnas pa dang ni dpa' mo dang bcas
169a2(rgyud 'grel): de la gus pas phyag 'tsha lo// ts+tsha n+d+hi nA~M ts+tsha smA nAM/ nAn+tin+da ts+tshid+d+hi/ dz+haiM hU~M dzA d+hi dz+haiM/ d+h+r-i d+h+r-i d+h+r-i d+hu ts+tsha NAM/ ny+dza TI T+Ti ts+tsha r+m+many+dza/ rnams dang ljon shing las byung pang gnas rnams ni mnga' byong ga dang mtshungs rol pas gnas// dbyung
169a3(rgyud 'grel): zla tha chung tshes rnams dang ni gru mo'i tshogs kyis rnam par dag po'i rang bzhin te// de rnams dang bi ces ma ye mtshem su ri dgas chu skyes dkar po la gnas ny+dzar+d+hayig dang // ljon shing drug las byung ba'i rlung lha nag po
169a4(rgyud 'grel): phyag na ljon shing lha shing me tog dang // nor bu ut+pal sngon po bsnams 'dzin rgya mtsho'i zhal ma pad gnas de lA phyag 'tsha lo// k+Sha k+Shi k+Shau Tu kr-I k+ShaHkhA khI dz+nyA khyA khAM khAT+TagAM g+h+ri g+h+r-i g+hu g+h+r-i g+ha/ b+hU b+hI s+t+r-i b+hU g+h+r-i b+h+yAMHd+h+r-ihA
169a5(rgyud 'grel): dz+hi d+har+m+maH rnams dang dathug pa las byung pad gnas rnams ni mnga'i bdag dang mtshungs rol pas gnas// de ltar dpyid zla ra ba'i tshes rnams dang ni dpung po'i tshogs kyi rang bzhon can nyid// rdornams dang
169a6(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas lho sgo'i g.yon gyi phyogasu ma he chu skyes dmar po'i steng gnas pa// bAHyig dbyug pa las byung shin tu sngo bo dbyug pa ral gri lcags sgrogazhags pa bsnams// dus kyi phyag gis 'dzin la 'phrogs byed dang
169b1(rgyud 'grel): mtshungs gshin rje ma nyid pad gnas la phyag 'tshal// khro rgyal rnams ni g.yas pa brkyang // lha mo rnams ne gla yon brkyang gnas// zhal cig rgya mtsho phyag ldan zhing // spyan gsum rIn+da chen cong+ga pan tsan+d+ra// haM yig drung ni
169b2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dag lAs lha dbang lus ldan phyag na rdo rje dang mtshungs gtsug tor can// de nyid pang gnas hAHyig dang ni gri gug dag las byung ba'i shin tu skyon gyi dus kyi phyag rgya// gri gug rdo rje thod pa dril bu 'dzin pa dag nI steng
169b3(rgyud 'grel): du mkha' lding rlung gi shing rta la// yang dag gnas pa'i khu ba 'jig pa'i rang bzhin de dag zhabs la rab tu dang bsu phyag 'tsha'o// yi yig dbyug pa dag las byung ba'i khro bo da byug ston can de gshin rje'i dgra yi yum
169b4(rgyud 'grel): mtshungs dang // laHyig dang ni 'khor lo las byung 'od zer can mA gser mtshungs 'khor lo dbyug pa dung dang ni// rin po che rnams phyag gis pad+mas 'dzin pa dang bcas shar sgo'i dbusu phyag pa bdun gyis drangs//
169b5(rgyud 'grel): shrIng rta la gnas dri chu rnam par dag pa de dag zhabs kyi pad+ma la ni phyag 'tshalo// rmongs byed ma mtshungs raM yig mnga' dag las ni Tik+ki rA dza// wIHyig tho ba las byung tsun+da stu mdog dkar mo ldan pa'i// rang bzhin
169b6(rgyud 'grel): tho ba mdung dang pad+ma ma long rnams 'dzin gshin rjer// rtas drangs shing rta la gnas de dag la ni rab tu phyag 'tshal// nga rgyal can mtshungs wI yig gtun shing las byung mi g.yo ba ste// rAHyig mnga' dag las
170a1(rgyud 'grel): byung khro gnyer can la 'gro ba'i rang bzhin// mnga' dang lcags kyu gzhu dang zhags pa rnams ni phyag ldan dmar mo// byang du seng ge'i shing rta la gnas de dag lnga ni phyag 'tshal// rengs byed ma
170a2(rgyud 'grel): mtshungs laM yig dbyug tho dag las byung ba'i stobs chen// yaHyig gtun shing las byung rdo rje lcags sgrog ma nyid nag mo// ral gri rdo rje dung dang dril bu rnams 'dzin bshang ba'i rang bzhin// chu lhar glang chen
170a3(rgyud 'grel): shing rta la gnas de dag la nI phyag 'tshal// kun tu bzang mo dang mtshungs hUM yig dang nI dpal gyi gri gug las byung gnod mdzes dang // hUM yig rdo rje las byung drugra mig ma nyid ljang gu phyag gis sta ri rtse gsum dang
170a4(rgyud 'grel): sbrul zhags snying gar 'dzin cing kha dz+nyA ga bcas kyis 'khyud 'og tu gru yi lag ldan pa'i// shing rta la gnaswa b+ha ga d+hi chu'i rang bzhin rnam dag la ni phyag 'tsha lo// phyogs skyong dang mtshungs klu rnams kyis// dbu la
170a5(rgyud 'grel): gdeng ka lnga ru 'dod// 'on kyang rgyal ba rnam rgyal gyis dbu la gdeng sde ka bdun du 'dod// ts+tsha yig rdo rje las ni byung ba'i rgyal ba sku mdog ljang gu/ bdud rtsi'i bum pa rdo rje chu skyes rin chen phyag rnams kun gyis/
170a6(rgyud 'grel): gzung ba rkang g.yon mthe chung rnam par dag pa sngon mo dang bcas steng du na mkha'i dkyil 'khor la gnas de dag la ni phyag 'tshal// sgo 'gram rnamasu g.yo ba'i rtse mo can dang mchu dang sa rnams dkyil 'khor so so'i
170b1(rgyud 'grel): kha dog gis// shar la sogs pa'i g.yon du dgod pa h+ya yig rgyal mtshan lngas byung karko Ta nyid nag po ni// ming med rnam par dag pa ce spyang gdong mas 'khyung dang hri yig bkra shis las byung chu bdag nyid/
170b2(rgyud 'grel): ma dang mtshungs gung mo rnam par dgu pA stag gdong ma dang bcas la rim bzhin phyag 'chi lo// hA yig chu skyes las byung dga' blo dkar po nyid// mdzub mo rnam par dag pu phag gradong ma 'khyud dang // rga yigs
170b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo las byung 'jog po ser po nyid// mthe bo rnam drug khyi gdong dang bcasA l-i phyag 'tshal// nub sogs gA ya su hU~M yig 'khor las byung pad+ma chen po las byung pad+ma chen po ser po khwa gdong bcas// hA yig
170b4(rgyud 'grel): drag ni pad+ma dag las byung ba'i rigs ldan dkar po bya gdong bcas dang // hA yig bkra shis las byung ltos 'gro dung skyong dmar po 'ug gdong mA dang bcas pa dang // hA yigA rgyal mtshan las byung pad+ma dkar
170b5(rgyud 'grel): smin bya khyud gdong bcas rnams la phyag 'tshalo// hU~M yig+na rdo rje las byung rnam rgyal sngon po nyid// rkang pa g.yas pa'i mthe bo la sogs pa nyid kyi// rnam par dag pa rdo rje mig ma dang bcas po// 'og tu
170b6(rgyud 'grel): ye shes la gnas pa la phyag 'tshalo// lho sgo'i g.yon gyi 'dod yon la ni nges par gsal byed ka kha ga g+ha nga rnams thig le dang pa'i sa bon las byung mi 'dod ma rnams zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma ste
171a1(rgyud 'grel): mnga' yi grangs rnamaso// shar la sogs pa'i g.yas kyi 'dod yon rnams lA tsa Ta pa ta'i sde tshan rnams las rab tu byung // de ltar de rnams so so'i phyogs la lnga yi
171a2(rgyud 'grel): grangs kyi sa bon dang bcas so so'i phyag mtshano// de ltar sa sde'i shar gyi g.yon// 'dod yon la ste ha ste byang // de las gzhan pa k+Sha yig las// 'byung ba rnams la phyag 'tshalo// 'khor lo
171a3(rgyud 'grel): la gnas lha nyid de rnams ma lus po// zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma ste spyan gsum dang lhun ma// phyag rgyas spras shing skra grol na bza' rnams dang bral// dpal gyi mgo ba'i phreng ba'i gri gug
171a4(rgyud 'grel): thod pa'i phyag/ hA yig gri gug lus byung rdo rje can ma nyid// ljang gu rgyan drong bcas pa g.yon pa'i mthe chung gri/ rnam par dag pa'i sku mnga' steng gi phyogs nyid du// rkang brgyad lhung gu l+ya nI gnas
171a5(rgyud 'grel): la phyag 'tshal lo// gang gi me dang rlung dkyil 'khor lo dag gi dbus kyi cha// ka sde brtsegs pa dang ni gri gug las byung khyi gdong ma// nag mo 'jog po dang ni bcas pa lce'i dbang po'i phyogs
171a6(rgyud 'grel): su ral gri can dang 'khor lo dmar po la ni gnas la phyag 'tshal// de bzhin k+Sha ya rA wa la dang // gri gug las byung phag gdong dmar mo// dga' bo dang bcas lho yi phyogasu// dau ma dang
171b1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo gnas la phyag 'tshal// de bzhin ha ya rA wa la dang // gri gug las byung stag gdong dkar mo// chu bdag dang bcus byang gi phyogasu// g.yas dang 'khor lor gnas la phyag 'tshal//
171b2(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin d+ha sha Sha b+h+ya sa dang // gri gug las byung ce spyang gdong mu// ser mo kar+ya ki Ta bcas nub tu// snying ge 'khor lor gnas la phyag 'tshal// tu pu ru tsu rnams dang gri gug las byung
171b3(rgyud 'grel): byang gI/ dbang po 'ug pa bya rgong khwa rnams dang mtshungs pa'i bgegs can ser mo dkar mo dmar mo nag mo rnams ni pang ma dung skyong dga' bo dang // pad ma chen po dang bcas rlung dang 'phrog
171b4(rgyud 'grel): byeng ster byed me mtshams rnams su shing rta'i tshogs bcom nas// longs spyod pa'i gzhon pa mig sngon bya long b+he ru Na Da dang 'khor lo dkar po gnas la phyag 'tshal// haHyig gri gug las
171b5(rgyud 'grel): byung ston mo kha dog sngo// rgyal ba dang bcas 'og tu rlung dang 'khor lo nyid// sngon po la gnas phyag 'tshal sngon ltar dgu po yang // lag papA g.yas g.yon sdor mo rnam dag lha mo// a yig las byung zla ba
171b6(rgyud 'grel): dbang po'i phyogs gnas// a las byung ba'i snang byed bden bral la gnas// de dag sa yi dkyil 'khor gnas la phyag 'tshal// hUM yig dang ni aM yig oM yig ho yig rnams las byung ba'i// chos kyi
172a1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lho dpal gyi bum pa bzang po mchog gI rnga dang // dpag bsam shing rnams dkar min dmar po dkar po skyer po rnams ni// rim+ba bzhin shar lnga sogs pa'i rta babs la gnas
172a2(rgyud 'grel): rnams la phyag 'tshal// rgya lnga bA mi bskyod pa la dpal ldan rgyal bya rdo rje sems dpas rgyas ni gdab par bya// de ni rgyal ba mi bskyod ste don grub rgyal ba nor bu'i phyag ldan de nyid kyis// chu skyes phyag ldan
172a3(rgyud 'grel): de nyid 'khor lo can no yang ni de'i rgyal ba rnam par shes// spyi bo la gnas sgrib pa bral ba so so'i phyag rgya mdzad la dang bas phyag 'tshal lo// nu mkhya' dang ni rlung dang sreg byeng chu dang sa yi rang bzhin gyis//
172a4(rgyud 'grel): sngon du gsungs pa'i khams rnams las byung bde bar gshegs pa ji lta bu// de bzhin 'khor lo 'di las gzhan pa'i lha rnams ma lus pa nyid kyi// cod pan mchog las yang dag gnas pa de rnams la
172a5(rgyud 'grel): ni phyag 'tsha lo// de ltar phyag btsal nas mchod pa bya ba ni// de yang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 'dod pa'i dri ma med par gsungs pa ltar// de las rgyal ba ma lus mchod pa'i don du spyos
172a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i 'od zer de rnams slar bkug ste rang gi snying ga'i zla ba'i rdo rje la zhugs par bsam por bya'o// de nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la mchod pa'i lha mo bcu gnyis kyi sa bon gyi yi ge rnams la// de nas so so'i saM
172b1(rgyud 'grel): bon+da lhas mchod pa'i lha mo rnams spros pa ni/ oM ts+tsha badz+ra gan+d+he gan+d+haHnaM ku ru ku ru swAhA/ oM ts+tsha badz+rA mA me ma lAr+Na naM ku ru ku ru swAhA/ oM n+d+ra badz+ra d+hU pe d+hU pUr+dz+dza naM ku ru ku ru swA hA/ oM n+d+ra badz+ra pra dI pe pra dI pAr+Na nAM ku ru ku ru swAt+ma/ oM b+hU
172b2(rgyud 'grel): badz+nyA mr-i te ne bed+ya pU dzAM ku ru ku rU s+yAt+ma/ oM b+hU badz+nyA Sha d+d+hi ta yaNAM ti pU lAr+dz+dza nAM ku ru ku ru s+yAt+sadz+dzi oM t+ta badz+ra la s+ye bas+t+ra b+hA ra Na b+h+r-i dzAM ku ru d+h+r-i ku ru s+t+raihA/ oM t+yA hU s+yai g+ha Na nI daR+sha d+hu b+h+yAM dzAM ku ru ku ru sAhUM/ oM k+Sh+ma badz+ra wA d+hA wAM te d+hA
172b3(rgyud 'grel): d+h+r-i r+ra k+ShA ru swAt+tha/ oMb+h+yAM badz+dzi nr-i tro nr-i dz+ya b+huM b+h+r-i dz+nyAM TaM rukyA d+haiR+Ya s+yAt+tha/ oM s+thA gI trI b+h+r-i ta pU dz+nyAM tsaruM d+h+waM gur+N+NaM ru s+yAt+ma/ oM s+m+R+YuM badz+ra ma mo saH pradz+dza bo d+hi satwe no lod+b+ha d+h+r-i d+hI dzI dz+nyA su ra te b+hu dzaMHrl-i dr-i su r+pa s+yAt+ma/ d+hiltar m+b+hi sngags kyi
172b4(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi sangs rgyas g+hu la sogs pa rnam thos la yid kyi mchod par ts+tsha bya'o// de nAs sdig pashags pa ts+tsha ni sdig pa dpag med byas pA rnams ni// so so nyid bshags par bgyi// bsod nams la rjesu yi rang ba ni//
172b5(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs sangs rgyas dang zho byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa'i dge 'du rnon rnams kyis dge ba dang ga sde byas pa// de rnam swa kun la rje su yi rang ba dang sdig bral byang chub spyod la rje su bzhugs par zhu// de nas gsum la skyabasu
172b6(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba ni// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms pa rnams la byang chub bar du skyabasu mchi// de nas bdag nyid 'bul ba dang bsod nams yongasu bsngo ba ni// bdag gi ji srid len gyur lus 'bul sems
173a1(rgyud 'grel): can ma lus don phyir bdag nyid rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shog/ de ltar bdun rnam par dag pa'i mchod pa byas nas// de nas rtsa ba gsum dran par bya'o// pha rol tu phyin pa bcu bsgom
173a2(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o// tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom par bya'o// bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi bsgom par bya'o// myi dge ba bcu yongasu spong ba bsgom par bya'o// sgrib pa lnga spong ba bsgom por bya'o// nyon mongs pa bzhi spong
173a3(rgyud 'grel): babasgom par bya'o// zag pa bzhi spong ba bsgom par bya'o// rnam par thar pa bzhi bsgom par bya'o// de ltar bsgoms la khyams gsum g.yo bya dang brtan par byas pa rnams rnam par dpyad bar bya ste/
173a4(rgyud 'grel): dungos med dngos por med pa ste// de ltar dngos po'ang dngos por med// des na dngos po dngos med 'gyur// de phyir dngos po dmigasu med ces pa'o// de nas 'khor ba'i phung po yongasu spang bar bya ste/ de yang
173a5(rgyud 'grel): denyid las gsungs pa ltarar+ya dang por 'dir brtul zhugs dang ldan pas lus kyi dbus chu yis me rnams bshog par byed pa'o// de nas me'i dngos po med pa las sa'i smra ba spungs nas tshwa bzhin d+ha zhu ste/
173a6(rgyud 'grel): chu'i dbusu 'jug par 'gyuraro// de nas yang chu rnams rlung gi skams te na mkha' la thim par 'gyur ba ste// de ltar chos kyi tshogs rnams myur bar rnam par 'jig par 'gyuraro// de nas sems dang mi nyid mun pa'i
173b1(rgyud 'grel): mumatha' zhes pa ni na mkha'i khams kyi dbus kyi gan so// yul dang bral ba zhes pa ni rnam pa thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan kun gzhi rnam par shes par gzung bar bya'o// / de nas sngags 'di brjod par bya'o//
173b2(rgyud 'grel): oM b+hU N+ya d+hA dz+nyA nA bad+d+he sa b+hU b+hat+ma ko&haM/ I a nI mid+b+ha dz+nyA na swa d+hA b+hUt+ma kr-i&haM/ oM A pra Ni hi tA dz+nyA nA badz+dza sa b+hU b+hAd+d+ha kr-i&hUM/ oM an+d+ra b+hi swaM sU rA dz+nyA n+yA badz+ra sa b+hA b+hUt+ma ko&hU~M/ zhes pa brjod la/ khyams gsum
173b3(rgyud 'grel): rdul phra rob kyi chos nyid las 'das pa'i stong pa'i rnam par bas // de nas bcom ldan 'das sngon gyi sbyin lam yongasu rdzogs nas chos kyi kho rje lo rab tu zinar ba'i don du mngal du 'jug pa'i tshul g+his bskyed
173b4(rgyud 'grel): byini// na mkha'i khams dpag pa las 'das prA balka s+ya la/ sngon du brjod pa'i rlung lnga sogs pa'i da grol 'khor bzhi la sogs pa byas mo// d+hU de nas rdo rje'i sa gzhi'i dbu suM gzhal yas khang ba sa / na
173b5(rgyud 'grel): yongasu gyur pa las thugs dang gsung dang sku yI 'khor lo gsum gyi bdag nyid gru bzhi pa'i rten bsam par bya'o// de yang thugs kyi 'khor lo la sgyur ba nag po dang dmar po dang dkar po gsum gyis bskor ba sgo bani
173b6(rgyud 'grel): pa kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i rta babs bzhis brgyan pa// phyi rol tu 'dod yon dang rin chen pha gu dang / dra ba dang / dra ba phyed pa dang / ba ku lid+l-i dang kra ma shing Shas sbas pa zla ba dang rgyal mtshan dang / dril bu da
174a1(rgyud 'grel): me long dang / rnga yab la sogs pas rnam par brgyan pa/ de'i nang gi phyed ye shes kyi 'khor lo ste/ rdo rje'i phreng ba ka bA bcu drug gis sbas pa'o// de nyid kyi phyed ni bcom ldan 'das kyis
174a2(rgyud 'grel): gnas te rdo rje phreng bas bskor ba'o// de ltar thugs kyi 'khor lo rnam par bsam par bya'o// de'i nyis 'gyur gsung gi 'khor lo ra ba lnga yis bskor ba'o// de ltar nyis 'gyur gyi sgo bzhi la sogs pA rnga ya
174a3(rgyud 'grel): kyi bar gyis mdzes par byas pa'o// de'i phyi rol du sku'i 'khor lo la de nyid nyis 'gyur gyi tshad kyis te/ ra ba lnga dang sgo bzhi la sogs pas mdzes par byas pa'o// thams cad kyi shar dang me mtshams kyi sa gzhi
174a4(rgyud 'grel): nag po'o// lho dang bden bral gyi sa gzhi dmar po'o// nub dang rlung mtshams kyi sa gzhi ser po'o// byang dang dbang ldan gyi sa gzhi dkar po'o// phyi rol du sa dang chu dang me dang rlung gi dkyil 'khor// rdo rje'i phreng ba dang
174a5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje'i me ri dang / rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i dur khrod chen po'o// de ltar dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo rnam par bsgoms la// phyag btsal ba'i tsho gsu bcad par bshad pa'i bzhugs gnas rnam su gdun
174a6(rgyud 'grel): rnams ji lta ba bzhin du lha rnams rnam par bsam par bya'o// de rnams las thugs kyi 'khor lo la baM yig yongasu gyur pa las pad+ma nyi shu rtsa bzhi rnams la gnas pa'i zla ba dang nyi ma dang bcas pa bsgom par bya'o// /
174b1(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma re re lnga rtsa ba dang ra ba dang 'dab ma dang / ze 'bru dang lte ba rnams kyi snga bon rnams gzhung ches kyi drog nasnga ma bris te de yang gzhan cung zad tsam brjod pa ni/ pad+ma'i rtsa ba dang ra ba dag las ya yig las byung ba'o//
174b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dab ma ge sar ngag u yig las byung ba'o// de'i dbu su lte ba la a yig zla ba'i gang no// ra yig la nyi ma'i gang no// de nas gtso bo'i pad+ma nyi shu rtswa lnga pA au yig yongasu gyur pa las te/ zla ba dang / nyi ma dang /
174b3(rgyud 'grel): sgra gcan dang / dus mI'i dkyil 'khor bzhi dang bcas pa bsgom par byas nas/ rdo rje shugs kyi ting 'dzin gyi skabasu bshad pa ltar me long lta bu'i ye shes la sogs pa ye shes lnga rdzogs pa dang / phyag btsal
174b4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i tshigasu bcad pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i dus kyi 'khor lo/ de nyi du gsungs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i sna tshogs yum gyis 'khyud par bdag nyid bsams la// nag mo 'bar ma la sogs pa'i lha mo
174b5(rgyud 'grel): brgyad dang / rin po che la sogs pa'i mtshan ma blta bar byas pa 'di ni rdo rje sems dpa' bskyed pa'o// de nas sbyor ba'i sgra mi bskyod pa la sogs pa rgyal ba'i tshogs rnams bdag nyid kyi lus la gzhug par byas
174b6(rgyud 'grel): nas rnga na mkha' la sogs pa'i tshogs skyes bu dang rig ma dang / mig la sogs pa dang / yul rnams kyi rang bzhin lha rnams kyi rang bzhin du bskyed do// yang de rnams rang gi lus la phyung ste/ sna tshogs yum la ji lta ba
175a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du gzhug par bya'o// de nas yang de ltar spros la dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i rnam par de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rang gi lus la bcug la/ rang gi rdo rje las spros te rang gi rig
175a2(rgyud 'grel): ma'i pad+ma'i dbusa'o// de yongasu gyur pa las lha nyid kyi dkyil 'khor rten dang brten pa ste/ lhag pa'i gtso bor mi bskyod pa bsams nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la gzhug par bya zhes pa'o// de nas sngar gsungs
175a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi bdag nyid la gnas par byas nas de nas oM su bi shud+d+ha d+hAr+m+ma d+hA tu dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA b+hUt+ma ko&hUM/ zhes pa'i nga rgyal bya'o// de nas sems can thams cad lnga snying rjes dbang
175a4(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur bar bya'o// de yang de nyid las 'di ltar gsungs pa/ bcom ldan 'das dus kyi 'khor lo l-i oM shisI lnga'i bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa'i cod pan can shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi rang
175a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du bsam par bya'o// de nas 'gro ba rigs drug gi gnas nus sems can thams cad bkug ste/ de rnams kyi dkyil 'khor du zhugs par rnam par bsam par bya'o// de nas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa
175a6(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa'i khams rnams dang bcas pa rnams rang gi snying gar zhu ste/ byang chub sems zhu ba'i rang bzhin du gyur pa/ rang gi gsang ba'i rdo rje nas spros pa'i byang chub sems des/ sems can la dang
175b1(rgyud 'grel): bskur bar bsam par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems kyi 'od zer de rnams reg pas/ zhal gsum pa dang zhal sna tshogs pa dang / kha dog sna tshogs pa'i lha'i rang bzhin thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid
175b2(rgyud 'grel): mchog tu dga' ba'i bde bas gang por bsgom par bya'o// de nas de rnams rung rang gi lus kyi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i rang bzhin du skad cig gis blta bar bya'o// de nas sngags kyi sa bon rnams gsal
175b3(rgyud 'grel): byed sna tshogs 'dus pa dang dbyangs dang bcas pa rnams te/ 'dir gsal byed thams cad 'dus pa kra yi go// de nyid kyi gzhan yang shes par byed pas/ gad dang gang gi ming gi yi ge dang po de gsal byed/
175b4(rgyud 'grel): de ltar thams cad go bar bya'o// de yang 'di lta ste/ k+Sha k+ShiHk+Shau Tak+ShuHk+ShaM/ zhes pa ni rnam par shes pa la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'o// de ltar TA ne k+Shar k+Sho kyal dze zhes pa ni rna ba la sogs pa
175b5(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' drug go/ de ltar k+ShA She k+ShAR+Ya kr-i k+ShA la k+ShAHzhes pa nri yul drug/ de wAr+rak+ta n+maSh+NA T+ya k+ShA zhes pa nI lngas kyi dbang po lnga ste/ dwe wAr khye mo rnamaso// de wAr d+hAR+YANAn+nAD+hA zhes pA ni las kyi dbang po
175b6(rgyud 'grel): lnga'i yulo// de ltar sems can thams cad mtshan bzang po sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa'i skyes bu chen po dang ldan bI skyes bu chen por gyur pa'i dkyor gyi 'khora'i rnar skad cig gis rdzogs par bya ba ni/ sems can
176a1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad lnga snying rjes dab bskur ba byin la rang rang gi zhing lnga gshegs par bya zheso// sku rdzogs pa'i tinge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor rgyal mchogs dang bsnyen pa'i yan la go//
176a2(rgyud 'grel): de nas zhu ba gnas pa bsgom par bya ste/ de yang de nyid lngas gsungs pa 'di lta ste/ lte ba dang gtsug tor la ho yig go/ 'di gnyis ka dbu su dgod pa dpral byor sku rdo rje ai yi go/ mgrin+da par gsung rdo rje
176a3(rgyud 'grel): AHyig go// snying gar thugs rdo rje hU~M yi go/ de ltar yi ge gsum ni/ sku dang gsung dang thugs nyid ces pa'o// de ltar gzhan yang gsungs pa lte ba'i ho yig gi ye shes kyi 'od zer gyis bzhu ba ni sku
176a4(rgyud 'grel): gsung thugs kyi rdo rje rnams kyis bde mnyam pad+mar shes rab kyi chags pa zhu ba'i ri bong can bzhin du khyab bdag ni bcom ldan 'das shes rab dang bcas pa zhu bar gnas pa las/ sgrol ma lnga sogs pas
176a5(rgyud 'grel): bskul byas te/ de yang ngo nyid las gsungs pa/ byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms rnams kyi rang bzhin/ sgrol ma dang / mA ma k+Shi dang / gos dkar mo dang / spyan ma ste/ lha mo
176a6(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis bskul zhes pa'o// gzhan yang rtsa ba'i rgyud du yang de ltar gsungs pa/ spyan ma bdag ni 'gro ba'i yum// rgyu mthun rnal 'byor la gnas pa// bdag gi rang bzhin dkyil 'khor las// dus 'khor
176b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhengs la bdag 'dod mdzod// mA ma k+Shi bdagra sring mo ste// rnam smin rnal 'byor la gnas pa// bdag ni dkyil 'khor rang bzhin las// dus 'khor bzhengs la bdag 'dod mdzod// gos dkar mo bad+mag bu myo ste//
176b2(rgyud 'grel): skyes bu'i rnal 'byor la gnas pa// bdag ni dkyil 'khor rang bzhini lus// dus 'khor bzhengs la bdag 'dod mdzod// sgrol ma bdag ni tshe mo ste// bral ba'i rnal 'byor la gnas pa// bdag ni dkyil 'khor rab
176b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin pas// dus 'khor bzhengs la bdag 'dod mdzod// stong pa'i dkyil 'khor la gnas la// 'gro ba sgrol ba'i thugs dgongs kyis// sku gsung thugs dgangs kyis// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor
176b4(rgyud 'grel): rnams// 'gro ba'i mgon pos spro bar mdzod ces paso// de yang de nyid las gsungs pa// 'dir bcom ldan 'das stong par bzhugs pa glu yis rab tu bsad nas/ 'gro ba ma lus pa rnams sgyu ma bzhin
176b5(rgyud 'grel): du bltas te/ yang bskyed par mdzad ces paso// de nas de ltar rang gi sa bon dang mtshan ma yongasu gyur pa las/ rdzogs pa'i dus kyi 'khor lo mi bskyod pas rgyas btab pa bsam ste/ glang po'i phyugs
176b6(rgyud 'grel): pa dang rgyas gdab dang klu rnams dgod pa'i sngags rnams spangs nas/ sngar gsungs pa'i sngags kyi rkang pa rnams kyis rgyas 'dab pa dgod pa la sogs pa bya'o// de nas nang gi rgyas gdab pa dgod
177a1(rgyud 'grel): par bya ba ni/ de yang de nyid las gsungs pa/ 'dir gtsug tor gyi 'khor lor thig le las a yIg las mi bskyod pa'o// de ltar snying gArar+ya sgra gcan gyi dkyil 'khyod las i
177a2(rgyud 'grel): yig las don yod grub pA'o// dpral bAr zla bu'i dkyil 'khor u yig lngas 'od dpag me do zhes pa ste/ mi mnyam pa'i rigs rnams mi mnyam pa'i 'khur lo ro// de ltar lte bar me lA l-I yig las
177a3(rgyud 'grel): rnam par smang mdza // mgrin paR+Sha nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la r-I yi gr-i las rin chen 'byung lda no// grasang bAr ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor lwa a yig las rdo sedaM'u zhes pa'o// de ltar lha d+h+waM NI rgyas gdab pa ni A
177a4(rgyud 'grel): gdab par nges pa'o// yang ngag gi rgyas gdab pa ni lte bar l-I yi go/ snying gar u yaM go/ mgrin par r-I yi go/ dpral b.rA I yi go/ gtsug tor du A yIg ste sa'i dkyil 'khoR+Ya laM sogs pa bsi
177a5(rgyud 'grel): mo de ltar sems kyis thig les rgyas gdub pa ni/ dpral bar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la oM yi go/ mgrin par nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la AHyig/ snying gar smyu gu can gyi dkyil 'kho la hUM
177a6(rgyud 'grel): yi go// lte bar dus me'i dkyil 'khor lo ho yi go/ de ltar ye shes kyu rgyas gdab pa ni/ chos thams cad byed pa dang bral ba'i sgo can// thog ma nas ma skyes pa'i bdag nyid// rdo rje nor bur a yig grub
177b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// de nas oM su b+hI shud d+hA d+harmA d+hA tu dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA bAt+ma ko&hUM/ zhes pa brjod la dkyil 'khor las dbyung ba'o// yang de nyid las gsungs pa/ thabs dang shes rab snyoms par 'jug pa'i ting 'dzin gyis
177b2(rgyud 'grel): na mkha' la gnas pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched la sogs pa'i rang bzhin dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor gyi don du sangs rgyas lnga'i dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin rang gi lus la bcug la shes rab kyi pad+mar
177b3(rgyud 'grel): so so'i sngags kyi rang bzhin du bltas la/ de nos pad+ma nas snga mA ltar zhal dang / phyag dang mtshan ma dang dbyibs kyi mtshan nyid can/ ye shes dang / thugs dang / gsung dang / sku'i dkyil 'khor la dpyod par bya
177b4(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa ste/ de ltar dkyil 'khor dbyung bar bya'o// de nas snying ga'i pad+ma'i lte ba la ri bong can dang nyi ma dang / rtse mo can rnams las b+h+rUM yig las byung ba'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa/ nag po 'od zer rnam pa lnga 'phro bzhin po
177b5(rgyud 'grel): bsdams la/ rdo rje de nyid kyi lte ba'i dbu su dzoHyig yongasu gyur pa las rdo rje lcags kyu bsam par bya'o// rdo rje lcags kyu de nyid las sngon du gsungs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i rdo rje shugs yan lag brgyad pa'i
177b6(rgyud 'grel): shing rta la gnas pa 'od zer lcags kyu'i rnam pa can gyi rdo rje shugs yang dag par spro bar byas pas/ sngon du yang dag par grub pa'i khams gsum rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi 'khor lo spyan drangs nas/
178a1(rgyud 'grel): de nas rdo rje shugs rang gi gnasu gshegs par bya'o// de nas rmugs byed dang / rengs byed dang / nga rgyal can drang shin tu stobs can te khro bo bzhi rnams kyis 'gugs pa la sngogs pa bya'o//
178a2(rgyud 'grel): yang de nyid las gsungs pa de ltar rnam par shes pa lnga yis te/ dzAHyig gis dgug pa dang / hUM yig gis gzhug pa dang / baM yig gis bcing ba dang / hoHyig gis dgyes par bya ba dang / hrIHyig gis r-i mnyam
178a3(rgyud 'grel): par byas nas/ rdo rje lcags kyu drang / rdo rje dang / rdo rje zhags pa dang / rdo rje dril bu dang / rdo rje dbyug pa rnams kyis shes pa'o// de ltar ye shes kyi 'khor lo yang drag par mchod nas/ sngon ltar dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang ro gcig
178a4(rgyud 'grel): tu gyur par bsgom par bya ba nri nges pa'o// phan tshun rgyas gdab pa ni/ phyag btsal ba'i tshigasu bcad par gsungs pa'i rim pa bsgom pa ste/ 'di ni lha nyid kyi sku rdzogs pa'o// de nas sku lnga sogs pa byin gyis
178a5(rgyud 'grel): rlabs pa bya ste/ de yod de nyid las gsungs pa/ dpral bar a yig yongasu gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor// de'i steng du oM yig yongasu gyur pA las 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa'o// de yongasu gyur pa las su
178a6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje kha dog dkar po zhal gsum pa/ rtsa ba'i zhal dkar po g.yon dmar po g.yas nag po phyag drug pa/ g.yas kyi 'khor lo dang pad+ma dang rdo rje rnams 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas ral gri dang dril bu dang nor bu rnams 'dzin pa
178b1(rgyud 'grel): shes rab dang bcas pa dpral ba nas spros te/ de yis na mkha'i khams mA lus pa yongasu gang bur rnam par bsgoms nus/ sku rdo rje yis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la chos bstan par mdzad pa dang / slar log ste
178b2(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid kyi sngon du bzhugs pA lA rang dbang du blang bar bya ba ni/ sku rdo rje 'dzin bdag dbang bskur zhes paso// de nas sku'i rigs kyi lha mo rnams kyis bdud rtsi'i bum pas dbang bskur ba dang / de nas byin gyis brlabs
178b3(rgyud 'grel): par bya bya ni/ dpral bar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la sku rdo rje bcug nas 'di ltar brjod par bya ste/ dpal ldan sku yi rdo rje 'chang // byadag ni byin brlabs gnas yin pas// mi phyed rdo rje gsum thob par// myur bar sku yi
178b4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje madz+rod// phyogs bcur phyogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// bdag ni byin brlabs gnas yin pas// mi phyed rdo rje gsum thob par// myur bar sku yi rdo rje mdzod// ces bya ni sku byin gyis brlabs pa'o// de ltar mgrin
178b5(rgyud 'grel): par r-i yig yongasu gyur pa los nyi ma'i dkyil 'khoro// de'i steng du oM yig yongasu gyur pa lus pad+ma dmor po 'dab ma brgyud pa'o// dri yongasu gyur pa las gsung rdo rje dmar po dang bcas pa zhal dmar po dang
178b6(rgyud 'grel): dkar po dang nag po rnamaso// g.yas kyi pad+ma dang / rdo rje dang 'khor lo rnams 'dzin pa/ g.yon gyi rin po che dang dril bu dang ral gri rnams 'dzin pa/ spros pa na mkha'i khams ma lus pa gang bar rnam par bsgoms na/
179a1(rgyud 'grel): gsung rdo rje yis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la chos ston par mdzad pa dang // slar log ste bdag nyid sngon du bzhugs pa la dbang blang bar bya ba ni// gsung rdo rje 'dzin bdag dbang bskur zhes
179a2(rgyud 'grel): paso// de nas gsung gi rigs kyi lha mo rnams kyis bdag nyid lnga dbang bskur bar bsgom/ gsung byin gyis brlab par bya ba ni/ mgrin par nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gsung rdo rje bcug nas 'di ltar brjod par bya ste/ dpal
179a3(rgyud 'grel): ldan gsung gi rdo rje 'chang // bdag ni byin brlabs gnas yin pas// mi phyed rdo rje gsung thob par// myur bar gsung gi rdo rje mdzod// phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// bdag ni byin brlabs
179a4(rgyud 'grel): gnas yin pas// mi phyed rdo rje gsum thob par// myur bar gsung gi rdo rje mdzod// ces pa ni gsung byin gyis brlabs pa'o// de ltar snying gar thig le yongasu gyur pa las sgra gAcan gyi dkyil 'khor// de'i steng du
179a5(rgyud 'grel): hUM yig yongasu gyur pa lus rdo rtse mo lnga pa'o// de nyid yongasu gyur pa las thugs rdo rje sngon po shes rabA dang bcas pa ste/ zhal nag po dang dkar po dang dmar po rnamaso// g.yas kyi rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang pad+ma rnams
179a6(rgyud 'grel): rnams 'dzin pa/ g.yon rnams kyi dril bu dang nor bu dang ral gri rnams 'dzin pa/ de spros te na mkha'i khams ma lus pa yongasu gang bar bsgoms nas/ thugs rdo rjes 'dul bas sems can rnams la
179b1(rgyud 'grel): chos ston par mdzad pa dang / slar log ste bdag nyid kyi sngon du zhugs pa la dbang blang bar bya ba ni/ thugs rdo rje 'dzin bdag dbang bskur zhes pa'o// de nas thugs kyi rigs kyi lha mo rnams kyi bdag nyid lnga dbang
179b2(rgyud 'grel): bskur bar bsams nas/ thugs byin gyis brlabs par bya ba ni/ thugs kar sgra gcan gyi dkyil 'khor la thugs rdo rje bcug nas/ 'di ltar brjod par bya ste/ dpal ldan thugs kyi rdo rje 'chang // bdag ni byin
179b3(rgyud 'grel): brlabs gnas yin pas// mi phyed rdo rje gsum thob pas// myur bar thugs kyi rdo rje mdzod// phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// bdag ni byin brlabs gnas yin pas// mi phyed rdo rje gsum thob par//
179b4(rgyud 'grel): myur bAr thugs kyi rdo rje mdzod// ts+yais pras dwe ltar thugs byin gyis brlab+hA pur byas+thA nas 'dir ro gcig tu bya ba nI/ oM sur+b+ba ta thA gra ta krA ya b+hUk+tsit+ta badz+ra swa b+hA b+hUt+ma ko&haM/ zhes pa'i nga rgyal dong ldan paswa dri ltar bya'o//
179b5(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin du shes rab kyi lte bar hoHyig giso// gsang bar haHyig giso// spyi gtsug tu haM yig ste/ thabs kyi khu ba'i chos drang rigs drug zhes// de nas 'dir gtum mo'i rnal 'byor bsgom par bya bla ste/ de yang dri ma
179b6(rgyud 'grel): med pa las gsungs pa/ 'dir bskyed pa'i rim pa thams cad du lus rdzogs pa ni dkyil 'khor rgyal mchogo// ngag rdzogs pa ni las rgyal mchog ste/ las kyi dbang po'i bya ba la rab tu 'jug pa'i phyir// byang chub
180a1(rgyud 'grel): sems kyi thig le rdzogs pa ni thig le'i rnal 'byor twe/ byang chub kyi sems 'dzag pa'i phyiraro// bde ba la dmigs pa ni phywa moSh+Ti rnal 'byor te// de yang mi rnams kyi lo bcu drug gri mtha' ru'o//
180a2(rgyud 'grel): de'i phyir de'i longs spyod pa'i don du bag ma len pa'i dusu lag pa gtod par byed po dang / slob ma la slob dpon gyis shes rabu gratod par byed pa'o// de'i phyir las kyi phyag rgya de'i sgrub byed du// byis pa'i skye bo rnams
180a3(rgyud 'grel): la gsungaso// ye shes kyi phyag rgya ni bar ma rnams la'o// phyag rgya chen mo ni mchog gi rnal 'byor pa rnams la'o zhes pa'o// de nyid rtsa ba'i rgyud du bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa bcu drug lo ste rigs can ma/
180a4(rgyud 'grel): gzugs dang lang tshos brgyan pa ma// dang por shin tu bslab byas nas// dbang bskur bsgrub pa nas brtsams nas// sku gsung thugasu chags pa dang // dpral ba la sogs rnamasu dgod// hA ha gsang ba gtsug tor
180a5(rgyud 'grel): duHde nas pad+ma rnams sbyangs bya// a las pad+ma 'dab brgyad pa// b+h+rUM las rdo rje dang ldan pas// de ltar rdo rje dang bcas pa// shes rab thabs kyi rgyud nyid// hUM las bdag gi rdo rje nyid// rtse mo lnga pAr bsam par bya//
180a6(rgyud 'grel): de dbus pad+ma 'dab brgyad pa// oM yig las ni rab tu brtags// de ltar pad bcas rdo rje nyid// pad+ma la ni gzhag par bya// hUM phaT brjod cing rnal 'byor pas// mngal du rdo rje 'dzin pa rgyu// b+ha gar ling ga rab gnas
180b1(rgyud 'grel): pas/ byang chub sems ni smyo mi bya// khams gsum pa nI mA lus pa// sangs rgyas gzugasu bsgom pa bya// lte bar ga tu mo sbar ba yi// de bzhin gshegs pa lnga bsregs te// mig dang spyan ma la sogs/
180b2(rgyud 'grel): bsregs te rI bod can hUM 'dzag/ zhu ba'i chos can bdud rtsi nyid// thig lce gzugs kyis 'dzag pas nA// thig le'i rnal 'byor zhesu bshad// bcu drug phyed phyed thig le 'dzin// cha med cha lAs 'ongs pa ni// byas
180b3(rgyud 'grel): gtan bzhi pa'i rtse mo 'dzin// phra mo'i rnal 'byor zhesu bshad// rgyu mthun la sogs steng du 'gro// dung can ma ni phyag rgya che// nga ni gtum mor rab tu bstan// lta ba'i steng du g.yung mo ste// a bA d+hU tI mi sna ldan// 'od
180b4(rgyud 'grel): zer lnga yi rang bzhin srog/ dkyil 'khor lnga ni rgyu byed pa// sna rtser yungs dkar tsam du bstan// de yang srog sdod po ru brjod// khams gsum pa ni ma lus pa'i// srid pa gsum po yongasu shesau// sro gri nyid 'gag pa
180b5(rgyud 'grel): de nyid kyang // g.yo dang mi g.yo yungs dkaR+Sha tsa mo// sngo sor sdud pas phyag rgya che// na mkha' stong pa'i mtshan nyid// sna ldan de ni rab brtan pa// gang gri yid gnyis brtags pa yis// de yang de nyid las gsung
180b6(rgyud 'grel): pamatshan mo'i mtha' ru ri mo gang // de'i gzugs ni g.yo mi g.yo// rnal 'byor bsam gtan la sogs pa// de rnams ma lus bsgom par bya// zhes paso// de yang 'dir drang ba'i don du g.yo ba dang mi g.yo
181a1(rgyud 'grel): ba dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i rnam pa spro zhing bsgom par shes par bya'o// de yang de nyid las gsungs pa// khams gsum po lan gcig gis 'gugs par byed ces pa ni/ skad
181a2(rgyud 'grel): gcig gis dus gsum mkhyen pa/ lha'i rnal 'byor te/ dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i lho'i rnam par spro ba'o// 'khor ba pa rnams kyis kyang byang chub kyi sems las bu dang bu mo spro ba ste/ de ltar lo
181a3(rgyud 'grel): bcu drug gi mthar mngal nas skyes pa rnams kyi lus dang / ngag dang yid dang sems rnams rdzogs pa'o// lha rnams ni rnam par thar pa bzhi'i stobs kyis te/ 'dir kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i bden pa
181a4(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba'o// de dag las yang drang ba'i don du shes rab kyi chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi sna'i rtse mo las yungs kar la sogs pa'i nges pa dang / 'dir rdo rje 'dzin pa mngal du rgyu ba ste/ dri'i dbusu oM dz+nyA na
181a5(rgyud 'grel): pU d+h+r-i nu rA ga Na badz+re swa b+ha b+hat+ma ko&haM/ zhes pa'i nga rgyal bya'o// de yang de nyid las gsungs pa// lo bcu drug gi mtshams nas ye shes kyi mchod pa la rje su chags pa de bzhin du/ 'dir skyes pa'i rim
181a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dusu yang de'i rang bzhin bdag nyid du bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs par zhes pa'o// nges pa'i don du sngags bzlas pa ni srog mnyam par bzhag pa ste/ dgang ba dang dbyung ba dang / bum po can gyi
181b1(rgyud 'grel): ba la dus thams cad bsnyen par byas pas/ de nyid kyi lha'i mchog ster bar 'gyur ba'i phyir/ srog ma bsdams pa dang / ngag gi brjod pa dang bcus pas nges pa'i don la ma yin te/ des na sgrub
181b2(rgyud 'grel): pu'i thabs kyis bye brag sbyor ba'i yan lag drug mdor bstan pA tsam las ma bris pa ni gzhung ches kyis drogasde pa'o// drang don ltar na thun mong sgrub pa'i dron du phreng ba dang bcas byas sngags bzlas pa ste/
181b3(rgyud 'grel): de yang zhi ba dang rgyo skye ba la phyogs pas mu tAgr-i gam shel gyi phreng ba dang bcas pas sngags bzlas pa ni/ 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyi yan lag drug gi sngags 'di lta ste/ oM hUM hU~M hrIM hUM dz+r-IM hUM swA hA/
181b4(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa'i sngags 'di'i mthar na mo bcug pas zhi bar 'gyur ro// de ltar lha rnams gshegs par byi ba ni/ de yang de nyid las gsungs pa/ 'dir dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog dang / thig le'i rnal 'byor dang /
181b5(rgyud 'grel): pra mo'i rnal 'byor rnams bsgoms nas mchod pa bya ste/ bstod pa byA ba ni/ mchog sbyin rdo rje mchog khyod 'dud// ces pa la sogs pas bstod nas/ de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams gsheg su gsol
181b6(rgyud 'grel): ba ni/ gtsug tor du rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsgoms pa dang / de'i lte ba la bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo gshegasu gsol bar bya'o// de ltar snying ga chos kyi 'khor lo la rdo rje rtse dgu pa bsgoms pa dang / de'i lte ba la
182a1(rgyud 'grel): du ba ma la sogs pa rnams gshegasu gsol bar bya'o// de ltar dpral bar lhan cig skyes pa'i 'khor lo la rdo rje rtse mo bcu bdun pa bsgoms pa dang / de'i lte ba la phung po dang khams
182a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi lha rnams gshegs par bya'o// de ltar mgrin pa longs spyong 'khor lo la rdo rje rtse mo sum cu so gsum pa bsgoms pa dang / de'i lte ba la skye mched bcu gnyis kyi khro bo rnams gshegasu gsol bar
182a3(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// de ltar lci ba sprul pa'i 'khor lo la rdo rje rtse mo drug cu rtsi lnga pa bsgoms pa dang / de'i lte bya la tsa muN+Da la sogs pa dang / 'jigs byed ma la sogs pa'i lha rnams gshegasu gsol bar bya'o// de ltar
182a4(rgyud 'grel): gsang bar rdo rje rtse mo sum cu so gsum pa bsgoms pa dang / de'i lte ba la 'od zer can ma la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams gshegasu gsol bar bya'o// de ltar las kyi 'khor lo la rdo rje rtse mong sum cu so gcig
182a5(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams bsgoms pa dang / phyag btsal ba'i tshigasu bcad par gsungs pa ltar khya ba 'jug la sogs pa'i lha bcu gnyis 'khor dang bcas po rnams/ de rnams kyi lte ba rnams la gshegasu gsol bar bya'o//
182a6(rgyud 'grel): de ltar las kyi 'khor lo rnams la rdo rje rtse mo bdun pa rnams bsgoms pa dang / klu rnams dang khyi gdong ma la sogs pa'i lha rnams lte ba la gshe gsol bar bya'o// de nas thugs dang gsung dang sku'i 'khor lo/
182b1(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi bdag nyid kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bsgom par mi nus pa'i gang zag dbang po tha ma 'ga' zhig gis/ sngon du gsungs pa'i thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom pa ste/ de yang de nyid las gsum
182b2(rgyud 'grel): pa rgyal ba'i bdag po'i pad+ma'i gdan la gnas pa'i du ba la sogs pa'i lha mo brgyad dang / bum pa brgyad dang / chos kyi dung la sogs pa bzhi rnams spangs pa ni/ dpal lhun snying po'i 'khor lo ni thugs
182b3(rgyud 'grel): kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbusu nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bdag nyid 'gyur mi'i bdag po kye zhes pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor lho'i bzhugs pa ste/ de'i tshe dpal 'dus pa bzhin 'gyur ro zhe na/ 'dir nges pa med rje su
182b4(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba med pa'i phyir/ de ltar bcom ldan 'das rang sems nus ma dang ldan 'dir yang shes par byas la rnal 'byor rnams kyis ni sgrub pa po rnams kyis bsgom par bya'o// dbang gi don du rigs kyi dbang
182b5(rgyud 'grel): lus phyi'i dkyil 'khyor bral ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid du 'gyur ba'o// yang 'dir sngon du gsungs pa lhor lus dang dog dang lding rnam par dag pa la sogs pa rnams gshegs pa'i bar bsgom par bya ste/
182b6(rgyud 'grel): der gshegasu gsol bar byas nas/ de nas oM hUM phaT zhes pa'i nga rgyal byas pa dang / gtor ma sbyino// de yang de nyid las gsungs pa/ sngon du gsungs pa'i cho gas mtshams gsum du gtor
183a1(rgyud 'grel): ma sbyin par bya'o// sngon du gsungs pa'i cho gas dam tshig gis rdzas rnam par dag byis la/ lha'i tshogs rnams mnyes par bya ba'i don du gtor m+b+ha 'bul bA ni/ oM Ar+yA
183a2(rgyud 'grel): dz+nyA ho/ rim par gunas pasna dang po 'dir nr-i rtag tu dag bya sel bar bya ba dang / rab tu sbar bya nyid dang ri bong can tsu ma lus rim pas chung lnga bsgom par byos la/ snod de las ni nges par ri bong can gyi
183a3(rgyud 'grel): log pa'i ming med rtse mo la thig le nyid/ nyi phyed dang ni mtshungs pa'i dbus zlum po yin te de'i b+hi ru gru gsum byas pa la/ de'i dbusu ye shes 'khor lo snying gsum pa la gnas pa yang sngagasna
183a4(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis 'dir bsgoms nas/ mthe bong dang ni srin lag gi/ ny+tsi ma suM so'i dus tshim pa la sogs bya byi na/ 'dir ni sngon du yul dang grong gi bdag po rnams la dang po dbus mtha'i ming gyi gtor
183a5(rgyud 'grel): ma dbul+la/ 'phrog mu la yang tshangs pa gnyis/ gzhan yang khro bo'i rgyal po'i chung du sngags pas gautor ma'o// pho nya rnams la zas kyi rtse mo sa skyengs rnamasu bzhag ste/ khyab bdag rdo rje
183a6(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis sbyin// zos pa'i lhag ma 'byung po rnams la sbyin te gzhan yang dge ba'i don du sbyin pa'i tshig gtsang brjod// nyal ba'i dusu 'khrigs pa'i mchod pa byas nas yan log kha dang gnyis
183b1(rgyud 'grel): kyi rigs rnams nyid dang ni/ rung gi mgo dang mgrin pa snying gA lte gsang spyi bo'i 'khor lo rnams la rdo rje'i yan lag dgrod ces pa ste/ de nas a yig las byung ba'i bum pa gsum// de rnams kyi
183b2(rgyud 'grel): skyeng du oM yig las byung ba'i thod pa'o// nang na gnas pa ni phung po dang khams kyi sa bon rnams las byung ba'i bdud rtsi lnga dang sgron ma lnga rnam so// de rnams kyi 'og tu gnas pa'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor
183b3(rgyud 'grel): gyi rab tu sbar bya'i ma bzhu bar bya'o// de nyid hUM yig las byung ba'i rdo rje dkrug par bya'o// de dang bcas pa'i ro gcig tu gyur pas zla ba zhu ba'i gzugasu blta'o// de nas rnam par drag par bya ba la sogs pa'i
183b4(rgyud 'grel): sngags/ oM oM badz+ra tsin+na sArba d+har+m+ma su bi shud+d+heHswA b+hA ba sarba d+har+m+ma bi sho d+ha yA swA hA/ oM AHbadz+ra sUr+ya sarba d+har+m+ma pra b+ho d+ha ka sarba d+har+m+ma pra b+ho d+ha ya swA hA/ oM hUM badz+rA na la sarba d+har+m+ma pra dI pa ka sarba d+harmA pra di pa ya
183b5(rgyud 'grel): swA hA/ oM ho sarba d+harma badz+rI mr-i ta kau ra sarba d+har+m+ma badz+ra mr-i taM ku ru ku ru swAhA/ zhes pa rnams kyi lag pa g.yon pas rnam par dgab par bya bA dang / lag pa gra yis pas sgrol bar bya ba dang / thal myos kha
183b6(rgyud 'grel): bcad de reg pas rab tu sbar bar bya ba dang / rdo rje bya khyung gi rgyas rdo rje bdud rtsir bya'o// gzhan yang khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgyas yul gyis bdag po spyan drang bar bya ba dang / khyi'i phyag
184a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyas grong gi bdag po rnams la'o// rtse lnga pa'i phyag rgyas khro bo'i rgyal po rnams la'o// gri gug gi phyag rgyas zad par rnams la'o// ral gri'i phyag rgyas lha mo rnams la'o//
184a2(rgyud 'grel): rIrin po che'i phyag rgyas gza' rnams la'o// pad+ma'i phyag rgyas klu rnams la'o// 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas 'byung po rnams la'o// dwe yang oM AHhUM a mu k+Sha gats+tsha gats+tsha shrI g+h+raM I dam+b+ha bA li gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na b+hug tA
184a3(rgyud 'grel): pI twA tri pa tid+l-i traM sarba satwA nAM shAn+thi tsat+taM kr-it+t+ra pa ras+thA naM gIts+tsha gr-its+tsha swA hA/ zhes pa gtor ma'i sngags 'dis yul gyi bdag po dang / grong gi bdag po 'am de ltar yul lam/ grong gi ming gi yi ge gradA yadA rung
184a4(rgyud 'grel): bu gI sum dang lnga dang bdun yin na/ de yang ming gi yi ge dang po dang / dbus dang mtha' ma rnams bcug ste/ gtor ma sbyin no// gal te de gnyis dang bzhi dang / drug la sogs bya mnyam pa'i ming gi ye
184a5(rgyud 'grel): gre yin nA/ dang po mtha' ma bcug la sbyin par bya'o// de nas sngon du smos pa'i khro bo la sogs pa rnams la bltas l-i/ ji lta ba bzhin sngagus kyi rkang pa rnams brjod la/ oM AHhUM d+d+ho uSh+NI Sha sum+b+ha
184a6(rgyud 'grel): ni sum+b+ha big+h+nAn+ta ka nI la daN+Da pradz+nyAn+ta ka/ tsaki r-I dz+nyA pad+man+te ka/ a tsa la/ ya~M man+ta ka/ masme ba le b+h+yaHsa pi ri wA re b+h+yaHi daM ba ling+gats+tsha puSh+paM d+hU paM d+hi paM any+dza taM/ da d+ha ma tsi/ te tsA ga t+ya saM pau ri wA riHshrI b+h+yAM/
184b1(rgyud 'grel): I daM ba lo grih+nana? tu/ khA d+yan tu/ pi wan+tu/ dzaHhuM baM hoHsaM tri pa truHsarba sat+kA naM shAn+ti puSh+Ti rak+ShA ba rA Na kup+taM kurban+tu huM hUM phaT badz+ra d+hA rA dz+nyA pA ya ti swAh+ma/ zhes pA ni khro bo'i rgya lnga po rnams kyi gtwoR+Ya
184b2(rgyud 'grel): mU'i sngag so// de ltar AM AHhUM ho A k+Sh+ya sha ba yu te dzo da pr-i thi bI sA d+hi de b+h+yaHsa pa ri wI re b+h+yAMr+d+ha.i daM baM lau gan+d+ho/ purl-i/ d+hu pr-i/ dI pa mak+Sha ti da dA ma h+ne/ te tsA ga t+ya sa pa ri wAR+ShA shrI g+h+raM I daM ba
184b3(rgyud 'grel): l-i grih+na na tu/ kha dAn tu/ bi ban+d+he/ dzIHhuM bAM ho/ saM tri pa tA/ sarba set+su naM shAn+ti puSh+Ti rak+ShA wa rA Na gup+taM kurban+tu huM hUM phaT bAdz+ra d+hA rA dz+nyA pa yA ti sA hA/ zhes pa la sogs pa zad par rnams kyi ga to ra ma'i sngags
184b4(rgyud 'grel): swoHdwe ltar au AHhUM ho brah+ma bi Du nai r-it+sa brA yu ya mAg+ni sa u dre shwa ren+na yaN b+h+yaHsr-i pa ri wA ra b+h+yar+d+hA i ngi ba li gan+taM puSh+paM/ d+hA paM/ dwI paM/ ak+Sha taM da d+ba ma he/ te tsA ga t+ye sa pa ri wA ra/ shrI g+h+raM
184b5(rgyud 'grel): i daM ba laM gr-ih+Nan tu khyA dan tu bi wAn+tu dziHhUM baM hauHsaM tr-i pa tAHsarba satwA naM shAn+ti puSh+pe rak+ShA ba ra Na gup+taM kurban tu huM hUM phiT badz+ra d+hA rA dz+nyo pa ya ti swA hA/ zhes pa ni phyogs skyong rnams kyi gtor ma'i sngags
184b6(rgyud 'grel): so/ de ltar o aHhUM ho rA hu kA lAg+ni tsan+da sur+ya bu d+ha maM ga la shukra br-i ha sa? ti ke tu shaM ne b+h+yaHsaM pA ri wA re b+h+yaHi daM kr-i mo/ gan+d+haM/ puSh+paM/ d+hU paM/ dI paM/ ak+Sha taM/ dA da ma he/ te tsA
185a1(rgyud 'grel): gat+ya sa pa rI wA R+ShAHshI g+b+h+yAM/ I daM ba li gr-ih+NAn+du khA daN t+yA/ pi wAn+su/ dzaHhUM baM hoHsaM tI bA tAHsar+b+bA sad+d+ha nA shAn+ti puSh+TaM rak+ShA ba rA Na gup+te kurbanA tu hUM hUM phaT/ badz+dza d+ha r+YAdz+nyA pA
185a2(rgyud 'grel): ya ti sA hAHzhes pa ni gza' rnams kyi gau tor ma'i sngags so// de ltar au AHhUM ho dza ya bI dzaM ya pad+ma karko Ta kwa bA su kiM shAM khA pA la ku lai k+Sha nan+ta tak+Sha ka many+dza pad+me b+h+yaSh+Tas pra ri wA r-i b+hUHi daM pra liM gan+d+haM
185a3(rgyud 'grel): puSh+ma/ d+hUpaM/ dI paM/ ak+Sha taM da dA ma hwe/ te tsa a gad+ya swa pa ri wA R+ShaHshI b+h+yAM i di/ byA laM gr-ih+Nan tu khyA dan tu pi wAr+N+Na dzaHhUM b+h+r-i hoHsaM tr-i pa trAHsarba sAd+d+ha nAM/ shAn+ti puSh+Te/ raSh+Ta ra Na gub ti kur
185a4(rgyud 'grel): ban+ma tu huM hUM phaT badz+ra d+hA ra Udz+nyA pa yA ti swA hA/ zhes pa ni kru rnams kyi gtor ma'i sngagaso// de ltar au aHhUM ho bI tra Da bi kr-i ta mu kha shra kA k+ShA s+yA ka ra gr-i d+hA byA g+ho lu ka dze puM kA ga ru Da mu khe b+h+yaHsa
185a5(rgyud 'grel): pa rI wA re b+h+yaHi daM ba liM ga nA d+haM/ puR+YaM/ dzU b+hidI paM/ p+lak+Sha taM/ dA da ma he/ dre tsA gang+ga saM pa ri wA re shrI b+h+yAM/ au ngaM/ ba l+r-i gr-its+tshan+te khI dan tu pi wAn tu/ dzaHhUM baM ho/
185a6(rgyud 'grel): saM tri pi tA/ sarba satwA naM shan+tiM puSh+paM rak+Sha ba ra Na gup+tiM kurban+tu huM hUM phaT badz+ra d+ha ra dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ zhes pa ni 'byung po rnams kyi gtor ma'i sngags so// de nas gshegasu gsol ba ni/ de yang de
185b1(rgyud 'grel): nyid las gsungs pa/ gshegs su gsol ba'i dus/ gsang ba'i 'khor l-i ra haM yig las khro bo'i 'khor lor gzhug par bya'o// gtsug t+yong du a yig las zung par stong pa la sogs
185b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// dpral bar i sdig las phyogs skyong gri 'khor lo'o// mag+nin+ya par+ya raM yig las gza'i 'khor lo'o// snying gar u yig lus klu'i 'khor lo'o// lte byung l-i sdig las 'byung po'i
185b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo rab tu gzhug pa zhes bya ba ni/ gshegs su gsol ba'i cho ga'o// / mgon po byis pa blo dman rnams kyis dran phyir// dpal ldan 'jig
185b4(rgyud 'grel): rten masngon po nyid kyi bsgrub thabs// las ni phyung bas de'i phyir na yab dang // mtshungs pa gang zhig mi gtsigs pa la bzod pa ltar du// bdug la rab tu rtse bas thugs rjes brlan pa bzod par
185b5(rgyud 'grel): mdzod cig/ de ltar dbul dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten ngobang phyug gis// sprul pa pad+ma dkar pos yang dag par mdzad pa'i dri ma med pa'i 'od las phyung bya// bcom ldan 'das dpal dus
185b6(rgyud 'grel): kyi 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs kyi cho ga'i rim par phye ba rdzogs so// / dus kyi 'khor lo pa chen po paN+Di ta swe d+hu pu tra yis paN+Di tA
186a1(rgyud 'grel): chen po rnam+ba ka shAn+ti'i don du mdzad pa rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta chen po lnga ga shwar gub+ha pa dang sra bsgyur gyi lo slo ba dge slong chos rab bdag gis
186a2(rgyud 'grel): bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
187a1(rgyud 'grel): dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba bzhug so//
187b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ shrI kA la tsakra maN+Da lo pa ye kA ba d+ha/ bod skad du/ dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba/ dpal dus kyi 'khor lo la phyag 'tshalo//
187b2(rgyud 'grel): dngos dang dngos mdu rnam par mkhyen pas 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa rab tu 'joms par mdzad pa yi// thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin khyab bdag dpal ldan dus 'khor nges par gzhan gyi don mdzad
187b3(rgyud 'grel): la/ phyag byas sems can don phyir rgyud gsungs cho ga bzhin du de yi dkyil 'khor cho ga nyid// rang gi don dang 'on kyang gzhan don du yang 'gyur bas yid la 'dod pa sgrub byed bshad// 'dir thog
187b4(rgyud 'grel): ma med pa'i ma rig pa'i mun pa'i tshogs kyis blo'i mig bsgribs pas mi bden pa'i lam nas 'gro ba'i sems can gyi tshogs sdug bsngal spyod pa bsal bar nus par yang drag par mthong byas/ snying
187b5(rgyud 'grel): rje mchog dang ldan pa'i mngon par shes pa thob pa'i dge slong ngam/ dge tshul lam khyim na gnas pa rnams sam/ snying rje dang ldan pa la sogs pa mngon par shes pa med pa'i rdo rje slob dpon dang por
187b6(rgyud 'grel): bsnyen gnas kyi bslab pa la gnas pa la sogs pas dkyil 'khor du dbang bskung ba la sogs pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du 'jug pa'i lam gyis de rnams kyi stobs pa'i rim pa ji lta ba
188a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin rjesu bzung ba ni/ de yang slob ma dam pa rnams kyis gsol ba gdab pa dang / dge ba'i nyi ma la sogs pa la gtor ma dang mchod pa la sogs pa sngon du song byas/ dkyil 'khar
188a2(rgyud 'grel): gyi sa gzhi la yongasu brtag par bya ste/ de yang grong khyer la sogs pa'i dbang ldan dang / byang phyogasu zhi ba dang rgyas pa'o// shar dang me'i mtsham su dbye ba dang bskrad pa'o// bden bral dang lho phyogasu dbang dang
188a3(rgyud 'grel): dgug pa'o// nub dang rlung du rengs pa dang rmongs pa'o// grong khyer la sogs pa'i dbu su l-is thams cad pa'i dkyil 'khor bri bA ste/ de yang dbus cung zad mtho bA la shar dang byang cung zad gzhol ba'i sa
188a4(rgyud 'grel): gzhi ru bzung bar bya ba ni de yang dbye ba la bzhi ste/ bram ze dong rgyal rigs dang rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs rnams kyis dbye bas kha dog dang dri dang ro rnams kyis shes par bya'o// zhi ba dang rgyas pa la
188a5(rgyud 'grel): dkar po'o// dbang dang dgug pa la dmar po'o// rengs pa dang rmongs pa la ser po'o// bsad ba dang bskrad pa la nag po'o// ro thams cad dang / dri thams cad dang na mkha'i khams rnam par dag pa las thams
188a6(rgyud 'grel): cad pa la ljang gu'o// der ni dong brus de nyid kyis// myur bar ngong nyid rab tu dgang // gal te dgang bar gyur pa na// sa gzhi de nyid dge bar shes// slar yang dong nge mtho gang tsam// bru bar byas te chus bkang la//
188b1(rgyud 'grel): grom pa brgya ru 'gro byar bya// 'ongs nas bAlta bar byas pa dang // gdu bar gyur nas sa gzhi dge/ dmya' na dge bar mi 'dod spang // chu nyid sgra dang bcus tsam gyis// klu yi 'jigs sogs go bar bya// zhes pa
188b2(rgyud 'grel): ni sa gzhi brtag pa'o// de ltar slob dpon gyis sau'i mtshan nyid dwashes par bya la// dpyid zla 'bying po dang dpyid zla tha chung ngam// zla ba gzhan rnams kyi tshes lnga 'am bcu la gdug pa'i gza' la 'jug phod la
188b3(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa dang bral ba'i dus kyi snga dro la// khru bzhi tsam pa lang gi lci bas byugs te// dkyil 'khor du brtags pa'i sa gzhi'i chu'i dbu su shar du kha phyogs te bsdad la lha'i rnal 'byor la gnas te/ de na
188b4(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'i zhing skyong rnams la me tog la sogs pas mchod nas/ 'di na gnas pa'i lha klu dang / gnod sbyin srin po 'am ni gzhan de nyid rnams la sa gzhi slong // dkyil 'khor don du de gsol cig
188b5(rgyud 'grel): cesa? lan g+hasum du brjod nas gsung bar 'gyur ba'i cho gas dag pa la sogs pa byas la// gr-ing gi ming+ga dram ring rang gi ming dang sngags 'dis gtor ma sbyi no// au AHhUM a mu ka s+ya s+ya pA ri wA R+Sha ya/
188b6(rgyud 'grel): i daM ba laM gan+d+ho puSh+pe d+hU paM dI paM ak+Sha taM dA ma ha sa pa ri wA rAHshI g+h+raM a gats+tsha tu dzeHhUM baM hoHi daM ba laM grih+Na tu khA daM tu pi waM tu sa pa ri wA rA ka sarba satwA no shAn+ti puSh+Ti ranI wA raM Na gu pa tiM ka ro tri daM s+t+rai naM t+yak+Sh+ma b+h+ra h+ya
189a1(rgyud 'grel): maN+Da la b+hu myaM tiSh+Tha tu huM hUM phaT budz+nyA d+hA rUdz+nyA pa ya tI swAhA/ zhes pa ni zhing skyong gshegs pa'i cho ga'o// de nas sgrub thabasu gsungs pa'i cho gas srung ba'i 'khor lo bsgoms te bge
189a2(rgyud 'grel): bsreg pa dang bskrad pa dang gdab pa rnams byas pa dang / khyo bo'i tshogs spros la phyogs bcu bsrungs nas sa'i lha mo spyan drang bar bya ste/ de'i rim pa ni rang gi snying gar zla ba dang sa glazhi la yang pad+ma'i steng
189a3(rgyud 'grel): du zla ba la laM yi ge yongasu gyur pa lngas 'khor lo ser po'o// de yongasu gyur pa las sa'i lha mo zhal gsum phyag drug ma g.yos na 'khor lo dang dbyug pa dang / rdo rje rnams 'dzin pa/ g.yon na mdung
189a4(rgyud 'grel): ngang lcags sgrog dang rdo rje dr-il+lu nAM 'dzin pa na bza' ser mo dang rin po ches brgyan par bsams la/ thugs ka'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis sngon du gsungs pa'i gzugs wAr+ya/ dzaHhUM baM ho zhes pa'i
189a5(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyis spyan drangs te/ dam tshig sems dpa' dang ye shes sems dpa' gcig tu byas nas yon chab snod chu dang dri la sogs pa dang bcas pa'i yon chad dbul ba'i tshig su bcad pa 'di lta ste/
189a6(rgyud 'grel): lha'i bdag po dang bcas bdud sde rgyal bas bcom dus lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur pa'i tshe/ khyed la lha yi mchog gi mchod dang phyag rgyas bzhes pa'i phyir ni de nga yi yon chab 'di yang bzhes/ zhes pas
189b1(rgyud 'grel): bstod la/ byang chub rgyu ru stobs mchog ldan pa'i byudud kyi sde rnams rgyal bas bcom pa d+hI lta ba bzhin du/ de bzhin bdag kyang slob ma rnams kyi dbang gi don du bdud kyi stobs rnams 'jig par byed pa'o// zhes
189b2(rgyud 'grel): pas gsol ba btabA la sngags 'dis mchod // oM l-i AHts+tsha ba sun+da d+hA ra sarba bud+d+ha dza na ni saMrba sarbo pa kA ri Ni badz+ra sat+kA dz+nyA pa ya tI shI g+h+nAM mA gats+tsha gats+tsha daM gr-i d+h+yaM puSh+TiM dz+nyA pr-i tI paM nai bai t+yaM pha lAk+Sha taM da dI mi tA watA me
189b3(rgyud 'grel): wa gr-ih+NA prad+d+ha mAr+d+ha lAn+ma ma mas+thA naM da tra sarba satwA naM shan+ti puSh+Ti kr-i ti su b+hA ts+tshit+te ne daM s+thA n+do t+yak+Sh+ma paR+Shas+thA naM gAts+tsha gats+tsha swAhA/ zhes pa ni su'i lha mo gsheg stsol ba'i cho ga'o// de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
189b4(rgyud 'grel): dpa' rnams kyi phyogs bcu na na mkha'i khams khyab par bltas la yon chub la sau la byin nA stog la soDa p+l-i mtshol/ de nAM la rab tu gsol pa gdab pa 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas rnams dang sdig pa bral ba'i byang chub
189b5(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' phyogs rnams la bzhugs gang dog btsun mor bcas// snying rje mchog ldan de nyid rnams kyis byadag la dkyil 'khor du ni dbang bsgyur don du skyabasu gasngal zhes paso// de nas bgogs dang
189b6(rgyud 'grel): log par 'dren pa la sogs pa gzhan rnams rdo rje lcags kyus dgug par bya'o// rdo rje zhags pas bcing bar bya'o// rdo rje phur bus khro bo'i rgyal po'i lte ba man tshod mdung gi rnam pa can sdang ba rnams kyis steng
190a1(rgyud 'grel): nas 'debs par bsams pa'i sngagaswa kyi rkang pa 'di lta ste/ oM AHhUM ho hr-i k+ShaHhUM hUM phAT phyaT/ badz+ra kI la kra yA bAk+ShItwA dz+nyA nA d+hi pA t+yeSha Ta mu khyA Sha Ta bu dza Sha TA sar+b+ba tsa ra Na
190a2(rgyud 'grel): sarba big+ha nAM bI nA yA k+Sha d+hi duSh+mA naM/ k+Sha yA bAk+ShIt+tA dz+nyA na kI la ya ki la ya hUM hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje tho ba'i sngags nau/ oM l+li badz+ra mung+ga ra mA rA drI nAM shI rai sr-i kAn+ne hr-i da ye na b+h+yo gu d+yAn taM badz+ra kli la ke na kro Ta
190a3(rgyud 'grel): yA ko Ta ya NAM k+ShAM k+Shau k+ShI k+Shau k+Shau k+ShuM k+ShuM kl-i k+ShaM/ hU~M hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT/ zhes brjod cing tsan dan+ta dmarA pos byug pa khA dog lnga yi skud pas dkri/ steng gi phyog su me tog dang grub pa'i yungs kar gyis
190a4(rgyud 'grel): bcings la/ seng ldeng les byung ba'i mkhrang ba'i phur pa mchur sor bcu gnyis pa sbom su sor bzhi pas sa gzhi'i phyogs bcu ru gdab par bya'o// de rnams la khro bo rang rang gi mtshon cha dang bcas pa
190a5(rgyud 'grel): bcu spros la 'godado// 'dri ni sa gzhi phur bus bsrung ba'i don du bgregs rnams la phur busa? gdab pa'i cho ga'o// de naus de ltar bgrogs med par bsams la lto 'phye brtags par bya ste/ dkyil 'khor
190a6(rgyud 'grel): gang du byed pa'i sa gzhi der sa stegs gru bzhi pa byas la/ sa gzhi de nyid kyi dbusu lto 'phye nyal ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid shes par byas la sa gzhi dag par bya'o// de yang nyi ma bgrod pa'i
190b1(rgyud 'grel): dbye bas ston zla ra ba lA sogs pa zla ba gsum gsum rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du shar dang lho drang nub dang byang gi phyogs rnamasu mgo bstan nas lho la sogs pa kha ltas pa ste sa gzhi de'i dra busu lto 'phye
190b2(rgyud 'grel): nyal zhes bashring paso// de ltar shes par byas la/ byang phyogs kyi sgrub pa po dang stabs gcig tu rdo rje khu tshur gyis srung pa bzung ste me dang rlung du gnas nas shar dang lho dang byang dang nub kyi phyogs dgo
190b3(rgyud 'grel): tu g.yas skor gyi 'gro zhing thig brgya // yang de ltar bskor zhing sa brko bar bya'o// lto 'phye'i lte ba'i phyogs nus te lto pa las khru gang spangs pa 'am lte ba'i thad so spangs pa'o// de gzhi de nyid la rdo bA
190b4(rgyud 'grel): gnus na rlung gis 'jigs par 'gyu ro// rus pas ni gzer bar 'gyuraro// gyo mog gis ni lcags par 'gyuraro// sbran pa dang sol bdag gis ni rims sam 'chi bar 'gyur// sgra dang rtswa dang thal ba dang shi du
190b5(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa rnams kyis ni brla gtsang phra mor 'gyur ro// rgyu mtshan nges na de rnams dor bar bya'o// gal te de nas rin po che 'am dung ngam mching bu rnams byung na shin tu dge bar 'gyur ro// sngon du gsungs pa'i
190b6(rgyud 'grel): mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i sa gzhi ma rnyed na chu 'am rdo mthong ba'i bar du brkos las de rnams dor te/ sa gzhan gyis dgang ba ni dr-i dang ro yi don du las kyi bye brag gis sa'i bye brag ste/ se dkar po la tsan dan
191a1(rgyud 'grel): gyi chu dang bska ba dang kha pra dag gis bsres pas dragang ngo // dmar po la pad+ma'i chu dang tsha ba gsum gyiso// ser po la bung bu dang rta dang mi rnams kyis gcin dang bu ram gyiso// nagu
191a2(rgyud 'grel): po la sha rul dang lan tshwa dang sbyar ba rnams kyiso// de nas dkar por zhi ba la sa'i snying por shel gzhug par bya'o// rgyas pa la dung ngo // rims gzhomu pa la mu ti gau/ dmar po la dbang du bya ba la go
191a3(rgyud 'grel): rlo tsa nA'o// dgug pA lnga 'tshal// dug rengs pa la lcong ro so// ser po phur bus gdab pa la lug gi rwa'o// rings pa la ba bla'o// rmongs pa la s+phu lo// nag por gsad pa la mI'i rus pa'o// bskrad pA la byA rog
191a4(rgyud 'grel): gi sgo'o// ljang gur ni rin po che lnga rnams gzhug pa'o// de nas dpangs la khru phye dang ngo pa kun du mnyam pa cung zad du rus sbrel gyi rgyu ba 'dra ba shar dang byung gzhol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi sa gzhi bca'o//

191a6(rgyud 'grel): la sogs chu 'gram dang // sngon du dag par byas pa rnams// ma sbyangs pa nas ngag pa yin// zhes gsungs pas 'on kyang rdo rje shugs kyi rnal 'byor gyis 'dir bgegs bsgred pa ni/ yi ge bdun pa bzlas pa'i/

191b2(rgyud 'grel): pas rdo rje'i sa gzhir bsams nas/ oM mye daM ni badz+rI b+ha ba badz+ra ban d+ha hUM/ oM ha nA ha na badz+ra kro d+hA hUM phaT/ oM AHhUM sho d+ha ya sho d+ha ya rAk+Sha rak+Sha hUM hUM phaT zhes pa'i sngags brjod cing / thal mo sa la
191b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhag la byin+da gyis brlab po// de nas sngon du gan sde gzhan du gshe gros pa'i sa'i lha mo yod kyi spyan drang s+ya la gtor ma dang zhabs byasil lce sogs pas mchod nas/ oM AHdz+haiM hU~M heSh+ThaHzhes pa

191b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rang bzhin de bzhin nyid du lhag par mos par bya ba 'di ni gong na med pa'i rnam par dag pa'o// de nas me tog gi phreng ba sna tshogs pa dril bu dang bcas pa dang / nA bza' sna tshogs dang bla re rnams

192a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dril bu bzung nas dri bya'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnal 'byor dang ldan pas srung ba'i 'khor lo la sogs pas bgegs rnams brlag par bya ba ni spos snod bzung ste/ lce hUM las rdo rjer
192a2(rgyud 'grel): bskyed nas brjod pa/ phyogs rnams kun na bzhugs pa yi// sangs rgyas bdag la dgongasu gsol// 'dir ni che ge rdo rje bdag/ dkyil 'khor 'bri bar 'dod pa yi// sangs rgyas la sogs byon par zhu// 'dir ni

192a6(rgyud 'grel): pa bshad du gsol// chos rnams zhi ba las byung mchog/ rnam par dag pa'i ye shes spyod// kun tu bzang po gsung gi mchog// dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol// mtshan nyid thams cad yongs
192b1(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs// mtshan nyid da bral ba rnam par spangs// kun tu bzang po sku yi mchog/ dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/ zhes pa'i tshig su bcad pa bzhi'i rim pa bzhin bdag nyid kyis gsol

192b3(rgyud 'grel): 'og tu phyogs pas spyi bor gzhog la/ hUM badz+rod+d+hi zhes pa brjod namakha' l-I gdego// skyil mo krung bkrol te langs nas shar du phyogs pa dang mnyam par bsdad la// thul mo spyi bor sbya re la de bzhin

193a1(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor dbang po'i rgyal// bdag ni phyag rgya rdo rje bstan// zhes paso// de naswa rkang mthil du 'brur bzhin pa'i rdo rje bsgoms la gsung bar 'gyur ba'i rim pas 'gying bA dang bcas
193a2(rgyud 'grel): bA'i pad+ma'i lag bskor bya// rdo rje gsor dril bu dkrol dbang ldan nas brtsams te g.yas bskor gyis rdo rje'i 'gros kyis bcag par bya ba ni/ slob ma dang bcas pas sum gcig pus dkyil 'khor

196a1(rgyud 'grel): kha la sor drug pa mchu la sor gnyis pa'o// las thams cad pa la zhi ba la sogs pa'i las la bshad pa'i bum pa gzung bar bya'o// gser ram dngul lAm shel lam zungs
196a2(rgyud 'grel): rnams las byas pa'i bum pa ji ltar rnyed pa 'am gser la sogs pa med na bshad pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa rnams stong par byas te/ baM las rin po che'i gzugasu bsams la zhi bu dang rgyus pa'i don du
196a3(rgyud 'grel): 'bras sum rdo rgyus sam tsAn dan+da dkar pos byugs/ lha rnams kyi mtshan ma bri// bdud rtsi lnga dang bcas pa'i dri zhim po'i chu dang rin po che lnga dang / sman lha dang 'bru lnga rnams nang du'o// mdzes pa'i shring dang ldan pa
196a4(rgyud 'grel): mgrin byang ris zung gis gris pa bla ro'i 'og tu'i chad par 'gyur ba'i rdul tshon gyis dkyil 'khor la mtshan ma dgang pA'i rim pa ltar dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pAr dri zhim pauSh+Ti maN+Dal ji ltar rigs pa'i

196a6(rgyud 'grel): b+h+yan d+hA ban d+hA hU~M/ zhes pa'i sngags kyi dkri bar bya'o// da ni nang gi 'bru bcud rnams bstan pa/ in+d+ra nI la dang / pad+ma rA ga dang / zla ba chu shel dang / karke Ta dang ka ke ru rnams dang / gser dang dngul dang zangs
196b1(rgyud 'grel): dang rnon po dang kha pA len te lcags rnams dang de bzhin mu tig dang b+hu ru dang / mu men dang shU la mA ni dang / thig le drug pa rnams ni 'bring po'o// shel dang mchod dang gzi dang mching bu dang / nor bu sngo
196b2(rgyud 'grel): bsangs rnams ni tha ma'o// de rnams med na dri zhim po'i me tog kha dog lnga yiso// yang brah+ma daN+Di cha gnyis drang biSh+Ta krAn+ta cha gcig dang / ru tra dza nA cha gsum dang / I shwa ri cha bzhi dang / daM wA DA li cha lnga

196b4(rgyud 'grel): rnamaso// yang ras ni sngon po dang / nag po dang dmar po dang / dkar po dang ser po dang rnamaso// rnam rgyal gyi bum pa la sna tshogs pad+ma'i lte ba la dkar po dang dmar po dang nag po dang ser po ste/ zla ba dang nyi
196b5(rgyud 'grel): ma drang sgra gcan dang dus kyi me'i dkyil 'khor rnams kyi steng du rdo rje rtse gsum pa sngon po bcom ldan 'das kyi'o// shar gyi bum pa la ral gri nag po// lho'i la rin po che dmar po// nub kyi 'khor lo ser po//
196b6(rgyud 'grel): byang gi la pad+ma dmar po// me mtshams kyi la ral gri/ bden bral gyi la pad+ma dmar po// bde byed kyi le ut+pal dkar po// rlung gi 'khor lo ser po rnams bri zhing / nub kyi rgyal ba'i bum pa la gri gug bri bar bya'o//
197a1(rgyud 'grel): rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa'i steng du rnam par rgyal ba chen po'i dung bzhago/ de rnams las rnam par rgyal bya chen por rin po che ljang gu'o// rgyal ba dang rnam par rgyal bar sngon po'o// shar dang mer
197a2(rgyud 'grel): nag po'o// lho dang bden bral du dmar po'o// byang dang dbang ldan du dkor po'o// nub dang rlung du ser po'o// de ltar khab len dang rnon po dang / zangs me dang dngul dang gser rnams kyang ngo // de ltar sman rnams cha
197a3(rgyud 'grel): gcig par rnam par rgyal ba la'o// de ltar cha gnyis pa dang gsum pa dang bzhi pa dang lnga pa rnams rim pa bzhin shar dang me dang lho dang badren bral dang byang dang dbang ldan dang nub dang rlung rnams kyi bum pa rnams
197a4(rgyud 'grel): su'o// thams cad gdums pa rnam par rgyal ba chen por bcug ste/ de gtso bo bya ba kun byed pa'i rnam rgyal steng du bzhag la nged sngar bstan pa'i bdud rtsi lnga dang bcas pa'i dri zhim po'i chu blug me tog gi phreng bas
197a5(rgyud 'grel): brgyan oM badz+rA mr-i to ta ka Sha hUM/ zhes pa dang / yi ge drug pa lan+da bdun bzlas tAM/ de ltar bdud rtsir byas la de'i nang oM tAp+te tAp+te ma hA tAp+te swA hA/ zhes pas lha'i chu'i rang bzhin spyan drangasra pa dang / lha'i 'khor lo
197a6(rgyud 'grel): gdan dang bcas pa rnam par bsams la rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis ye shes pa spyan drangs te/ zhabs bsil dang thor thung dang yon chab la sogs pa sngon du song ba dang / de nyid dam tshig gi 'khor lo la
197b1(rgyud 'grel): gzhug/ de'i nang du chags pa chen pos zhu ba dang / byang chub sems kyi gzugasu ro gcig tu gyur pa rnam par byas mo// yang mtshan ma las dam tshig gi lha dang / ye shes kyi lha yang ro gcig tu gyur par blta'o// de yang
197b2(rgyud 'grel): me tog gi phreng ba dang ldan pa'i rdo rje gzung bas rnam rgyal gyi bum pa la sogs pa la reg la 'khor lo'i gtso bo'i snying po'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad dang / oM haM hUM ha~M hrI dz+haiMts+tsha ts+yai hU~MhU~M s+t+wa~M badz+ra pad+mA mA~M ta g+ha Ta su bi bud+d+ha d+hAm+b+ha d+d+ha
197b3(rgyud 'grel): tu swa b+hA ba sarba d+hum+b+ha su br-i bud+d+ha d+harmAd+hA tu swa b+hA wA ku ru ku r+ya swAhA/ zhes pa'i sngags bzlas shing dkyil 'khor gyi dbusu rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa bzhago// bum pa gzhan rnams nI lho rang rang gi sngags nyi shu rtsa gA cig
197b4(rgyud 'grel): dud sngags 'di lan nyi shu ga bAzlas te rang ring gi gnasu bzhago// de nas rnam rgyal la sogs pa'i bum pa rnams me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod nas/ ji srid dkyil 'khor gyi bya ba rdzogs kyi bar
197b5(rgyud 'grel): de sridu dgegs rnams sbyang baR+Sha gyis shig ces brjod la gtor ma byin pa dang de rnams la regra ste/ mchog sbyin rdo rje mchog khyod 'dud ces pa la sogs pas bstod pa sngon du song bya dang dril bu dkrol bas bya ba'i
197b6(rgyud 'grel): sngags ni/ oM hriM dz+haiM b+h+yohU~M hU~Md+hIHoM badz+re sar+b+bA ya swAhA/ e a maM g+ha sadz+dza ya swA hA/ oM a mo g+ha sid+d+ha yai swAhA/ oM rat+na saM b+hA wA ya swAhA/ oM a mr-i tA b+hA ya swAhA/ oM bai ro tsa n+d+ra ye swAt+ma/ oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/ oM pUr+N+Na
198a1(rgyud 'grel): si ni wAr+yA de swAhA/ oM mA ma TI ki ri ki ri sAhA/ oM lo tsa na ba su de swAhA/ zhes pa'i sngags kyiso// de nas gzhon nu mas bkal bru'i srung pa dpa' bos bcad pa ltar ltos pa dang kha
198a2(rgyud 'grel): dog bzang po lngas bsgyur la/ oM AM ai r-I UM laM badz+ra sU tra sarba d+har+Ni ka s+ya b+ha wA sarba d+harme ni kA k+Shi rA swa b+hA wA ku ru ku ru swA hA/ zhes pas byin gyis brlabs la dri la stsogs pas mchod shar phyogs kyi sa gzhi la
198a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhug su gsolo// de nas mu tig la sogs pa 'am 'dras sA l+r-i la sogs pa las byung ba'i lcags par tshe su btsos pa'i tshon rnams la/ au AM iM r-i uM lai su b+hi shud+d+ha pany+tsa skan d+ha swa b+hA wa pany+tsa skan d+ha na
